PH Balance Diet For More Energy PH Balance Diet or known as PH Miracle Diet will help balance your body and increase your energy. Have you ever put low quality fuel into your car machine after running it on premium fuel? There is a difference in acceleration, handling, and overall performance and this is directly linked to the quality of fuel you put in the tank. Your body is a finely tuned machine. Like other types of machinery, the parts need to be kept running by fuel. The best fuel for your body is a custom mix, more alkaline than acid. Red blood cells are the commuting traffic riding along the bloodstream in a hurry to get to work. These red blood cells each have a negative charge on them, and this keeps them from getting into fender benders and collisions in the bloodstream. When the negative charge is stripped away from the red blood cells, they cluster together and can cause gridlock and bottlenecks in the bloodstream. In short, the traffic in the bloodstream isn’t flowing as smoothly and it causes everything to slow down. If you’ve ever been stuck in freeway traffic you know how frustrating this is. This stress on the body causes a domino effect, which eventually saps the energy away and ... PH Balance Diet can help you avoid all of these effects.

Serenity for Android is a client for Plex. It provides an optimized layout for large screen devices, tablets, Android TV, and navigation using a remote control or keyboard. Serenity lets you access videos, and music to play on your device. You can use the internal video player or external players are supported if the videos do not play on your device with the internal player. You must have a plex media server installed locally to use Serenity. Note: Android TV and tablet device users are recommended to use an external video player for the best playback experience. Users should review the FAQ if you are using cloud servers instead of local servers. Support and FAQs: * FAQ: https://github.com/NineWorlds/serenity-android/wiki/Frequently-Asked- Questions What is supported: * Server auto discovery and configuration * Video Queue and Continuous playback * Playback video trailers on most devices. * Optimized layout for TV screens and larger tablets. * All screens remote, game controller, and D-PAD optimized. * Movie and TV Show libraries * Music Libraries * Internal or external video player support. Enhanced support for some popular players is provided. * Automatic subtitle selection configuration option * Update viewing position when using external player * User configurable layout preferences and starting categories * Multiple Layouts (Grid View and Detail View) * Download videos to the device * Content filtering via categories * App localization for English, Spanish, and French. What is not supported: * Transcoding of video or audio. * Most phones are not supported. * Photo Libraries * Cloud services Depending on the device not all videos will play back. It is highly dependent on the video and audio codecs the device supports. The wider the supported codecs the more it can play back.
release_text: 1.9.4 * Remove hardware microphone requirement. * Restore compatibility with Google TV and Android TV devices

This 3rd person shooter mobile game was developed with the latest technology. 3D Combat mode. Joystick function. 3D animation. Special Effects.

Vatican Radio presents its first App for Android with a strong multimedia identity. News, editorials, live videos, web text, audio channels, all contained in a single app that lets you follow the Pope’s activities in real time. The App is free of charge and the initial version is available in English and Italian. The application opens onto the Agenda of the Pope’s public appointments. A system called Vatican TIC, devised and produced by Vatican Radio, lets you access all the text and audio content associated with each event. The Agenda tells you in real time about papal celebrations broadcast live and produced in collaboration with the Vatican Television Centre. The texts of the Pope’s discourses are also available, as published on www.vatican.va. The App also offers a News service that includes the latest information concerning the Church and the World, broadcast by Vatican Radio’s news programmes. The Radio section contains five audio channels corresponding to the network of over 70 daily programmes in 40 languages produced by Vatican Radio. The same channels are used for FM, AM, Short Wave and Satellite broadcasts. The papal Agenda and News functions of this App run on Android 2.3 and higher. The Android 3.0 or higher is needed to access the Radio function and audio streaming channels. An Android 4.0 or higher is required to view the video streaming of the live broadcasts. This is Vatican Radio’s first version of this App. We promise to continue doing our best to improve and update. Stay with us.
release_text: -Enabled the ability to listen to the radio for devices with Android versions 2.2 to 2.3.7 -Fixed some minor issues and improved the stability and the response time of the application.

description: Vettri Theatres - Now check movie listings, movie show time and book tickets from your android mobile. Its Simple, easy and secure to book tickets for your favourite movie in Vettri Theatres using your Android Mobile.

Forget slow file transfers and jumpy, low quality video streams! Use VidOn to access and download the media from your computer and other storage device over Wi-Fi, sit back and enjoy the show. The newly improved VidOn Server feature helps you manage, enrich and stream all your personal media between your mobile device and VidOn Server. Please note: Not for use with DVDWatchBox. Features: 1. 100% Free & Ad Free. 2. Support for almost every video format and codec out there (MP4, WMV, MOV, AVI, MKV, RMVB, 3GP, MPG, RM, ASF, F4V, FLV, h264, QuickTime, XVID, DIVX and many more). 3. Powerful hardware decoding and acceleration for smooth high-definition playback up to 1080p. 4. Streaming video from windows sharing service, Samba, NAS. 5. Media library management: auto categorizes Movie and TV shows via VidOn Server on PC. 6. Poster View: Auto download media info such as posters, plots and cast for Movie and TV Shows via VidOn Server to enhance your personal media library. 7. Change audios and subtitles (SRT, SUB, USF, GSUB, XSUB and others) 8. Blu-ray decoding and playback via VidOn Server Support: http://vidon.me
release_text: 1. Fixed a crash during playback under Android 5.0 and above. 2. Added media library option for browsing media library by categorizes 3. Optimized the home sharing device auto-discover feature. 4. Fixed a bug where feedback feature would not work properly under certain circumstances. 5. Fixed some minor bugs.

description: Use this app to connect to a Z21 Digital Center. With this app you can manage locomotive libraries, locomotives and locomotive functions, program digital components and of course control all locomotives with DCC- or Motorola-decoder, as easy and convenient as is only possible with touch-technology. The digital switchboard Z21 connects your model train unit and your digital locomotives with your Android device via WLAN. This way you can control the operation on your train layout easily and conveniently from your mobile device. Model train control was never this easy and convenient: With one swipe of your hand you can scroll to your model of choice in the locomotive library. A slight touch on the headlight symbol and the front and backlights go on. A second touch, this time on the speaker symbol, and the locomotive makes a sound. Drag your finger over the speed indicator and the train accelerates. The further highlights of the Z21-Mobile-App - Control your entire layout with an intuitive, graphic interface and have easy access to the entire scope of functions of your digital locomotives. - Manage your entire locomotive-library in just one application, including individual locomotive images for an ideal overview. - Control the digital functions of your locomotives with intuitive function symbols instead of complicated key combinations. - Download drivers cabs for even more reality - Create locomotives, wagons, accessory and trains to drive with - Place turnouts, turnout routes and notes on your track to interact with your railroad
release_text: + bugfix for traction control and trains

description: Magic Hexagon is a top puzzle game developed and published by iBit Game Studio Challenge yourself with one of the hardest puzzle game ever. Try Magic Hexagon and you will just be addicted! How to play: - Choose and rotate the inner hexagons to make the image the same. Be careful as every move counted. You cannot undo, and if you use more moves than allowed, it will be game over! The game features 2 game play mode: - Free mode: You are free to practice your move with random puzzle. - Challenge mode: Test your skill with 32+ brain-wrecking difficult game levels. Most people could not even get pass level 15 of this game. Good luck! And don't forget to share your result with your friends! Please support Magic Hexagon by leaving comments. All suggestions are welcomed.
release_text: - Fix a minor issue with game animation - Show current stage at the top of challenge mode

description: Limited Offer - Free for a limited time!! Maze City: Bomber Adventure is a unify of the classical game play and high definition graphics. The game features hundreds of dungeons in Maze City, with extremely smart and deadly monsters, traps, moving obstacles, treasure boxes and more. Player controls the bomber hero fighting ferocious monsters to complete his goal (looking for the keys to the final gate, saving the princess or just manage to get out of from a deadly pyramid) His only weapons is a small pack of bomb - boom (dynamite). Use it wisely or he will end up in monster's stomach! Victory is not for the faint of heart! How to Play: - Use direction buttons to move the player - Use the boom button to plan bomb. Regular bomb will explode after 3s - Bomb size and damage varies based on items you found - Items may boost character stats (but there might also be side effects!) - Avoid monster and bomb explosions! - Defeat the monster (some monsters e.g the pharaoh are immortal) , find the key to the next level - And don't forget the stars, you will need them to unlock the next episode. - Saving coins to unlock new game character, item and levels Game features: - Classical onscreen game controller - Blazing fast action - Smart monsters - Huge dungeons with many type of monsters (maze style) - Breakthrough game play - Huge collections of item under hidden treasure boxes - Score and star assessment system - Amazing effects - And much more! - Support game controller, keyboard via OTG cable - Now support Google Play Game Services, Leader Boards and Achievements! Future Update: - Multiplayer player via Bluetooth, WIFI or Data Network. - New monsters, levels - New type of boom, dynamites, character and game mode Try to get the maximum of star after each level!!! Enjoy Maze City: Bomber Adventure and support us by leaving comments. Thanks Developed and published by iBit Game Studio.

Inside Cube space, Guide the sphere to the exit. Only a cube can stop it once the sphere moves. So use the cube wisely to reach the exit. But it won't be as easy as that! Portals, switches and even movable cube will challenge your brain. The game features 24 mind-bending levels along with local highscores and a time attack mode. Create your own levels with the ingame Cube editor. Enjoy the 3d graphics and a soundtrack written by bitbof. Try the tutorial first to find out how to play the game. If the game runs to slow, try to disable the bloom effect in the options. The game needs more processing power on tablets because of the higher resolution. Features: - local highscores - time attack mode - 3d graphics - soundtrack by bitbof - optimized for tablets - open source

Relive the film (TRON 1982) as you try and cut off your opponents before they cut you off! Now with user options 1. Bike Colour select from 6 colours 2. Toggle Music / SFX on/off 3. Toggle FPS counter 4. Change Camera mode 5. Select number of players between 2 and 6 6. Select Arena Size (Small, Medium, Large) 7. Select Game Speed (Slow, Normal, Fast, Extreme) Android port of the open source glTRON a 3D lightbike racing game.

description: XV Dino Rush is a RUN and JUMP game for android. You can save your High Score online. Tap the screen to jump and don't fall into the water!!! OK! Now have fun and rate me :D

description: A fun puzzle/simulation game using the accelerometer. It has 40+ thrilling and fun packed-levels with stunning graphics and amazing physics. Objective of the game is to make the your balls reach the goal without hitting the blue balls by tilting the phone.Try not to use brute-force. Space out the balls using the bricks and things will get a lot simpler. Features: - Physics simulation. - Autosaving of completed levels. - Easy starting levels for newbie players. - Many levels. - Tablet support.

This app does not create an icon on you app list. To use it, you should go to the "Share" menu of the Gallery or any file manager. On WiFi, transfers will be verry faster more than bluetooth, all devices on the same network (LAN) will be able to access your files. This program will open an HTTP server in which anyone can download the file.If you choose just one file, the link will redirect the file itself. If you choose many files, a ZIP containing all the chosen files will be generated on the fly. That means you will not have to wait nor space on you device will be used.

app_name: Tin Mới - Tin tuc doc bao moi
description: Tin Mới là ứng dụng chính thức của Tinmoi.vn - trang tin tức cung cấp toàn diện về chính trị xã hội, đời sống, kinh tế, thể thao, giải trí cùng các tiện ích tra cứu, tư vấn pháp luật, hỏi đáp. Với lượng dữ liệu khổng lồ, thông tin được cập nhật liên tục 24h/7, hiện TinMoi.vn thuộc nhóm 10 website tin tức hàng đầu Việt Nam. Chức năng nổi bật: + Tin tức phong phú, cập nhật hàng giờ + Giao diện dễ dùng, chuyên nghiệp + Danh mục tin khoa học, trực quan + Hiệu ứng đẹp mắt & mượt mà + Video tổng hợp hấp dẫn, nhiều người quan tâm + Đánh dấu tin ưa thích, tải tin về máy + Tải toàn bộ tin mới để đọc offline (không cần kết nối mạng) + Xem tin liên quan, Xem ảnh dạng slideshow + Tìm kiếm tin chính xác & nhanh chóng + Chia sẻ tin, hình ảnh, video qua Mạng xã hội, Email, SMS + Chế độ đọc tin ngang màn hình. keywords: tin tuc,doc bao, tin moi, tin, bao, 24h, pega, news, bao dien tu

Love Fruit Ninja but get bored with old challenges? Try our new Food Ninja right now, more exciting games and interesting characters are waiting for you! Imagine being a Ninja with a sword on your hand,your mission is to slice pieces of delicious foods: - Swipe your screen to cut the moving food pieces. - You will get bonus point whenever more than one piece are cut at a swipe. - Do not to cut the bomb appears next to food. If you cut the bomb, everything will explode and ofcourse, you lose. As Fruit Ninja there are several game modes in this game: - Play time mode: cut as much food in the fixed time of the game as possible. Try to get the highest score out of the limited time. - Play network mode: you have 3 playing times in a screen play, every time you drop 1 piece of food, you will lose 1 life.

Accept Credit Cards 1.0 Accept credit card payments on your android mobile using the www.planetauthorize.net credit card payment gateway. To register a PlanetAutorize account goto http://www.planetauthorize.net/index-3.html and click on Register as a Certified Provider link. To accept payments: 1. Fill in Merchant Details, Client Card Details, SMTP settings. 2. Press the "Charge" button. Wait a couple of seconds. You will receive either "Approved" message, "Decined" message or "Error in transaction data". The last message happens when invalid credit card data is supplied by customer. A receipt representing the transaction will be sent to both client and merchant. Client Card Details Section 1. Fill all the client details: Card number, Cvv, Card Lastname, Expiry Date, Amount, Client Email 2. Client Email will receive transaction receipt. Merchant Details Section 1. Scroll down the screen to find the merchant details. 2. Fill in all the merchant details: PlanetAutorize username, PlanetAutorize password, Merchant Email, Merchant Name. 3. Merchant Email will receive all transaction receipts. Merchant Name and Email will be added to all client receipts. 4. Merchant details are saved on app exit and restored at startup. SMTP Settings 1. Scroll the screen to find SMTP settings. 2. Fill in all SMTP settings: Gmail username, Gmail password. 3. Gmail address and Gmail password will be used to send receipts to clients and the merchant. The app uses smtp.gmail.com for sending receipts. Register for a gmail account at gmail.google.com if you do not have one.
release_text: v1.01 ----- + Included client in receipts + Accepting of self-signed SSL certificates disabled v1.0 ----- Initial Release

description: Make your telephone or tablet speak to you with Voxygen’s Best-of-Vox Voices. The Agnès voice reads aloud any French text. Get rid of flat voices with no expression or personality! Discover Natural and Fun Voices, and listen to a sample here: http://www.best-of-vox.com/android . Follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/VoxygenSAS to keep up with new voices! Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/voxygen.fr ★ What is it for? Various ways to use Best-of-Vox voices: voice guidance, E-books and SMS reading, ring tones, alarm clocks, Android accessibility features with Talkback and much more. Share your messages from the Best-of-Vox application on your preferred social networks: SoundCloud, WhatsApp, Skype, hubiC, Evernote, Drive, etc. ★ How does it work? The Best-of-Vox application allows you to type or paste text and to have it read out aloud by the voice that you have chosen. You can then save it as a ringtone or share it with your friends on SoundCloud ! From your emails, your Internet browser, or any compatible application, select some text and make your Best-of-Vox voice read it aloud by simply clicking on the “share” menu. ★ How to install it? Only 2 clicks to activate the Best-of-Vox voice in the Android settings that you reach from the application's main menu. Watch the installation video and follow the instructions. Please note: with Android versions prior to 4.0, one additional first click is required at the bottom of the settings list in order to activate the voice. ★ How to fix an occasional problem? – Cannot hear the Best-of-Vox: First ensure that the volume of your device is sufficient. If this is the case, than it may be that the voice's data was corrupted during or after its installation. In order to reinitiate the voice, please perform the following steps: go to “Android Settings / Applications / Manage applications / Best-of-Vox voice”, click on “Force stop”, click on “Clear data”, return to the home screen, ensure that the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network (which is required to download the data), restart the Best-of-Vox application, wait for the download and data preparation to be fully completed, enter some text and click on the “play” button. Questions? Please contact android@voxygen.fr . Credits: Moteur de synthèse vocale / Voix de synthèse / Synthèse vocale / Speech synthesis / TTS / tts / Text To Speech / Texttospeech / Speech synthesis engine / TTS engine / Synthetic voice / TTS voice : http://www.best-of-vox.com/android
release_text: Version 1.4 : - pause button - save voice settings as default - master volume + voice volume - download gui - gui optimized

Weather by "MooboHalbert" for your Android phone! Let you have a mobile weather station ! By accessing the largest network of professional weather in the United States and tens of thousands of locations around the world , "Weather Pro" at any time, any place , can get the most accurate weather information . You can easily add the city's weather widget to the desktop , allowing you quick access to the latest weather information at any time . The software uses the form of pictures to show the weather conditions , the gorgeous UI make boring data become lively and friendly . == Feature == - 5-day forecast - Current weather - Homescreen Widget (not possible if installed on SD card!!) - Powerful search + GPS positioning - Virtual visual experience as well as a smooth, impressive animation effects - Can access tens of thousands of cities and regions around the world Weather - Quick access has already been saved city - Sunrise and sunset time reminder - The offline can view cached weather - Through Email, Gmail, Facebook, Flickr, sharing of Weather Information to friends . Widget Notice: Widgets only work if the app is installed on internal storage. If the app is on external storage like a SD card, the widget dissapears. After reboot at the latest.

description: 3...2...1.... Smile! Instantly capture special selfies with friends and family in a filmstrip view! Now have your own photo booth!! This app captures 3 pictures inside a filmstrip in rapid succession and it is immediatly ready to share it on Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp or wherever you like! The photo's are automatically compiled into a filmstrip view and saved to your gallery. Simply put on your best smile while the timer counts down and your set! Make life's moments memorable and share the fun!

﻿Hey you!, wake up! You are only one click too far from a new amazing way to think at your alarm clock and start your journey just like a boss! UPDATE! zZzAlarm 2 have Material Design style; plus we introduced a new way to use the app, something like a Lite version: it's the same wonderful zZzAlarm but without the tab Profiles, so that you'll find more easy and more convenient to set your usual alarms! Advanced users, on the contrary, or everyone who loves our powerful Profiles engine, could use the standard version as always! Enjoy zZzAlarm! AND PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO LEAVE A REVIEW! Features like: local or YouTube videos, weather, different alarms modes to set up depending to the weather itself, custom pre-alarm, ultra alarm tone, horoscope, voice recognition for snoozing and stopping, Text To Speech for RSS Feeds, weather, fortunes etc, vocal notes and more and more... zZzAlarm is the smartest alarm clock: no other apps on the GooglePay Store are able to do something like what we can do, every day, just for you; that's for sure! We are always trying to improve your experience with our application, so stay in touch with us through our social accounts or our blog and let us know what you would like to see into the app! ---> FEATURES ** YOUTUBE or LOCAL VIDEO zZzAlarm can wake up you showing your favorite YouTube video, searching an artist, song or words. Still better, you can also select part of a video and set it as tone. Just choose it! ** WAKE UP ON WEATHER zZzAlarm controls the weather to wake up when you want. You'll be able to sound the alarm only with certain weather conditions (sunny, cloudy, rain and snow) or wake up before / after the occurrence of any of these. You can also assign a specific ringtone to a weather condition. (Trial version available into the app) ** PREALARM Enable Prealarm to wake up better. With this feature you can search the REM stage during your sleep to wake up rested. (This plugin should be purchased separately) ** SUPER ALARM Are you afraid of not hearing the alarm and do not wake up? Activates the SUPER ALARM to forget about it! ** HOROSCOPE Wake up with your horoscope and find out what awaits you in the day. ** CUSTOM STOP No more sequent alarm created with the fear stop it by mistake, you can now decide when show the stop button and forget about this problem for all. ** VOICE RECOGNITION Use a word or phrase you like to snooze or stop your alarm. ** SPEAKING ALARM (TTS) It's possible to read automatically any information which the alarm show. You can also add custom phrase, weather, time and all others. ** VOICE NOTE Talk to your device and tell him what kind of note to remember and not worry about, no more overcooked foods or missed appointments! ** PROVERBS, FORTUNE COOKIE, KAMASUTRA Enable this plugin to have a proverb at every alarm, a fortune cookie and a Kamasutra position, a possible idea if you wake up in good company. (Trial version available into the app) ** OTHER FEATURES * fade in ringtone: choose how much time for a gentle awakening; * snooze/stop by shaking the device; * read your favorite news through RSS: you can read the feeds of other users or share yours; * Post-it: read and edit post-it on your alarm; * ability to fully customize the skin of application: you can download new skins and share your with other users; * more and more options Currents supported languages: English, Italian. WARNING: zZzAlarm isn't yet optimized for tablet over 7''. _______________________ SOCIAL & CONTACTS Blog: http://zzzalarm.zer0lab.net Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/zZzAlarm Twitter: http://twitter.com/zZzAlarm Google+: http://plus.google.com/116638260052406690791 Google+ Community: http://plus.google.com/communities/117805515427650559351 YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnt2dcfGA6cLsyZZ9E2luFQ Email: zer0lab.dev@gmail.com

description: *****PLEASE READ***** 04/10/2013 The recent Drag Racing update has changed setups significantly! In short, we are essentially starting over but this time with some steam! Many of the setups in this initial relaunch are a hair off the world records. New setups will be added regularly. This is the start of setups for the newest drag racing update. We launched early merely to accommodate for new player needs. Please refrain for negative reviews based on the number of setups, we will be adding and updating setups every Wednesday morning. Thank you for your understanding. **If you don't see the full list of cars, click on "Best of Class" and deselect "only show Best of Class" in the bottom right corner.** Pro Setups for Drag Racing on Android. The original source for Drag Racing Setups! We've eliminated the guessing game and jumped you straight to the top of the leader boards. Don't waste hours of your time only to find you've spend days upgrading the wrong vehicles! Before you sell them off, check to see what your car is capable of with our non-Best of Class setups to see if you can get by before moving on to the Pro League vehicles. *** GetMe2 Adelaide has reached the end of its life, please see the new and fully featured GetMe2 Transit. Full trip planner, timetables stored on your device, easier to use and real time transit in selected locations! *** -Ad supported version, limits number of favourite routes/trips that can be saved- GetMe2 Adelaide is designed to get you from where you are to where you want to go, all using the public transport system available to you! Bus, Train and Tram times are stored on your phone so once you're up and running no Internet connection is required to access times. Some features include: - Stop selection via map (no need to know your stop number) - Point to point allowing selection of a departure and arrival point, the rest of the work will be done for you! - Ability to find stops near your location and display the routes of all services departing these stops - Stop times displayed on the map for each stop - Set an alarm before your service departs/arrives/transfers - Support for service transfers. This means all trip times are displayed, unlike other transport apps that sometimes miss over half of the services available - Journey planner with customisable transfer time links multiple services so you can make your connections - Show alternate services between selected stops - Street address for every stop listed - Favourite routes with customisable names - Include nearby stops with customisable search radius. i.e. include all stops within 100 metres of the selected stops for your trip - Filter services by transport type (bus/train/tram) and/or service name - Direction switcher to view services in the opposite direction - Stop filter so stops in the opposite direction aren't displayed - Select how many days in advance to show service times for, or increase search day by day - Show all services frequenting a stop by selecting the stop from the map - Easy to navigate screen flow - Automatically checks for timetable updates - Gesture support for moving between tabs Compatible with tablets although not officially supported at this stage. Enjoy!
release_text: v1.201 -New Feature: Set an alarm for a departing/arriving service or a transfer between services -Bug Fix: Timetable updater sometimes crashed when checking for a timetable update if no Internet connection was available, download progress bar incorrectly reported progress -Bug Fix: Further minor bug fixes causing various crashes -Improvement: Even smaller timetable -Improvement: Notification to update timetable when it's out of date. Defaulted auto update check to every three days

description: Dice Game is easy to learn, funny and entertaining. It is very similar to popular dice games like Farkle, Dice 10000 or Zilch. It's up to you, if you are going to play a short and amusing round or a challenging dice marathon session with a higher score limit. Leave pen, paper and your dice cup at home and enjoy playing dice with this app whenever and wherever you want. This game features a single player mode with up to 3 computer controlled opponents and a local multiplayer allowing you to play against up to 3 of your friends on your device. Compare your scores and accomplishments in 3 different leaderboards with other players and collect a bunch of achievments on your way to the top. Please send us your feedback and criticism about this little game and help us to improve the game with every new version. Have fun!

developer: Centre for Mobile Education and Research
description: 1.1 - Fixed a bug where duplicate answers may appear in the quiz. 1.0 - The amino acids and nucleic acids are units of two fundamental molecules of life: proteins and DNA. University and college Introductory Biochemistry courses typically concentrate on understanding the structures and chemical properties of the amino acids and nucleic acids as an integral part of understanding how proteins and DNA function within living cells. The Biochem Euchre Deck was designed as a tool for students to learn the structures and properties of the amino acids of proteins and nucleic acids of DNA. The cards contain nomenclature and structural information, along with some amino acid-specific information. Alpha and beta secondary structure propensity scores are also given and may be used in upper-year courses dealing with protein structure. Quizzes are provided to help the students associate the full names, 3-letter codes, and single-letter codes for the amino acids. Students also learn to associate amino acids with classes based on their chemical properties.
release_text: 1.1 - Fixed a bug where duplicate answers may appear in the quiz.

description: ** SCION CLASS NOW AVAILABLE** **Updated version supports build saving both publicly and privately** This is an unofficial companion app for Path of Exile, the free to play dark fantasy ARPG from Grinding Gear Games. This app allows you to build characters in the passive skill tree and view the accumulated stats that your build gives your character. You can then export your build with the same url mechanism used on the game's website. If you like this app, or would like it to be better, please follow the project on twitter @POESkillTreeApp and let us know what device you are using and if it works for you. Also let us know what features you'd like to see in future releases.
release_text: Major Update Includes - More updates coming soon - Search Nodes - Search for Scion builds - Scion Class now available - Save over loaded build instead of making a new one every time - Refresh skill tree if out of date - Private Build Saving - Public Build Saving and Sharing - Pinch Zoom - Overhauled UI - Numerous Big Fixes

description: When it comes to pizza game, there is nothing quite like the yummy flavors that you taste! With the ratatouille pizza cooking game you can have fun in cooking your very own yummy pizza that professional chefs would be jealous of! Here you will collect all your ingredients and utensils ready for pizza making. Next you will make your dough and roll it out ready for the sauce and ingredients to be placed on it. You also get to cook your sauce by matching the symbols of your ingredients and adding them to the pan one at a time. Once you have cooked and placed your sauce on your pizza base, all you have to do is add the cheese to the top and place your pizza in the oven and watch it transform into the best pizza in the world! So if you love cooking and want to make something special, why not try this free cooking game online and make a mouth-watering pizza! Features: • Collect your ingredients and utensils from the refrigerator and shelves ready for your pizza making! • Add your ingredients together before mixing them with the electric beater! • Kneed your pizza dough with your hands before rolling it out with a rolling pin on the cutting board! • Collect your pizza ingredients from the refrigerator before slicing each one into small pieces to put on your pizza base! • Match the symbols to the symbols on the side to place your ingredients in the pan and cook them! • Slice your cheese into small pieces before adding your cooked sauce ingredients onto the pizza base! • Add the cheese to the top of your pizza before placing it in your oven and cooking it to perfection! • Take your pizza out of the oven and see just how good it really looks!

Ages 2 – 8 Features: • Read to me / Read to myself options • Two reading levels of text to choose from • Interactivity with sound effects on every page • Colorful, unique illustrations blending real dog photos and graphics • Navigate back and forth through the pages using the menu bar • Search for Torii’s bone throughout the book • Includes additional activity/coloring pages at the end of the story Torii’s Summer Adventure is a full length children’s picture book with over 80 touch points of interactive animation and sound effects. Written by an elementary teacher, this colorful and amusing book follows the adventures of a loveable and curious Golden Retriever who loves exploring around the lake. Children will love Torii and learning about the animal friends she meets along the way! See more about Torii and her adventures, download educational activities, and preview other books in the Torii’s Adventures Series at toriisadventures.com. Please rate and review the app. Your feedback means a lot to us!

Now available in English and Spanish ***Winner of Children's Technology Review Editor's Choice Award*** ***The National Fire Protection Association (www.nfpa.org) is giving families this FREE deluxe interactive storybook app about fire safety, created by award-winning children’s app developer Cupcake Digital.*** It’s Sparky® the Fire Dog’s birthday, and his doggie friends are throwing a surprise party. In this fun and original tap-and-play storybook app, kids will learn important fire safety skills while joining the excitement of preparing for a surprise birthday party. The story includes bright graphics, surprising animations, interactive learning games, and a hilarious one-of-a-kind sing-along music video. Highlights in Sparky’s Birthday Surprise include: THREE STORYTELLING MODES Just a Book, perfect for quiet reading time, Read & Play and Read To Me in which early-learning reading skills are reinforced with text highlighting and synced narration. FUN BAKED INTO THE STORY Learn about the various parts of a fire truck and decorate Sparky’s birthday cake with highly interactive pages found in the story. LEARNING ACTIVTIES STARRING SPARKY THE FIRE DOG®! Piñata Counting and Sparky Addition mini-games teach kids to count and add in fun new ways, and the Birthday Shapes game helps kids recognize basic shapes. ORIGINAL SING-ALONG MUSIC VIDEO Your child will love singing the “If the Smoke Alarm Sounds” song with Sparky and his tiny flea friends while learning about what to do when they hear the alarm. COLORING PAGES Kids can get creative with coloring pages featuring an array of paint buckets, brushes, colorful spray paints and stickers inspired by the story. SHARED SCREEN TIME The Thinking Corner offers thoughtful questions designed to spark open-ended conversation and reinforce reading comprehension. Hey, parents and caregivers! This app contains gated links to ensure that only adults can access social networking sites, send contact e-mails or visit app stores. We never collect personal data from children and we never use data for behavioral targeting. For more information, or to view our full app privacy policy, please visit www.cupcakedigital.com/appsprivacy.

description: Hi, we are sure that you are a kid who loves playing games and especially to play in the park. The parks are the favorite of all and although here playing is the most fun you can stain clothes very quickly. When you play you do not think about dirty, all you want is to have best fun with your new toy, your new friends, enjoying the swing and make sand castles. In this kids games you will meet a little girl who is playing in the park and enjoy her freedom. While she is playing, appears a storm which makes dirty her clothes. You have to take care to clean the girl, help her take a shower and wash her clothes. Towards the end after you helped her to choose clean clothes, you have to feed her. We are sure that our little girl will be very happy. Thank you for your help, have fun.

*** Update December 2014 *** The new update includes 90 new levels! Enjoy! Merry Christmas and a warm filled holiday treat for everybody! Become the Christmas Sweeper and bring joy, door to door with the spirit of Christmas! Switch and match your way through 60 fun and holiday filled levels full of gifts, stars, bells and pine trees this season! Break the chocolate colored tiles on this fun match-three grid and sweep the floor of gifts for everyone! Be careful of the star bar! It depletes over time as you play, so sweep faster to achieve a better score! Don't you just love the Christmas season? If you like sweets and enjoys the classic match-3 bubble shooter game, you'll love Sweet Candy! Enjoy removing bubbles in 10 levels of fun puzzles filled with sweet treats. Shoot bubbles up and create groups of 3 or more of the same bubbles to remove them. Reach each level's goal to advance on the next level! FEATURES: -Classic match-3 bubble shooter game! -10 levels of fun puzzle to solve! -Great for ages 4 and up!

Physics puzzle game about a funny Monster which loses an eye. Help the monster get his eye back by solving the various puzzles. Key features: - Free version has 10 levels (Full version has 30 original levels) - 5 achievements - 3 background styles Powered by Dolby® on supported devices

Frozen Mahjong Solitaire is a fun mahjong style game with a wintery landscape. It's winter and all Mahjong tiles are frozen. Remove the same free tiles in pairs and remove all tiles to advance to the next level. A tile is free if it has at least 1 free side (left or right) and if it has no tiles on top. Only free tiles are not frozen. Removing tiles can unfreeze new free tiles. Mahjong puzzles are the best! Play this Free Mahjong Solitaire Game! Game genres include; word, action/arcade games, mahjong, swap-n-match, solitaire, match-3, and bubble shooters! Games included in this pack are: The ever popular Cube Crash HD! Alphabet Jungle Eggsplosive Frozen Mahjong Happy Flowers Poxxle 3 Pyramid Tripeaks Free Rockoblox Squzzle Powered by Dolby® on supported devices

Phatpuppy presents, "Kingdom of Dreams!" Find unique hidden objects among the hauntingly beautiful images. This is a wonderful challenge for Hidden Object devotees. "Kingdom of Dreams" contains 23 artistically-crafted levels, filled with items. Three different modes of play! -NORMAL Mode: Timed, limited hints and exciting bonus rounds! -CASUAL Mode: Nice and relaxing experience. -CHALLENGE Mode: An extra challenge for those that are willing to accept! Three ways to find items! -Find items by the PICTURE. -Find items by the WORD. -Find items by SILHOUETTE. Have fun!

Help the Pharaoh and his queen build the ancient and glorious pyramids in this solitaire game. Set in the glory days of Egypt, you must remove all the cards from the layout to construct these ancient wonders of the world. FEATURES - addictive gameplay - enchanting graphics set in ancient Egypt - simple controls, easy to learn - atmospheric sound effects If you like to relax with a card game or puzzle game then we think you'll love Pyramid Solitaire Ancient Egypt.

AIM OF THE GAME You must remove a certain amount of rocks of each color, inside a time limit. You can only remove groups of 3 or more adjacent rocks of the same color, with the exception of gray rocks (but you could remove these using the special abilities described below). To get the level completion bonus, besides completing the required color targets, you should remove every remaining group before the time is over. SPECIAL ABILITIES The availability of the special abilities will depend on how much coins you've got. REMOVE ROCK Costs 60 coins. It lets you remove a rock of your choice, of any kind (including gray rocks). SWAP ROCKS Costs 120 coins. It allows you to swap the position of two rocks of your choice, of any kind (including gray rocks). MOVE ROW Costs 140 coins. It allows you to push to the let or to the right a row of rocks. MAGNET Costs 150 coins. You'll be allowed to select a magnet which will atrract all rocks, piling them up to the left or right sides of the screen. SHUFFLE ROCKS Costs 400 coins. This will blow rocks into the air, shuffling them randomly. REMOVE COLOR Costs 1000 coins. This will allow you to remove all existing blocks from a color of your choice (including gray rocks). FEATURES: - Fast gameplay with increasing difficulty. - Easy game mechanics, although developing strategies is required to get far. - Great graphics and visual effects. - 3 different background scenes with day/night theme variations (9 backgrounds in total). - Sound effects and 7 minutes of music. - 6 special abilities to help you progress through the game. - Unlimited levels. - Multilanguage (English, Spanish and Portuguese).

The streets are always full of surprises. Take a walk on the busy streets and find all the objects hidden throughout the place. Try to find the objects as fast as possible. Use the hint button carefully: it will cost you time and thus bonus points. Features: - Fun hidden object game! - Exciting levels! - Fascinating scenes! - Hints available! Powered by Dolby® on supported devices*\

Free Ancient Egyptian Tripeaks Solitaire Card Game with addicting gameplay !! Object of the game is to remove all cards by selecting free cards that are 1 higher or 1 lower in value and placing them on the master deck. Jokers can be used for any value. As soon as a row of cards has been removed new cards will be added into play. Experience the magic of the pyramids in the free solitaire tripeaks game. *See what people are saying about this game* Great twist on the classic tripeaks solitaire: This game has a twist on the classic tripeaks solitaire game: as you complete rows, new rows appear and move down. -Bram Schoonhoven 3 Pyramids Pretty fun: I think its a good little puzzle for what it is. Eye, hand and speed, always need that polished. -Charlotte Schrock Pyramid tripeaks: Its fun and addictive! -Pamela Williams Loved it So fun -Mark Gtubbs :-) Yay -Chimere Walker Tripeaks one of the best card games on the market and will remain a classic for years to come. Discover the 3 Ancient Pyramids in Egypt in this addicting, very popular, free solitaire card game! It will have you entertained for hours. 3 Pyramid Tripeaks Solitaire is a free download. 3 Pyramid Tripeaks Solitaire is ad-supported. *Powered by Dolby® on supported devices*

A card game called Tower of 21 in which you must rescue the Damsel in distress from the top of her captors tower. Based in a fantasy setting this magical card game will have you climbing rung by rung to rescue a young princess from the tower. We've taken the classic card game of Twenty One or Blackjack and put a few twists in to create a easy to play card game of addition. Playing this card game is as simple as clicking on the stack where you want the next card to go. In order to reach your stranded princess you must make stacks of 21. For each 21 you make the princess will throw down hearts that encourage you to climb up to rescue her. Good luck on your journey brave knight!

Difference Games presents, "Journey into the Wilderness", a completely FREE "What's the Item?" game! If you enjoy Hidden Object or word games then check this out! "What's the Item?" cleverly combines the traditional Hangman word game with the visual searching in Hidden Object. When searching for an item, you flip "Clue Cards" that reveal progressively more letters of the item's name. Think Hangman or Wheel of Fortune, but with hidden objects! "Journey into the Wilderness" contains 8 artistically-crafted levels, filled with items. But wait, there's more! A second way to play, "Logic mode" is also included. In this mode the clues reveal information about the item's shape, location, colors, and name. This helps you narrow down what you are looking for, and the challenge is to find the item using as few clues as possible. Both modes are suitable for kids and adults and are a great workout for your brain cells! The gameplay is also great for kids who are learning reading, word and object association skills. Enjoy!

Collect cute animals, plant and grow crops with friends as you build the greatest farm around! Even you can create your own animals! ATTENTION! Happy Farm:Candy Day is a free to play game, but some items and features can also be accessed using real money. If you do not wish to use these features, please configure your settings in your Google lay Store app and set up password protection for purchases. NOTE: A network connection is required to play. Come and build your own dream farm, feed your pets and exchange gifts with thousands of other players online! ☆☆☆FEATURES☆☆☆ • Free to play! • Bigger farm land! • More animals than any other farming game! • Easy to grow crops,feed animals! • Create new animal with your friends and family! • Send flowers to your friends and family! • Supports over 20 languages including English, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese. • Supports Facebook login, so you can easily find your friends! • Win special free gifts every day via our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/pocketfarm.hd Note: A network connection is required to play Happy Farm. To contact customer service with any questions, please send email to cs4happyfarm@gmail.com , for feedback.

description: A small tap on your screen and a giant leap for TwinSpin ;-) You play a pair of Twins connected by a line. By tapping anywhere you like on the screen you swap the Twins and make a step. Pop all the balloons of every level in a limited time! What makes the game unique: - one button (one tap) for many different actions (walk, run, pop, smash, slide…) - 72 handcrafted levels - fast-paced arcade puzzler - unique kawaii graphics - and much much more… for you to discover ;-)

Hidden Words is a new word search highscores game with 28 categories and possibility to customize a look of the game as you want! You can change the color of the background, color of the highlight line and also color of the letters! There is unlimited number of color combination, so you will surely find a one that fits your eyes the best! And what more, once you set up the color combination it will be saved so next time playing you will see the exactly same one as you setup! Each category has its own leaderboard so do not forget to submit your score, you are playing against people all around the world! You can also submit your total score from all categories (the submit button will be enabled only if you reach better score than your last submitted score)! If you want to play more, then definitely try our word search editor, in which you can create your own crossword game! Access it via EDITOR button in the game menu! You can create 1-10 words with at least 10 characters each! Enjoy this brand new feature! * 28 word search categories * change colors of your crossword * create your own crossword puzzles * global leaderboards included - you play against people all around the world! Enjoy our crossword game Hidden Words and please rate the game or leave some comment if you want to support it! Try to complete all the 50 levels then with the best score possible and submit your score to the global leaderboard to see who is the best! How to play: Simply move all the shapes to the empty slots! Your score depends on your speed! Go for highscores! Do you like challenging but simple and addictive gameplay? Then Stellar Quest Mania is perfect for you! One of the most popular games amongst fans in the marble-style shooter genre. This challenges casual and competitive gamers alike with diverse and progressively difficult levels. Your goal? Use your sharpshooter cannon to target and destroy all the multi-colored galactic objects by matching them before they reach the blackhole at the end. Combining easy to learn gameplay with unique and entertaining backdrops and sound, Stellar Quest Mania is an excellent challenge for players of all ages and skill levels. Need a bigger challenge? Additional levels and enhanced difficulty mode are available to players who want even more out of the game! Topple the high score of other Stellar Questers! FREE GRATIS Please rate and leave us feedback on any new features you would like to see. SQ is not related to Zuma, Tumble, Bubble, Jewels, Lux, Blast, Sparkle or any other similar marble style game.

The VizZle Student Player (TM) is a kid-friendly environment that allows educators and parents to launch interactive instructional lessons for children who learn best from visually supported materials (e.g. children with autism, in early education, or typical children with a visual learning style). VizZle Student Player was designed using exclusively licensed intellectual property stemming from research proving the efficacy of a visual language-based approach to educating students with autism. It is also equally effective for any student who learns best visually.

Calling all pony lovers around the world to design together the loveliest princess room! Of course every little girl is a true princes within her heart and that's why she needs to be surrounded by sparkles and magic. A little pony will be the friend that she's been dreaming of for so long so why not bring the magic of those little ponies' world into her room. Use your creativity to mix and match, to stick and sparkle up and truly design the most beautiful bedroom ever seen. Let the ponies' magic take over your room! ***Features*** - style this room anyway you want with custom beds, dressers, lamps, night stands, curtains, desks, armchairs and more - amazing pony decorations - use the random button or shake your device for different room designs - at the end use the save button to save your design on the SD card

More than 300 effects!!!!, and the infinite posibilities of using the super easy Manual Adjust, that allows you customize your photo to the perfect: balance, contrast, brightness, saturation or colorizing, and The Face Smoother it's a powerful effect that let you clean your pics from imperfections, smoothing the surface of the skin like magazines photos, And don´t forget the Filters with a lot of especial effects!!!! Very unique Frames and Artistic Effects.
release_text: Great Upgrade!!! New and improved Effects, Now you can keeps and save the effects in high resolution, unique and varied filters, all with just a tap. Calibration of color, brightness, contrast, saturation and balance, All in one, New Frames Update!!! Enjoy it!!!

description: All kids like fast food. It's delicious, despite being unhealthy in most cases. Hamburger, cheeseburger, french fries, pizza, fried chicken, sandwiches and more... In this fast food restaurant, these and many more await you. In this game, you gotta keep the customers happy and prepare the orders in time correctly. If you can't do these, you can't make money and go on to the next level. You gotta be fast and careful. As you pass levels, you will have new dishes in the menu, and each level will be harder than the one before. Since our game is a hundred percent FREE, you can practice as much as you want. This free restaurant and food game is just for you. Boys and girls will both love it. Don't forget to check the scoreboard after each level to see your score, your tips and the number of orders you got. Have fun!

Take care of this cute baby boy with our first "Caring Carol" game! First give him a nice warm bath. Use the items on the shelves in the right order to make him happy. After the bath you must groom him by choosing the right care products. Once our baby boy is happy and clean, you can dress him up by choosing any of the clothes available. Let's make him the neatest boy you have ever seen!

Vintage is the new trend. Everybody loves this new retro style and with our latest fashion studio game you can design your own indie clothes! So let's get started and design your dream retro outfit! First put together 4 garments and choose the color and a nice pattern for each of them, then take the fabric and cut and sew it up with the sewing machine. In the end you can show off your lovely retro dress on the dance floor! *** Make sure to check out all our other dress up, make up, makeover, fashion, nail, baby and hairstyle games! ***

The "Speaking Alphabet (Russian)" program is intended for training of children under control of parents to learn letters, writing words and reading. It is the convenient training program for joint lessons of parents with children where the adult sets tasks and helps the child to be guided with the world of letters, sounds and syllables. The speaking alphabet will help to remember to the child Russian letters, and their various writing look and sound: upper and lower case, hand-written and printing style. Why we recommend this program: 1 . Color letters draw attention from kids 1.5 years old to preschool children of 7 years old. 2 . Colors allow the child to remember better letters and to learn difference from vowels and consonants. 3 . Opportunity to make words of letters, without possessing skills of the writing. 4 . The child can visually see and compare various writing of the same letter. 5 . Possibility of sound reproduction of the written words, phrases. 6 . Selecting by color of parts of words at listening allows the fastest studing of a pronunciation of syllables and sounds. 7. Two operating modes: the alphabet and syllables depending on landscape or portrait orientation of the screen. Always it is possible to find time to work with the child with your phone or tablet. We give you opportunity to learn letters together. These are your children and it is better to teach them to basic knowledge by yourself! The program works at devices with Adobe AIR support and screen resolution 800x480 and more. If you doubt the device, check it and install Adobe AIR separately. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adobe.air It is recommended to use tablets with more than 7" the screen for work with syllables in portrait orientation mode.

* Compatible with 7" tablets and above. Enter the fog-shrouded valley on a hidden object getaway! Beautiful vistas, natural landscapes and rustic buildings are filled with missing items that you must find in this hidden object quest. Delve into detailed indoor and outdoor scenes packed with over 1000 carefully placed objects, plus enjoy a challenging sliding tile puzzle for each evocative location. As you unlock each new scene, you'll be drawn deeper into the hidden object hunt. Are you ready to explore this foggy valley hideaway? Features: • Over 1000 hidden objects • 2 playing modes, casual and timed • Easily zoom in and out of scenes set in a foggy forest, secluded inn, pastoral farm and among hidden hills • Easy controls, evocative sound effects and immersive art • Fun seek and find gameplay • Includes bonus sliding tile puzzles

Toddlers and soccer go hand in hand. Try scoring a goal and defeat the toddlers team. Don't let the time run out until you scored at least 10 goals. After each round a bigger and faster toddler goalkeeper will come to defend the toddlers team.

description: Play Toonia TwinMatch: Mahjongg for kids and match pairs of tiles with cute animals, fruit, vegetables and space monsters with mahjong solitaire educational pairing game for kids & toddlers! Toonia TwinMatch: Mahjongg for kids is based on the traditional Mahjong Solitaire Game with simple gameplay adapted for children. The goal of the game is to match pairs of tiles. Toonia TwinMatch: Mahjongg for kids includes a variety of themes (animals, food, space) and layouts and grants hours of fun for kids and parents! Toonia TwinMatch: Mahjongg for kids is a fantastic educational matching game for your child. It improves children’s cognitive development - including attention, problem solving and memory - in a fun and playful way. It is easy to start, endless to play and includes a lot of fun with really cute illustrations of fruit, vegetables, animals and space monsters. Children can learn about different fruit, vegetables and animals through out the game. How to play Toonia TwinMatch: Mahjongg for kids: The object of the game is to remove all tiles from the board by pairing them. Only free tiles can be paired. A tile is free if it is not covered and can be moved either left or right without being blocked by other tiles. You can turn on the light to help you identify free tiles. Features: • 4 gorgeous themes (fruit, vegetables, bugs, animals, space monsters), 48 different layouts. • Adorable colorful graphics. • Easy-to-learn. • Turn on the light to access an easy mode. • Unlimited replayability. • No written instructions, kid-friendly interface. • No third-party advertising. • Relaxing music. About Toonia We are dedicated to creating premium apps for children that are educating, amplifying creative skills, and providing unique ways for kids to express themselves. We take kids privacy very seriously. Our apps do not collect any personal information. Thanks for downloading our app! If you encounter any issues, please contact us at feedback@tooniaapps.com before leaving a bad review. We're quick to respond and fix any problems. If you like it, we would be very happy if you would give us a positive review. Visit us: tooniaapps.com Email us: info@tooniaapps.com Like us: https://www.facebook.com/TooniaApps Follow us: twitter.com/Tooniaapps

description: This fun package contains two easy games that will be perfect for children ages 3 and up! Whether you are looking to teach your kids the basics of problem solving or just want to keep them occupied with a fun and educational pastime, Bubble Cat Kids has you covered! When Bubble the Cat and Ronnie the Mouse take a break from adventuring, they prefer calm and relaxing games such as coloring and jigsaw-puzzling! - Two different children's games in one package: coloring and jigsaw puzzles! - Bright, colorful presentation and lovable characters from the popular game Bubble Cat Adventures! - Intuitive controls that children can grasp without any help! - The games have a beneficial effect on children's attention span, pattern recognition ability and short-term memory!

Take care of four little beauties Alice, Emma, Laila and Yukiko! Bathe, feed and play with girls, create and decorate amazing baby crib, and dress up little girls with amazing clothes from the newest baby clothes collection! Every cute little girl in this game invites kids and toddlers to play baby care, crib decoration and dress up. 12 mini games with kids favorite baby girls will help kids learn to share and take care of others. Perfect game for kids and toddlers who have little sisters or brothers! **FEATURES** ALICE Baby Care Sweet baby girl Alice just loves bathing! Wash her blond baby hair with kids shampoo, dry with a fluffy towel and calm her skin with baby oil! Comb Alice’s hair and dress her for baby lunch. Mix fruits and make baby food for Alice. Warm up some milk and sing her your favorite lullaby before she goes to sleep! Crib Decoration Create the most amazing baby bed for Alice! Add the cutest curtains, toys and blankets. Little Alice will sleep like a real princess! Dress Up Sweet baby girl Alice also loves fashion makeovers! Play baby stylist and choose from the most adorable baby clothes in 12 categories! EMMA Baby Care Lovely little Emma loves popping soap bubbles! Play Mommy’s little helper and give her a baby bath. When she’s fresh and clean, it’s dinner time! Make Emma a healthy baby meal and give her a milk bottle before sleep. Kiss her on a cheek and wish Emma sweet dreams! Crib Decoration Emma wants to sleep in a super girly bed. Make her dream come true – use your fantasy and create the most girlish baby bed! Dress Up Match new clothes to Emma’s red hair! Baby leggings, kids pajamas, t-shirts, socks, hair bands, winter snowsuits, shoes, mittens, hats, baby pacifiers and toddler toys - you will find everything you need to dress Emma in style! LAILA Baby Care Change her diaper and give Laila a fantastic bubble bath! When baby bath time is over, make Laila a delicious fruit puree from apples and bananas. If little Laila is still hungry, feed her with warm milk from the bottle. Clean up Laila after she has her baby food and let her take a nice nap in a baby crib! Crib Decoration Laila just got a brand new baby crib. Decorate it with her favorite toys, choose the cutest blanket, hang lovely crib curtains and add a comfy mattress! Dress Up Laila is a super fashionable baby. Dress up Laila with your favorite clothes from the newest baby fashion collection that match her thick curly hair! YUKIKO Baby Care Oh no, little Yukiko is crying! Take care of her and make Yukiko happy again! Clean up and bathe this sweet baby girl, pop soap bubbles together and cuddle her in a soft towel. Feed her with yummy baby food and wait until she falls asleep in her little cute crib! Crib Decoration Yukiko wants you to decorate her baby crib. Free your imagination and create the most beautiful baby crib! Dress Up Choose from dozens of new baby clothes, shoes and accessories, dress up sweet toddler Yukiko and create her a perfect new style! WHAT’S INSIDE - Take care of 4 different baby girls: Alice, Emma, Laila and Yukiko! - Dress up girls with clothes from the newest baby fashion collection! - Learn to bathe, dress up, feed and put the baby into your decorated bed! - Restart the game and spend daycare time with your favorite sweet baby girl everyday! - Let your kids and toddlers learn about personal hygiene and taking care of others! - Easy gameplay even for the smallest kids and toddlers! Discover more fun with TutoTOONS! Play our games: http://tutotoons.com/apps Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TutoTOONSGames Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tutotoonsgames Get our newsletter: http://ow.ly/HlYbn

Hey kids, it’s baby daycare time! Bathe, dress up, feed and play with the sweet baby girl in her beautiful pink and purple nursery room. Play Mommy and learn how to take care of the little baby. Don’t let the adorable baby girl cry! WHAT’S INSIDE • Play more than 20 mini games and tasks! • Take care of the the baby girl in 4 different locations: Baby Bed, Baby Bath, Nursery and Kitchen! • Learn to bathe, dress up, feed and put a baby to sleep! • Restart the game and spend daycare time with the sweet baby girl everyday! FEATURES • Tap correct object and find out why baby girl is unhappy! • Your baby is dirty – give her a baby bath! • Wash the soft yeallow baby hair with Baby Shampoo! • Give baby girl a sponge bath and play with soap bubbles! • Dry the wet baby with a soft towel and put some Baby Oil! • Comb baby’s hair and dress the baby in sweet and girly style! • Your baby likes fruit puree – mash apples and bananas to make some! • Feed the baby and make her happy! • Mix Baby Milk powder with warm water and give the sweet baby girl some warm milk! • Give baby girl a kiss and cover with her favorite blanket before sleep! • Complete all tasks so that the happy baby could fall asleep!

Get your doctor tools, take care of the kids and make them happy again! One of the best girls games! wild bouncing balls and separate them with moving walls! description: Bunco is a popular dice game dating back to the late 1800's. Traditionally played in a party format of 12 people where alcoholic beverages are served, players roll the dice to try to get matching numbers. Now you can get your Bunco fix until the next party. iHeartBunco simulates a game of Bunco. You can play with either 2, 3, or 4 computer controlled players. You can choose to roll with 3, 4, or 5 dice. Just touch the dice shaker shaker, shake it up a bit and release! Alcoholic beverages not included. :-)
release_text: 1.2.1 Fixed layout issues 1.2.0 Made it work better on larger devices like HGL3 1.1.3 Made it work better with the new OS 1.1.2 Misc fixes 1.1.1: Fixed sometimes not stopping automatically when a player reaches 21. 1.1.0: Fixed Play button not always showing.

description: 'Tis one of the most popular solitaires ever! In this classic card game, you will be given a deck of 52 standard playing cards, and your task is to move all cards to 4 foundations at the top right corner by suit from A to K. The game starts with 7 tableau piles containing an ascending number of downturned cards from left to right. 1 upturned card is dealt to the top of each tableau pile, then 3 upturned cards will be dealt to the discard pile and the remaining downturned cards become the stock pile, which is placed at the top left corner next to the discard pile. The four foundations will be left empty. Before moving to the foundations, the cards can be temporarily placed on the tableau piles. The topmost card on the discard pile can be moved to a tableau pile if the topmost card on the tableau pile is in alternate color and an immediately higher ranking, for example, the 6 of spades can be moved to the top of the 7 of hearts or the 7 of diamonds. You may also move groups of cards among the tableau piles according to this rule and reveal the remaining downturned cards on them. Only a K or a group starts with a K can fill the position of an empty tableau pile. If the cards on the discard pile cannot be moved, click the stock pile to deal new cards. Click to redeal when all cards in the stock pile are dealt. If you cannot make any moves, you may click the Give Up button at the bottom right corner to quit. The time you have spent and your current score are displayed at the bottom left corner. The faster you finish the game, the higher the time bonus, so complete your task as quickly as possible!

Can you accomplish the task given by the Pharaoh? Your goal in this game is to remove all cards on the pyramid by pairing the cards which give a sum of 13 points regardless of their suits. The rankings of the cards are as follows: J has 11 points, Q has 12 points, K has 13 points, A has 1 point, and the remaining cards carry points according to their numbers, for example, a 7 carries 7 points. When the game opens, 28 upturned cards are distributed into 7 rows in the shape of a pyramid. 1 upturned card is dealt to the discard pile under the pyramid, while the remaining downturned cards are put to the left of the discard pile as the stock pile. You can click to remove any pair of cards on the pyramid or the discard pile that gives the sum of 13, for example A and Q, 10 and 3, while a K can be removed by itself. Note that cards on the pyramid cannot be removed when other cards are placing on top of them. When no moves are available, click the stock pile and get a new card. Count your steps wisely, dismiss all cards and win the game!

Purge your enemy's naval forces and assert your authority in the sea! Your goal in this game is to sink the opponent's battleships by using torpedoes strategically. When the game starts, your 5 vessels will be placed in the area at the left-hand side, while those of the enemy are on the right. You can arrange the positions of your ships so that they will not be easily located by your rival. You may click the cross button on the right of a ship and drag the ship to a desired location, or click the reverse button on the left of the ship to place it upright. When you are satisfied with your arrangement, click the OK button on the top right of the play areas to begin the game, but bear in mind that your fleet can no longer be moved during the game process. You and the computer will then take turns to bomb each other's warships. The positions of your ships will be displayed to you, but those of the computer are not revealed. You need to deduce the precise locations of the enemy ships according to the directions of their attacks, then click a square in the enemy's play area to shoot. When a torpedo successfully hits an enemy craft, a part of the craft will be on fire. If the bomb misses, a water drop label will appear on the target, indicating the absence of enemy vessels. When all battleships of a side are hit and sunk, the game ends. Declare your victory by launching accurate attacks!

Are you able to use disordered letters to compose valid English words without checking the dictionary? In this game you will be given a set of scrambled letter tiles, and your goal is to rearrange them into valid words. You can click and drag the tiles to their suitable positions, then click the Submit button under the tiles to check if the word is correct. If the tiles form a valid word, you will be awarded a score based on the amount of time you have spent. If the word does not exist, 2000 points will be deducted. You may click the Hint button on the left of the Submit button to check the meaning of the hidden word, but you will lose 3000 points if you do so. The timer at the lower right corner will show the remaining time for the current question, and when time is up, you may no longer arrange the tiles and the answer will be shown. Accept the challenge of the classic word game now!

Boggle is one of the most liked word games. This Boggle clone brings the same basic concept to your Android phone or tablet. It includes two scoring systems: one that is similar to Boggle and the other that is similar to Scrabble or Words with Friends. The game's objective is to find as many words* as you can from adjoining letters within the game's time limit. The letters can run vertically, horizontally, diagonally, or "zigzag". The more words you find, the higher your score. Word ZigZag is the perfect travel game that will boggle your mind. When playing alone, a player selects the word by tapping the word's 1st letter and gliding his/her finger across the screen over each subsequent letter of the word. Once a word has been selected, the game will determine if it is a valid word*. When playing against friends, players use Word ZigZag as a traditional game board. Players write on paper the valid words that they find on the game board and compare their findings after the time limit. When a game is done, an alphabetical list of all of the valid words* in the game board will appear so the player can have the chance to see words he/she may have missed. Players can adjust many of the game settings: dimensions, time limit, the minimum number of letters a word needs before it is consider valid, etc. Unlike Boggle and many other boggle-like apps, the dimensions of the game board are not restricted to a square: 4x4, 5x5, 6x6. For example, players can adjust the letter grid so it is more rectangular: i.e. 4X6. *(Please note that this version only finds valid American English words.)
release_text: If you like the new features, please post positive feedback on the marketplace. -Added scoring. Users can select one of two scoring systems when starting a new game. The more words, the longer the words, the higher your score will be. -Users can now choose to limit valid words to be those that have 5 letters or more. -Improved letter selection so unwanted letters are not selected. -Improved overall performance. Thanks to all of the users who provided great feedback! Keep it coming!

description: Help your preschooler to write & draw with Magic Slate! Want to present your preschool kid the joy of using a slate minus the chalk dust? Magic Slate HD for Android Tablets is here to do just that. Magic Slate has been designed to look just like a regular slate, blackboard or chalkboard but with some cool effects and features. Magic Slate lets your preschool child draw and doodle just about anything he/she feels like and triggers your child’s imagination and creativity. This educational app will help your child learn alphabets, numbers, shapes, colors and lot more. Your kids can choose from several of colored chalk pieces and can have a lot of fun doodling around and learn in the process. If the “Black” board is getting too boring for your kids, we have a chalkboard background too. Magic Slate also lets you take a picture of your preschooler’s masterpiece to share with your friends and family. Magic Slate is the perfect app for children aged between 2 and 4 in preschool / Pre-K and kindergarten. So the next time you’re looking for a safe and hazard-free way to engage your little one, you know where to find it. This “Magic” Slate is sure to keep your toddler happily engrossed for hours! FAQ 1. Why does Magic Slate HD ask for Storage Permissions? Magic Slate HD allows you to take a screen capture of the slate and stores the images in the documents folder on your device. This App needs this permission for this feature to work. MAGIC SLATE IS OPTIMIZED TO WORK ON TABLETS THAT SUPPORT ADOBE AIR RUNTIME AND MINIMUM SCREEN RESOLUTION OF 1024x600.
release_text: Performance enhancement and minor bug fixes.

description: Magnetic Alphabet - The fun app for kids to learn Alphabet, Numbers & Shapes. Looking for a creative, colorful and fun way to teach your preschool kids ABC, numbers and shapes? Magnetic Alphabet might be just the thing for you. Magnetic Alphabet provides an experience that is very close to using a real magnetic board. In fact with features like interesting sound effects, customizable backgrounds and the ability to save your child’s creation as pictures, it gets better than the real thing! With Magnetic Alphabet, you and your little one can just swipe letters, numbers and some very interesting shapes, in and out of the “magnetic board”. We’ve got a whole bunch of magnets in bright colors that your preschooler will absolutely love. Want to teach your child a little math? This educational app has all your basic arithmetic symbols and numbers, which makes learning math a whole lot of fun. Go ahead and have some fun with the magnets. Move and rotate them around and even take a picture of your preschooler’s best creation to send to your friends. Key Features: • 87 magnets in 5 colors. • 7 interesting backgrounds to choose from. • Alphabets in both small and capital letters. • Numbers, arithmetic symbols and shapes to help your child count • Each magnet can be used as many times as you want. • Capture a screenshot of the board. • Life like experience with attractive visuals and sounds. Magnetic Alphabet is the perfect app for children aged between 2 and 4 in preschool / Pre-K and kindergarten. Now you don’t have to carry around a box of magnets or worry that your little one might swallow them! Download Magnetic Alphabet now and watch it ignite the creative spark in your kid’s mind and bring a smile to his/her face. FAQ 1. Why does Magnetic Alphabet ask for Storage Permissions? Magnetic Alphabet allows you to take a screen capture of the board and stores the images in the documents folder on your device. This App needs this permission for this feature to work. MAGNETIC ALPHABET IS OPTIMIZED TO WORK ON TABLETS THAT SUPPORT ADOBE AIR RUNTIME AND MINIMUM SCREEN RESOLUTION OF 1024x600.

description: CalculusGENIUS (formerly CalculusGenie) is the most engaging Calculus App yet. Calculus is actually very interesting and fun, if taught properly! We work with teachers who have decades of college teaching experience. They have seen it all ... So you don't have to! Combine this with ZeGenie's Interactive Learning Engine, and you have the best Calculus App yet! This App covers all the basis of Calculus I (Differential Calculus), with more advanced topics coming soon! Here are the topics: 1. Introduction 2. Limits 3. Derivatives I (Intro to Derivatives) 4. Derivatives II 5. Derivatives of Trigonometric Functions 6. Curve Sketching 7. Related Rates 8. Maximization and Minimization 9. Anti-Derivatives

Introducing the new generation of math learning apps powered by handwritten digit recognition. Handwritten input is the most natural for children, no more multiple choice questions or distraction through keyboard input. With our apps kids can better focus on tasks and get a chance to improve their handwriting. This app was designed to help children to learn and practice multiplication tables. The app features multiplication tables from 1 to 12. At first all problems are presented in a sorted order, later for better learning experience the order is switched to random. You can review where your math skills are weaker, this is especially great for parents who want to see where their child may need help and more practice.

description: Connect the dots to make squares. If you put the finishing line to a square, you win that square. Playing the game is quite easy, but winning is a definite challenge. You'll need skill to beat the computer, and will need strategy to think ahead. Have fun and good luck against the computer!

Selena now at Spa for her charm facial Makeover. It’s the party time to celebrate weekend with her friends. She needs fabulous face makeup to blink as a star. Why not you? Come on! And join with Selena to cheers up party.

1+C : BRAND NEW ADDICTION GAME ! Math Genius is always with you. You can do brain exercise on everywhere with 1+C! ----------------------------- [GAMEPLAY] : - Touch the gamemode and start playing ! - If Math operation and answer is true, Touch the "Tick (true)" button. - If Math operation and answer is not compatible, Touch the "Cross (false)" button. - In every question you have 3 seconds. - Arcade Mod : [*] No Time Limit. [*] If you make a wrong choose, game will finish. - Classic Mod : [*] 45 Seconds Time Limit. [*] Game is not finishing by wrong choose. [*] You must do less mistake. - SUPERBRAIN Mod : [*] 45 Seconds Time Limit. [*] If you make a mistake, game will end. [*] Game will start by 4 digit numbers. -----------------------------
