description: "Hurly-Burly" Zoo is a big mess again! How to play: To remove two similar animals click on the cell which is the intersection of two lines on which those animals are located. If the cell is the intersection of three or four animals, they also would be cleaned Four game modes are available: - Levels - 50 logical levels, the main target is to clear all field - Time Attack - check your reaction, how many levels you can finish before time ends - Arcade - each level has to be cleared by particular number of steps - Relax - time limited mode, but time is given for one level Hurly-Burly Zoo is a game for people of all ages. It will help child to train logical thinking and spatial vision. It will help adult to test your reaction and speed of thinking. Amazing graphics and charming soundtrack would not leave anyone indifferent))
release_text: 2.0.1 OpenSSl version fixed 2.0 New level pack added! More levels more fun

description: With the Laugh & Learn™ Shapes & Colors Music Show, babies are encouraged to learn about shapes and colors through interactions with engaging animations, sounds and sing along songs! Baby can tap or tilt the screen to set a learning world in motion! Designed for babies 6 months & up. Features: • Baby can tap or tilt the screen to interact with the on-screen shapes & colors. • Two levels of play to grow with baby: - In Level 1, tap the screen to hear the name of the shape or color - or - tilt the device to make the shapes bounce around the screen. - In Level two, tap the screen to hear the name of the shape or color, tilt the device to make the shapes slide across the screen or play the piano at the bottom of the screen. • Baby can dance along with five sung ditties and two sing along songs! • Teaches shapes, colors, first words and action/reaction. ================================================================================ We recommend parent and child joint media engagement. See our Media Viewing Tips at: http://www.fisher-price.com/en_US/playtime/keepinmind.html End User License Agreement: http://fpconnect.fisher-price.com/dssupdate/EULA/LaughLearn_GoogleEULA.html

1Quest is a roguelike, where you control a young adventurer who pursues an evil blood cult, after they abducts several children, including the princess of the kingdom! You got 7 days before he can start his evil ritual to summon an ancient demon from the sacrificing of the children. Each region of the realm contains some dangerous place where you can find various help and you can choose your own path to choose your rewards. But do not loose time, if you want to save all the children... Fight monsters, grab loot, become more powerful and save the children to prevent the blood cult to summon the demon. This version is a limited version of the full game, with only 4 levels of the Tower of Chaos mode, and without the Campaign. You can buy the full version here Key features: - Turn based RPG - Roguelike: Dying is fun! - 5 races - 18 Differents classes - More than 150 class abilities and spells for characters - More than 100 monsters - 20 Differents dungeons with specific rewards - Magic system based on spell schools and magic affinity for more diversity and replayability
release_text: New race: lizard folk New spells New monsters A some minor adjustments. Full patch notes: http://ratzngodz.fr/blog//index.php?pages/Patchnotes

description: Geografia z Bakusiami to niesamowicie wciągająca gra dla całej rodziny, doskonały sposób na naukę poprzez zabawę. Aplikacja swoją prostotą oraz barwną kolorystyką bez wątpienia podbije serce niejednego dziecka. Gra podzielona jest na 5 różnych gier: Flagi, Państwa, Miasta Europy, Miasta Polski oraz Województwa. Każda kategoria posiada poziom łatwy i trudny. Poziom łatwy pozostawia dłuższy czas odpowiedzi na pytanie. Poziom trudny przeznaczony jest dla bardziej doświadczonych graczy, który już poznali odpowiedzi. - gra Flagi, polega na dopasowaniu lub podaniu nazwy prezentowanej flagi, - gra Państwa polega na wskazaniu odpowiedniego państwa na konturowej mapie Europy, - gra Miasta Europy polega na wskazaniu miejsca położenia miejscowości na konturowej mapie Europy, - gra Miasta Polski polega na wskazaniu miejsca położenia miejscowości na mapie Polski, - w grze Województwa gracz ma za zadanie wskazanie odpowiedniego województwa na mapie Polski. Wszystkie wyniki dzieciaków trafiają do ogólnego rankingu gry, dzięki czemu będą mogły między sobą konkurować. Jest to niezastąpiona rozrywka połączona z nauką. Poznawanie flag, krajów i stolic nigdy nie było tak proste. To najlepszy wybór dla rodzica, który dba o rozwój intelektualny swojego dziecka. Gotowi podjąć wyzwanie? Świat geografii z Bakusiami zaprasza do wspólnej zabawy! Geography of Bakusiami is an incredibly addictive game for the whole family, a great way to learn through play. The application for its simplicity and vivid colors without a doubt conquer the heart of many a child. The game is divided into 5 different games: Flags, States, Cities of Europe, Polish Cities and provinces. Each category has a level of easy and difficult. Level easy to leave a long time to answer the question. Difficult level is designed for more experienced players who already know the answers. - Flags game is to fit or specify the name of the presented flag, - Your game is to point to the appropriate state contour map of Europe, - European City game consists in indicating the location of the village on a contour map of Europe, - Polish Town game consists in indicating the location of the town on the map Polish, - Region player in the game is to identify the appropriate province on the map Polish.   All kids go to the general ranking of the game, so you will be able to compete with each other. It is indispensable entertainment combined with science. Get flags, countries and capitals has never been so easy. This is the best choice for a parent who cares about their child's intellectual development.   Ready for the challenge? World geography of Bakusiami invites you to have fun!
release_text: - poprawiono punktację w trybie gry Państw oraz Województw - skorygowano kraje na mapie - skorygowano flagę Bośni i Hercegowiny

description: If you are ever in a survival situation where phone service is not an option, you can still use your phone to communicate over long distances with this app. The screen glows brightly when you touch it, the app also has a Morse code reference, along with two commonly used distress signals that you can activate with the push of one button.

This application can compose hairstyle and facial photos. You can enjoy comparing the composite results list screen. Usage is simple! You need only to adjust the position of the photo, then the app automatically composite. Kind of hair style is short hair, medium hair, long hair, arrangement hair. Since synthesis in the result list is displayed, you can compare variety of hairstyles at a glance. --- The free version has limited functionality. Free version limitations The ability to shoot the camera in the application. -You can use to synthesize a picture taken using the camera that view the guideline. The ability to save the results composed. -you can save your favorite hairstyles. --- ※To use this application, you need more than Android2.2 and Adobe AIR2.7. ※In some models, the hardware is faulty. So you can not be captured using the camera. Sorry, if you want to take a picture, please use a standard camera. Currently, as far as we know, these model can not use the capture feature of the camera. ・Galaxy S2 --- last update (version 1.2.1) ・Update Adobe AIR SDK 3.5 (version 1.2.0) ・Included Adobe AIR Runtime. (version 1.1.2) ・In Android version 3.2, fixed a bug the screen orientation is not a vertical orientation. ・In Android version 3.2, fixed a bug the screen orientation is not a vertical orientation. (version 1.1.1) ・Performance of result list improved substantially. (version 1.1.0) ・Performance improved substantially. (version 1.0.4) ・Fixed some bugs. (version 1.0.3) ・Added 8 hairstyle. (Long: No. 021 ~ 023, Medium: No. 022, Short: No. 021-024) ・Fixed some bugs. (version 1.0.2) ・Added button to adjust the rotation and zoom. ・The initial value of the zoom mode to fix the aspect ratio was changed to the locked state. ・Fixed a bug in the rotation features.

app_name: 草生えるｗｗ。スマホに住む謎の生物の育成ゲーム。
description: 「草はえるww」無料で不思議な育成ゲーム！ ある日スマホに送られてきた、一通のメール。 そのメールには、一匹の謎の生物が添付されていた！ アプリ上に表示される「w」を無限に食べ尽くすその生物、人畜無害なかわいいペットか、あるいは…？ 「w」をたくさん食べさせて、生物たちを育てよう！ 次々と増殖する仲間、立ちはだかる敵達、そんな日々の中でときに起こる奇妙な出来事。 その果てに待つ終末とは…！？ とってもゆるキャラな生物たちと過ごす、１ヶ月の物語。 顔文字風味のゆるキャラを、スマホの中で育てよう！ 無料のストーリー進行形育成ゲーム。 【操作説明】 ●画面上にある『w』ボタンをタップして「w（草）」をはやしてゆるキャラを育成しよう。 謎の生物がどんどんたべてくれるよ。 ●ステージを選ぶ アプリのアイコン風のイラストをタップすると≪ボスと戦う≫ことができる！ ボスとの戦闘で勝利すると新しいステージが解放されるぞ！ ●じゃまもの 各ステージには倒したボスが邪魔者として画面に乱入してきます。 アクション要素満載の鬼ごっこゲーム！ 「じゃまもの」を倒すと倒すのにかかった時間によって「w」がもらえます。 ●マンガ レベルアップするごとにマンガが読めるよ ●壁紙 ホーム画面の壁紙を好きなデザインに変更できるぞ！ ※ただいまtwitterでアプリを宣伝すると無料で壁紙がＧＥＴできる！ きもかわ壁紙でホーム画面が華やかに！ キャラクターをタップするといろんな反応を見せてくれます。 お気に入りのキャラクターを見つけよう！ 【wの説明】 wとは、笑いの度合い表す記号のようなもので、「wwwwww」のように、wの個数でどれぐらい面白かったか、どれぐらい気持ちが高揚しているかを柔軟に表現することが可能。ローマ字モードのまま入力する人が多いためか、全角を用いるのが一般的。 笑っていることを意味するwの元は（笑）という記号である。 ■掲載してもらったサイト AndRock http://androck.jp/app/game/casual/kusahaeruww/
release_text: ver1.0.4 画面が真白くなる場合がある不具合があったので修正しました。 ゲーム内容に一切変更ございません。

app_name: くっつき猫カフェ。ネコ店長の育成ゲーム
description: 猫がお客さんに”くっついて”癒す新感覚の動物無料育成ゲーム！ ネコが好きな方、ねこが中毒の方からそうでない方まで 一風変わった猫とのコミュニケーションしてみませんか？ ■次回アップデート情報（6月予定) ・猫とおもちゃで遊べる機能 ・カフェランクの上限を増加 ・店員の追加 ・漫画の追加 ・２階の増築 ●○●○●○●○ゲーム概要●○●○●○●○ どこかの国のどこかの街でひっそりと経営しているネコカフェ。 その猫カフェはなんと『ねこが店員』なのです。 出してくれるメニューもお会計も猫が全てやっています。 ●○●○●○●○ゲーム内容●○●○●○●○ ≪業務マニュアル（遊び方）≫ ①「お客さん」をタップしくっつきます 　　　　　　　　　↓ ②「お客さん」のハートのメーターがたまっていきます 　　　　　　　　　↓ ③ハートのメーターが満タンになったら「お客さん」が満足し帰っていきます 　　　　　　　　　↓ ④タップでお金を回収し、食器を片付けます（お金をタップすると食器は自動的に消えます） ≪体力≫ ・接客をしていくと体力が減ってしまいます ・『休憩部屋』に行くと体力が回復します ・「おやつ」をあげるとさらに早く体力回復します ≪ネコレベル≫ ・接客していくと「人数」に応じてネコレベルがアップして色々な『しぐさ』を覚えます。 ★『しぐさ』について ・しぐさはカフェで店内にいるお客さんすべてを一瞬で満足させることができます ・しぐさをすると体力が普通よりも多く減ってしまいます ≪カフェランク≫ ・接客していくと「人数」に応じてカフェランクが上がります ・ランクが上がると『マンガ』『ネコ店員』が増えていきます ★『ネコ店員』について ・ランクが上がっていくと猫が仲間になります（アップデートで増えていきます） ・うまくローテーションしお店を回していきましょう ★『マンガ』について ランクが上がるごとに１つの物語が増えていきます ≪ショップ≫ ・ねこの「おやつ」、「模様替えアイテム」、「席」、「増築」を購入することができます ★『席』について ・カフェ内の席数を増やすことができます（来店するお客さんの数が増えます） ★『増築』について ・お店を広くすることができます（階数が増えます） ～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～ 暇つぶしにもなる育成ゲーム。しかも無料でかわいいゆるキャラ風味のねこのキャラクターが出てきます。 もちろん動物が好きな方もそうですが、カフェの雰囲気や癒されたいという方、 漫画がよみたいけれど買うお金がない方にもとてもおすすめです。 ちょっと変わったアクションで見ているだけでも楽しめますので暇を持て余してる人にもおすすめです。 ～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～

app_name: 学校で触手を飼ってみた。育成ゲーム。
description: あなたは今日から「触手」の飼育係りになりました 無料で不思議。たまにグロくてキモカワな観察育成ゲーム！ キャラクターのきせかえ、アクションも楽しめる！ ハマる要素満載の暇つぶしゲームです。 【ストーリー】 ある日、ボクはワタシは道で（落ちてた）アイツと出会ってしまった。 そして学校の教室でアイツ・・・「触手」を飼育することになった。 ボクのワタシの学校生活は、これからどうなるのだろう。 【画面説明】 ■日誌 ・これまでの触手の成長過程を見ることが出来ます。 ■エサを集める ・連打タップでエサをたくさん集めて触手に食べさせよう！ ■お金を集める ・触手の成長が5日目に突入するとハンド君がもらえます。 　ハンド君を使ってアクションプレイ！お金をたくさん集めよう！ 　ショップでお買い物が出来るようになるよ。 ■売店 ・触手の成長に必要なスイソウが売られています。 （スイソウは触手が大きくなると色々な種類が買えるようになっていきます。） ・エサ2倍速（50個セット）を買うと普通のエサの倍の経験値を触手にあたえる事ができます。 ・バージョンアップしたハンド君を買えます。 （お金を集めることが、どんどん簡単になっていきます。便利です。） ・飼育担当の男の子、女の子アバターのきせかえアイテムが買えます。 （髪型、小物、衣装が買えます。） ■きせかえ ・好きな性別を選んで、自分好みにキャラクターをコーディネートしよう！ （飼育担当の子はプレイヤーのキミと一緒に触手の成長を見守る大切なパートナーです。） キミのためなら、どんなコーディネートも喜んで着てくれるよ。 ■スイソウ ・タッチするとスイソウの中がアップになって、のぞけるよ。 （触手の育成は主にコノ画面で行います。） 【触手の詳しい育成方法】 ～アクションが苦手なアナタにオススメの育て方～ 1.「エサを集めるボタン」で触手のエサをたくさん集めます。とってもシュールです。 　このモードでは3種類のエサを集める事が出来ます。それぞれ見た目以外の違いは 　ありませんので、連打タップしてたくさん集めましょう。 2.エサを集めたらホームに戻ってスイソウをタップしましょう。 　画面下に集めたエサが表示されています。触手に食べさせたいエサをタップしましょう。 　触手が元気に（キモかわいく）喜んでエサを食べてくれます。 これだけ。カンタン。 ～連続タップなんてメンドクサイ！アクションプレイしたい！！あなたにオススメの育て方～ 1.「お金を集めるボタン」で、お金をどんどん集めます。（ただしプレイできるのは触手が5回進化してからです。） 　お金を集めてくれるパートナー「ハンド君」を操作してお金を追いかけましょう。 2.お金を手に入れると売店（ショップ）でエサ2倍速（50個）が購入できます。 　エサ2倍速は通常のエサ1コの2倍分の価値があります。名前のとおりです。 3.　2倍速エサを買ったらホームに戻ってスイソウをタップしましょう。 　画面下に購入したエサが表示されています。タップしましょう。触手が元気に（グロかわいく）喜んでエサを食べてくれます。 どちらの飼育方法を選ぶかはアナタの自由です。 キモくてちょっとカワイイ、なぞの生き物「触手」。しかもグロイ。 育てるとコイツ・・・一体どうなっちゃうんでしょう・・・。 グロイのは苦手だけど・・・でもコワイもの見たさで、つい見ちゃう！！ そして夜に眠れなくなる・・・。ドジっこ天然なアナタに特にオススメします。 グロとかキモイのとか全然こわくねーし！オレ大丈夫だし！！ むしろこんなのカワイクね？そんなアナタにも特にオススメします。 ボクもワタシも大人も触手も なんだかよくわからないケド、クセになるヘンテコゲーム。 androckさんに掲載してもらいました http://androck.jp/app/game/casual/gakkoudeshokushuwokattemita/

description: Play Blackjack 21 Game. Double down, split pairs, get insurance, achieve 21 points and make tons of money. Unlock extra tables to play another great blackjack game. This Blackjack Game is a fun, smart and classic card game. The objective of this Blackjack Game is very simple. You must achieve a number that is greater than the dealers hand, but be careful. Don't exceed 21. Blackjack Game features: * Place your bets 5 to 200 * Play multiple boxes * An ace counts as 1 or 11 * The jack, queen and king are valued as 10 * The cards 2 to 10 are valued at their face value * Dealer takes cards until his total is 17 or greater * Dealer busts when he exceeds 21 * Player busts when he or she exceeds 21 * Double down at 9, 10 or 11 * Split cards of the same value Ready to play the best Blackjack Game? Place your bets!

Your are the only soldier that stands in the way of the enemy and your base. Camp out and snipe the enemy soldiers as they charge your bases. Each kill earns you cash which you can use to upgrade your weapon, call in support, and repair the base. You will be faced off against soldiers carrying grenades, automatic weapons, even trucks and tanks fully equipped with lots of fire power. Build fences, add soldiers to your base, throw grenades and call in air strikes. Hold your ground at each base for 10 days and you will get your chance to move to the next base. Hold off the enemy and save all your bases and you will become a national hero!

Play this game featuring Thumbelina. Once upon a time there was a little girl. She emerged from a flower and sleeps in a walnut-shell cradle, covered with a blanket of rose leaves. Her name is Thumbelina and her mother loves her very much. On night a frog jumps through the window and he carries away Thumbelina as a bride for his son. The frog puts her on a lily pad so that she can't escape, but her friends, the fish, gnaw through the stalk and a butterfly draws her away over the water, so that the frog can't catch her anymore. Then a stag beetle arrives: he wants to marry Thumbelina, too! He takes her with him, but his friends at home think Thumbelina is a strange creature. "She only has two legs!" That's why he discards Thumbelina in the woods, where she eats nectar from the flowers and the birds sing for her. But then winter comes and the cold arrives: all the birds fly south and all the flowers wither. Thumbelina is feeling very cold and she almost freezes to death. Fortunately a swallow asks if she wants to come with him, sitting on his back, to the sunny south. Thumbelina would love to come along with him, so she flies away with the swallow. When they've arrived in the south, the swallow puts her on a beautiful white flower, in a huge flower field. Thumbelina decides to have a look around and on another flower she sees a handsome boy standing. He's just as tall as she but he wears a crown and has wings! The boy is the flower-fairy prince and when he sees Thumbelina, he immediately falls in love with her. Thumbelina and the prince get married and she also gets a crown and a beautiful pair of white wings. Now she can also fly from flower to flower! In this game you can read the entire story.

Kids Academy · ABC Alphabet Phonics best educational app where Baby Toddlers Preschool and Kindergarten children learn English through Montessori play activities: tracing, crosswords, sounds, vocabulary, song, letter spelling blocks, flash cards games Get the Ultimate Alphabet Workbook for Kids! Learning ABCs has never been more fun! The app turns the learning process into what kids love most - a game! HIGHLIGHTS * Left hand and right hand modes of ABC letter formation * Delightful animations to help your children learn alphabet, letters and words in a fun and engaging way * 26 animated flashcards to teach your kids letters and words * 52 flashcard worksheets to teach your children to trace letters * Funny, bright, and creative artwork * Uppercase and lowercase letters, sounds and phonics * Specially designed Parents Area to track your children's progress * Create and edit multiple user profiles * Aligned to Kindergarten Reading Foundation skills of Common Core Standards * Your children can interact with the app at their own pace Set the stage for reading and writing success with this delightfully interactive educational app! Kids will have a blast learning alphabet with Montessori ABC for Kids! PRESS ABOUT US Featured by The Guardian Designed for ages two through five, Montessori ABC for Kids combines the enjoyment of cartoon animations and a simple to use touch interface to help kids learn the alphabet. / AppAdvice.com Montessori ABC for Kids features over 100 different animations corresponding to letters of the alphabet. The illustrations are very clean and help reinforce sounds and words to the respective letters. / Kids Games Club #1 App in Category: Pre-Reading, Vocabulary. / iHeartThisApp

app_name: みんなの名刺ーフルカラー名刺＆カード印刷サービス
description: シンプルなビジネス名刺はもちろん、パーソナルカード、オリジナルトレカ、ペット名刺、ママ友名刺、コスプレ名刺など、シチュエーションに応じたお好みの名刺（カード）を作成＆即ご注文できるアプリです。 　撮影した写真に文字を入れてその場でご注文完了！外出先や旅先でも簡単にご注文いただけます。 　高品質オンデマンド印刷機による名刺印刷に光沢コーティングを施したハイグレード印刷ですので、一般的な名刺より目立つこと間違いなし！しかも最短当日出荷の超スピードでお届け致します。 　詳しくはサポートサイトをご参照下さい。 ※お使いの機種によっては、正常に動作しない場合がございます。また、一部機能に制限が出る可能性がございます。 ※動作を安定させるために、できるだけ他のアプリを終了させた上でご利用下さい。 ※名刺の作成及びご注文には通信環境が必要となります。（Wi-Fi又はLTE推奨） 【名刺印刷料金について】 　○１パック４０枚　８４０円（税・送料込み） 　　　※４０枚の内訳は自由に組み合わせできます。 　○お支払い方法 　　・クレジットカード 　　　（VISA、JCB、Master、AMEX、Dinersなど） 　　・キャリア決済 　　　（ソフトバンク・ａｕ・docomo） 　　・代金引換（佐川急便e-コレクト） 　　　　※代金引換の場合、別途手数料が３１５円加算されます。 ＜安　心＞ 　弊社はプライバシーマーク付与事業者です。大切な個人情報の保護強化・安全管理を徹底致しておりますので、安心してご注文いただけます。 ＜簡　単＞ 　デザインテンプレートを選び、必要な情報を入力いただくと、実際の名刺印刷と同様の仕上がり見本が表示されますので、簡単に作業が進められます。 ＜安　い＞ 　高品質なフルカラー名刺（カード）が１パック４０枚で８４０円（税込）で印刷できます。 　日本全国【送料無料！】　印刷料金２，０００円以上で代引手数料も無料になります。 ＜早　い＞ 　平日の１７時までのご注文分なら【当日発送】いたしますので、最短で翌日には名刺をお届け可能です。 （お届け先によりお届けに必要な日数が異なります。詳しくはサポートサイトをご確認下さい。） ＜バラエティー色々＞ 　１パック４０枚の中身は、１種４０枚でも４０種各１枚でもＯＫですので、違ったデザインや用途の名刺を必要なだけご注文いただけます。 ＜用途の色々＞ 　アプリ内のカメラ機能や写真ライブラリーを使って、簡単にキレイな写真入り名刺が作成できます。 　ちょっとしたグリーティングカードやご挨拶カードとして、また、トレカ風デザインを使えば、簡単にオリジナルチームトレカも作れます。 ＜キレイ＞ 　名刺の印刷は最新のオンデマンド印刷機ゼロックスColor C75 Pressを使用し、キレイ感がアップする光沢コーティングを施したハイグレード印刷です。 ＜選べる２サイズ＞ 　一般的な名刺サイズのレギュラーカード（９１×５５ｍｍ）と、お財布に入れやすいサイズのスモールカード（８５×５１ｍｍ）の2種類をご用意。 　用途に合わせてお選び頂けます。 ＜連　携＞ 　標準の写真ライブラリーから画像を取り込むことができますので、ファイル共有アプリや画像変種アプリなどで連携すれば、 　PCやAndroid端末等で編集した画像を使うことも可能です。 こんな使い方も！ 　○少年野球チームでオリジナルトレカを作成！ 　　　みんなの名刺なら、その場で写真撮影＆編集できますので、簡単にカッコイイトレカが作れます。 　○引越のご挨拶に 　　　ご家族の写真とご挨拶を入れて、お引越の挨拶カードに。 　○招待状やグリーティングカードに 　　　X'masパーティーの招待状や、お誕生日会のご案内カードとして。 　○ペット名刺や趣味の名刺で楽しく 　　　愛犬はもちろん、趣味のクルマや釣りなど、色々なパーソナルカードとしても。 　使い方は無限大！ 　各テンプレートには、それぞれジャンルが設定されておりますが、使い方は自由です。色々な使い方をお試し下さい！ 　今後も発展します！ 　まだまだ分かり難い点や、使い難い点がありますが、どんどんブラッシュアップ＆機能強化を予定していますので、ご意見・ご要望などお気軽にサポートページまでお寄せ下さい。

description: Personal Finance Manager Lite is an easy to use practical App to manage your day to day incomes and expenses. The reports are easy to understand, instantaneous and beautiful with deep financial insight. It has an exciting Award Winning Dashboard as well. Become "smart" by managing your finances right on your "smartphone", Analyze and take informed decisions with the help of charts. Keep track of all your transactions, App will do the book keeping and also you can export/import the data! You can add transactions easily and categorize them quickly, it is also possible to modify or delete them later. Both Free and Paid Versions of the App are always Ad-free. All the data is saved on your phone. You can lock the data with a personal PIN password. The reason i wrote this App is because I wanted a simple and lovely App which helps me to keep track of all my incomes and expenses and show me simple, clean and instantaneous current status and also i should be able to see the past data, both Quantitatively and the Trend of my incomes and expenditures. I designed the Dashboard which exactly tells me this information. I have made sure to give total control over the duration to observe/analyze the data, because a picture is worth a thousand words! For me Ads is a BIG NO, so i have not given any Ads for both Free and Paid versions of the App even if it could have helped me financially, In fact i seriously have the opinion that Financial Apps which maintains your data locally should be secure and not connect to Internet(unless it needs to get latest information something like stock market data) so i have made sure this App does not need to connect to the INTERNET. Currently the App maintains a Single Account with Single Currency. It captures the necessary and critical information while you are adding the transaction. I have tried to keep the interface as simple as possible. This product has evolved over many iterations of careful design, planning and testing stages. Still many new features are planned in the road-map, please give your feedback and feature requests to keep encouraging us! Features(and their availability in Free-F and Paid-P flavors): - Ad-Free (both in Free & Paid) - Add, Modify or Delete Income and Expense Transactions (both in F & P) - Assign categories and sub-categories (both in F & P) - Award Winning Dashboard, shows transactions Quantitatively and with Trend (both in F & P) - Drill/Dig through your Categories to Sub Categories with their trend (both in F & P) - Balance Summary and Classic views (both in F & P) - Search for transactions in their description text (both in F & P) - Quickly try out the app by installing sample data, there is option to delete as well (both in F & P) - Contextual Help on every screen (both in F & P) - Manage categories by adding new Categories or Sub Categories (Only Paid) - Backup and Restore feature: (Only Paid) - Change the look and feel of the App by customizing the App color (Only Paid) - Add Recurring Transactions (Only Paid) - Lock Feature (Only Paid) - Instantaneous Charts for Day, Week, Month, Year and Custom Durations (both in F & P) Permissions: Storage: Reason export/import file for Backup (Only in Paid App) No Permission is required for Free App since Export/Import is disabled.(For Free App) Needs latest Adobe AIR. Pls Note: For a pleasant and exciting experience of the App: We would recommend a minimum screen size of 480x800 and with a 1GHz processor. Tested on Samsung Galaxy S & S3 it works like a charm!. The App can be used as a finance manager, expense manager, finance management, expense tracker, money manager, savings tracker, saving, finance, personal finance, personal money, spending tracker, daily expense, income tracker, mobile banking, expense log, household finance, financial planner, accounting software, cash register, organizer, money, saver, easy money, pocket money, book keeping, mobile expense tracker, mobile money, daily expense tracking and more!

description: It is time to colour interesting racing cars. Both educational and enjoyable game is designed for both adults and children. Fabulous racing cars,fast and furious race cars, concept cars, modified cars, driver vehicles, sport cars are waiting for you to be coloured. Let's finish your homework and run to your colourful fantasy world with Racing Cars Coloring game. It's very important for a coloring game to be functional. In Classical Cars game,there are detailed colour palette, functional eraser, sharing button and changing the picture selections. Painting games help children's colour and mental development and learning the objects. Our request from parents is to direct their children to paint both on paper to develop their mental-muscle coordination. General Qualities of the game; - Useful theme concept - Paint with brush - Paint with pencil - Resizing pencil, eraser and brush - Undo or forward the paintings - Detailed colour selection from the palette - Eraser function - Erasing whole screen function - Sharing the coloured picture on social web - Saving pictures in gallery - Zooming out or in paintings

The Farm is one of Gizmo's favorite places to be. It's autumn season and now is the perfect time to gather all the farm's fruits and vegetables. Help Gizmo drive his powerful tractor over all kinds of obstacles and gather all the apples in his way. Do your best to get a three star rating on all the levels and finish the game in the fastest time possible. Control your tractor as good as you can by pressing the arrow keys and use the nitro only when you have full control of your motor. A fun and challenging tractor racing game, fun for kids of all ages. We hope you enjoy it!

description: Improve your multiplication skills by saving trophies from certain destruction! Compete versus other players for highest score or challenge them online. Gain XP by gathering cherries or collect trophy tokens and use them to fill your trophy case. It's an old legend that who finish the jewels trick will gain all the jewels and become rich! This is a simple, yet quite polished and fun match-3 puzzle game, which is still addicting as ever! Do try it out! Find the same jewels around as soon as you can ,and switch to line no less than 3 of them to clear. developer: Media Applications Technologies for the BBC
description: BBC Media Player works with BBC websites and applications to provide video and audio playback on your Android device. Once you have downloaded this application, continue to use your favourite BBC websites and apps on your Android device as normal. Whenever you play any video or audio the BBC Media Player will launch and handle playback of the content. Permissions ----------- You may notice that when you install the app it asks you for permission to access your phone's network communication, phone calls, and system tools. These are standard Android app permissions that are defined by the Google Android platform. The 3 permissions the BBC Media Player app asks to use are: • Network Communication - full internet access. Granting this permission provides the BBC Media Player app with access to the internet so it can play programmes. • System tools - preventing phone from sleeping, retrieve running applications. Granting this permission provides the BBC Media Player app with the ability to prevent the phone going to sleep when you are watching a programme. • Phone Calls - read phone state and identity (Android Honeycomb and below only). Granting this permission provides the BBC Media Player app with phone communication status and notifies the application if the phone rings or a phone call is in progress. We only use this permission to ensure that the BBC Media Player pauses if you receive a phone call and temporarily reduces its audio when you receive a text message or other notification while watching a programme. The BBC Media Player app does not access or store any personal information, phone numbers or IMEI numbers.
release_text: In this update: - We no longer require the Phone Calls permission - Improved handling of cross-device pause and resume in BBC iPlayer - Other bug fixes and stability improvements

Classic arcade action with fresh visuals! NOTE: This game is still very much a work in progress! See the bottom of this description for planned future releases! This is the ad free version of Missile Defense. Find the ad supported, free version in the Android Market. Take the reigns as Supreme Commander of your military forces, tasked with holding off the complete and utter destruction of your planet. As the last line of defense, you must defend the planet from endless waves of missiles that steadily increase in numbers and speed. Tap the screen to trigger explosions in front of inbound missiles in order to destroy them before they destroy the 3 major population centers located on the surface of the planet. Press your device's option button for options and to pause the game. You can also press the back button in order to pause. This game is based off of open source code and is still a work in progress. If you're interested in seeing the code to Missile Defense, would just like to suggest a feature, or just report a bug, send me an email at antiwiggin@gmail.com Planned updates for future releases: -Change sound effects -Tweak/Change planetary explosions -Add high score menu -Implement upgrade system -Make user able to select level to start from

description: ADD / ADHD: Keeping on Track If you need help with staying on task this app will do the trick. ADD / ADHD :Keeping on track is a short - term reminder system. The app is designed to help those with ADD / ADHD to focus on the task at hand. ADD / ADHD: Keeping on Track allows the user to set verbal reminders and notifications on their android powered device. Using ADD / ADHD: Keeping on Track is simple and straightforward. 1. Add your desired reminder. This is the reminder that will be played or spoken to you. 2. In the Repeat Every field, set the interval at which you wish to receive your notification. (Ex. If you set to 5 minutes, you will receive your notification every 5 minutes) . 3. Set your End time in the End After field. Your notification will stop once the End After time is complete. 4. The options field contains your choice of what type of notification you wish to receive. Turning the voice option on allows your device to speak the notification to you. Vibration supported devices can use the vibrate setting. By turning on the notification sound, you will receive an alert with your notification. 5. Press the test button to test your current settings. If everything is satisfactory, press start. 6. You can pause your notification by pressing the pause button. THIS ONLY PAUSES THE NOTIFICATIONS AND NOT THE END TIME. You can press the stop button at any time to stop your notification.

description: Smart BT - Auto Bluetooth will help you to save battery. Automatically enable and disable bluetooth according to the rules that you will set. You can forget about to turn on your bluetooth every time you will sit in your car. Setup rules using Smart BT and let it enable automatically your bluetooth. # Managed by calls: Turns on bluetooth upon incoming and outgoing calls. Turns off Bluetooth when call ends # Managed by shake: It allows you to turn on or off the bluetooth shaking the phone. Handy in case you need bluetooth in moments that are not managed by the rules you have set. # Managed by timers: It allows you to set one or more periods of the day in which Smart BT will automatically turn on and off bluetooth. If it is also active "Auto bluetooth upon calls" then Smart BT - Auto Bluetooth will manage bluetooth upon incoming and outgoing calls but only during the timers you set. # Managed by SMS: If enabled, when you receive a text message, you will see a notification in the status bar and if it is accepted Smart BT will wait up to 15 seconds for a bluetooth connection. If an connecction is established the SMS will be read over bluetooth device. If there arent available devices then SMS will be read using phone speakers. You can set shake SMS re-repeat. NOTE: To read the SMS, Smart BT uses Google output synthesis (Text-to-Speech). Available settings: - Delay Bluetooth turning off - Say caller name - Set speakers volume for caller name or read sms - Auto answer incoming calls. You can choose how many seconds Smart BT have to wait before to auto answer. - Auto answer to any calls or only for choosen contacts - Shake to re-read sms - Sticky icon - to know when smart bt is enable and what it is managing - Status bar bluetooth notifications - Toast bluetooth notifications - Main page info - info to let you know what Smart BT is managing Available Languages: English (default), Italian Your devices must be paired with your phone to let auto bluetooth connect to them

‘Relax Lights’ has been updated with a reinvented graphic style. Now the app has a new stylish “easy access” theme that allows you to use all the features in few taps. ‘Relax Lights’ is offers useful functions for your Android device: a complete alarm feature, Relax lights projectors, Music player and Widgets. Let’s see the ‘Relax Lights’ features: - Alarm: 1) Easy alarm setup. 2) Set the date / time and repeat modes. 3) Set Multiple alarms. 4) Snooze function, daily and weekly alarm repetition. 5) Name your alarm. 6) Choose from over 10 alarms or music on your phone (Fade in volume). 7) The alarm remains active even with the application closed 8) Repeat the alarm until the cancellation of the notification. - Function Relax: 1) Light up your room with beautiful colors. 2) Take a relaxing break in 5 minutes. 3) Manage and activate the alarm with many soothing sounds and fashionable. 4) Listen to your own music. 5) Listen to soothing sounds. - Clock Widget: 1) Selection between 3 styles of clock. 2) Can be selected directly from the list of Android widgets. 3) Clicking on the clock application opens.

The Holy Rosary that automatically selects the mysteries by day with beautiful illustrations that accompany prayer. In the application there are also the main Christian prayers. If you have problems with the installation, try to temporarily remove the SD card (go to: Settings \ Storage \ Unmount SD card, then install the app, then mount SD card again). 1.86 ★ Fixed problem that crashed the application on some devices ★ Added the passages of the Bible in audio format 1.81 ★ The Holy Rosary in FRENCH and MALAY language ★ Litany in Latin (John Paul II) for English and Spanish version ★ added options: "Hide button "Next" and "Back"(forward with TAP on the screen)" and "Close the applications at the end of the play audio" 1.80 ★ Energy saving complete!!! ★ complete revision 1.66 + Pauses audio recitation if you receive a call + new prayer item: "LAST PRAYERS ADDED" - "Energy savings during audio recitation"-> default - other important changes 1.57 - Added recognition of Christmas Day (recitation of the joyful mysteries) 1.56 + THE HOLY ROSARY -> AUDIO RECITATION - centered prayers label 1.53 + Double vibration when it comes to large beads of Glory 1.52 - Fixed the mysteries titles of the Holy Rosary - Enabling, "Energy savings during audio recitation" 1.50 + Anima Christi (Latin, Italian, English and Spanish) - Added option "Energy savings during audio recitation" 1.48 - Added the possibility, in the options, to significantly enlarge the rosary beads - Fix restart of the Rosary 1.45 + Litaniæ Lauretanæ e Symbolum Apostolorum 1.44 - Increased further the length of the "long vibration" - Fixed the incorrect display of filenames when downloading 1.41 + Angelus, Regina Coeli, Benedictus and Magnificat in Latin 1.30 - Complete overhaul with imported changes - changed image information - at the end of the rosary is now possible to continue the recitation of the mysteries - increased the size of buttons "Next" and "Back" on TAP, and increased transparency buttons - increased the duration of the vibration on buttons TAP 1.28 - The Holy Rosary translated into Spanish 1.17 - Added items "No standby screen" and "Add motion effect on Mysteries" in the "Customize" menu 1.16 - New prayers 1.15 - New prayers - Other changes to the code and prayers 1.14 - improved some images of the mysteries and the alignment of the grains 1.10 - The Holy Rosary -> full translation in English - added new prayers

A simple set of emissivity tables for anyone performing infra-red temperature measurements or Infrared Thermography. A very handy tool for anyone with a FLIR, Fluke or other infrared camera/thermometer. When you need to adjust with an emissivity value- simply open the quick launch app and look up the value. No internet connection is required. You can also search for a material by typing in the first letters of the material type- the app will begin filtering results immediately. Your reports will be more accurate than ever when adjusted with the correct value. Home, business, equipment, roof, mould and other inspections all need adjustment, but not all imagers have the correct value pre-installed. Virtually all infrared camera (and some infrared thermometers) allow for manual emissivity adjustment; simply input the number and continue with your inspection. Take your inspections to a more professional level by compensating each and every one of your images. Your customers will thank you.
release_text: This application has undergone a complete re-design in version 3.0. You can now search for generic values or very specific values. Specific values are separated in two groups- Metals vs Non-Metals. All materials can be filtered by typing the name of the substance you seek- results will filter automatically. Users/comments: Thanks for the feedback Yann, Nancy, Senkusha. Thanks to you the entire application was rebuilt. The tables were completely abandoned in favor of the new interface.

description: OSCE Cardiac Examination Checklist is a free and simple to use program to ensure a complete and thorough cardiac examination. Great for Medical students, and those who examine them. Instructions: 1. When your examinee is ready, press the "Start Examination Button" 2. When you observe your examinee perform the relevant task, simply click the checkbox 3. When your examinee has indicated the conclusion of the examination, click the "Finish Examination" button. 4. Simply scroll up and report back what was missed! I hope you find this program useful! I welcome and suggestions or improvements. Includes content from Talley and O'Connor, Oxford Handbook of Clinical medicine, and a (small) pinch of experience!

description: Old Time Radio Shows OTR FlashOTR provides access to ALL shows in the our database. NO extra charges. The oldtime radio era, sometimes referred to as the Golden Age of Radio, refers to a period of radio programming in the United States lasting from the early 1920s until the 1950s, when television superseded radio as the medium of choice for programming and radio shifted to playing popular music. During this period, when radio was dominant and filled with a variety of formats and genres, people regularly tuned into their favorite radio programs. Now with FlashOTR, we can do that again. If you dont see it, let us know and we will try to ad it to the database.

Write and listen is an educational app that lets you feel what we write. This application can be used in many ways. It may be useful for those who are unable to speak, can then use the device to communicate, for children who want to learn to write and can then listen to what you have written, it can be helpful to anyone who wants to listen to the pronunciation of a word in different languages. This is possible because the app you can change the language in which the word is read, there are languages Italian, English, French, Spanish, German, Dutch, Czech, Polish with different pronunciations depending on the country selected. "Write and read", "write, and repeat", "write and listen", "Show and repeats" is an informative and allows you to store the text written so that you can select and repeat words or phrases recorded at any time. This application can be considered also as an educational game for children, who enjoy writing letters of the alphabet, numbers, words, phrases and listen to what they have posted. The app is very easy to use and very intuitive buttons. With this simple voice synthesizer Android you can say anything to our Android motor TTS (text-to-speech). Attention! The synthesizer's voice is the same as that installed on your phone and you cannot change it, so avoid negative reviews due to this! For any problem, advice or information about your application, you can email me via email, I'll be happy to answer you, thank you.

This app is a must have for everyday use. It allows you to take pictures of yourself, your loved one, your baby or anybody or anything you choose at a time interval and watch them on your screen at a fast pace. You can take a picture of yourself every day all-year and then replay the images all at once. Photos taken are played in sequence regardless of your usual use of your camera outside this app. You can replay pictures manually or as a slideshow. You can also adjust the playback speed. When you take a picture it allows you to accept or reject the image taken. Once accepted it gets stored in a database in your phone independent of your photo gallery, so you can always watch your images in the sequence they were taken. You can also review them in the gallery. Some phones need to be powered off then restarted to move pictures into gallery. To see pictures in full quality, we recommend that you review them on your computer monitor after you sync your device. Since screen sizes differ there is an option to correct for different displays. The picture quality is that of the device. If you uninstall the program and re-install it you will start a new series of pictures. You will not lose your old series. It will remain on your phone. We strongly recommend to always back-up your photos to a computer however. Disclaimer: The developer is not liable for any lost images. Always backup your phone or tablet to a PC.

Mobile GIS Barcode Scanner developed exclusively for the latest Trimble GNSS handhelds. Compatibility: - Trimble GeoExplorer Geo 7X - Trimble GeoExplorer Geo 6000 - Trimble Juno 3B/3D + Trimble TerraSync Professional 5.00+ software Easy to use! Start scanning barcodes in 4 simple steps: 1. Download and install the TerraCode app & "ROI QR Scanner" (free; search "snaptqr" on Google Play) if you don't use any scanning app yet 2. Turn on Bluetooth on your Android and GNSS device 3. Create a new Bluetooth connection & Configure an External Sensor in the Trimble TerraSync field software (follow the in-app instructions) 4. Scan and transfer barcodes to TerraSync Where are barcodes? - Utility meters (water and electricity meters, ...) - Poles (electricity and light poles, ...) - Traffic signs - Barcode labels on a public or a private asset

description: A music theory app for everyone. 'Music Theory - Chords in Keys' is a music theory app that will train you to think your way around musical keys. You will learn what all the three and four note chords are within all 12 major, natural minor, harmonic minor and melodic minor scales - an extremely useful skill for any musician! After installing music theory app 'Music Theory - Chords in Keys', choose the scale that you would like to work on (major, natural minor, harmonic minor, melodic minor) and the chord types (triads or sevenths). The app will then display a key and a Roman numeral chord number; you then have to work out what the chord within your chosen scale. This music theory app will also display the notes within each chord and the notes within each scale, allowing you to test your musical knowledge even further, or assist you in working out the correct answers. This latest version also offers a 'Play chord' option so you can here the chord you are being tested on. The tonic chord of the current scale is played, followed by the chord in question, followed by the tonic chord again. This way you know only learn music theory but also develop your aural skills at the same time. A summary of all the relevant music theory of chords within each of the scales is included in the help pages. With regular use of this music theory app you will know what all the fundamental three and four note chords are in each of the four scales, in all keys, and you will be a better musician because of it. - No ads - Low cost - No gimmicks - Simple clear layout - No music-reading skills required! This music theory app is ideal for guitarists, pianist, brass players, wind players, strings players, singers and just about anyone that would like to improve their knowledge of music theory, chords and keys; whether you play rock, pop, jazz or classical music. 'Music Theory - Chords in Keys' is a music theory app created by guitarist and music educator Stuart Bahn to help music students improve their musical knowledge even whilst away from their instruments. Download music theory app 'Music Theory - Chords in Keys' now make your move towards music theory mastery. MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: If you are in any way dissatisfied with this app, contact us within 24 hours of purchase for an immediate refund. This music theory app is designed to run on all Android smartphones. Because there are nearly 2000 different Android devices in the world, we can't test them all! If you do have a technical problem with your device, please don't leave a bad review, it's far more useful for all of us if you just let us know. We'll then do our best to address it asap or refund your payment. Thanks and happy learning.
release_text: Version 3 - released 3 Jan 2015 - Sound functionality added - Show notes of chord functionality - Show notes of parent scale functionality - Options screen added - Arabic of Roman numerals option - Number of sharps and flats option added - Expanded help pages - 'Rate app' button added 3.1 improved share functionality 3.2 minor correction

description: OBD-2 Scanner PID Repair (An automotive repair series APP) This APP is a unique piece of software meant to help you get the most out of your scan tool. Packed with information on all the scan tool parameters or PIDs. The APP allows you to choose the specific PID or parameter from a list. Here are the PIDs covered: Number of DTCs, CODE that caused FF, FUEL STATUS, ENGINE LOAD, ECT (engine coolant temperature), FUEL TRIMS, FRP (fuel rail pressure), MAP (Manifold Air Pressure), RPM (engine revolutions), VSS (Vehicle Speed Sensor), Ignition Timing Advance), IAT (Intake Air Temperature), MAF (Mass Air Flow), TPS (Obsolute Throttle Position), Commanded Air Status, O2 Sensor Location, STFT (Lambda Fuel Trims), OBD-2 Requirements, PTO/AUX INPUT STATUS, TIME SINCE ENGINE STARTED, DISTANCE TRAVELED WITH CEL ON, FUEL RAIL PRESSURE with MAP, AFR (Air Fuel Ratio Sensor), Commanded EGR, EGR ERROR, Commanded EVAP PURGE, # WARM UPS SINCE CODE CLEARED, Fuel Level Input, DISTANCE SINCE CODE WERE CLEARED, EVAP FUEL VAPOR PRESSURE, BARO (Barometric Pressure Sensor), AFR (Signal), CONVERTER TEMPERATURE, MONITOR STATUS (ENABLED/COMPLETED), VOLTAGE POWER/ECM POWER, ABSOLUTE LOAD FACTOR, COMMANDED EQUIVALENCE RATIO, RELATIVE THROTTLE POSITION, AMBIENT AIR TEMPERATURE, ABSOLUTE THROTTLE POSITION B C D E F, (TAC) COMMANDED THROTTLE ACTUATOR, TIME RUN WITH CEL/MIL ON, TIME SINCE CODE CLEARED Then once the PID is chosen you get an actual real-life description of the parameter and how you can use it. Keep scrolling through the list until you're satisfied with the knowledge. THEN.... you get even more.... There are three specific OBD-2 scan tool parameter buttons, the Video Helper, YouTube Helper and Audio Helper. These buttons work in conjunction with the PID that was chosen before. It is all automatic. By pressing the "Video Helper" button you get access to a set of PID specific videos dealing with your OBD-2 scanner parameter. NOTE: The "Video Helper" button works with larger Tablet Displays and Phones. May not work on smaller phones. The "YouTube Helper" does work with most phones. Then, if you're not satisfied and depending on the display option that you have, you can go to the "YouTube Helper" button, which is geared to display one of our automotive video properties. All YouTube videos shown here are the property of the author, Mandy Concepcion - Automotive Diagnostics and Publishing and not from any other non-approved source. So the information is accurate and taken from our YouTube channel "ADPTraining". Finally, for those with extremely small phone resources you get an "Audio Helper" button, which only displays audio and meant for small memory devices. (note: this option is coming soon). With the OBD-2 Scanner PID Repair APP you're set to get the most out of your CODE-READER or scan tool. Authored by Mandy Concepcion NOTE: This APP works fine on phones and tablets with larger screens.

SRS-Airbag Code Encyclopedia (Automotive) (An Automotive SRS-Airbag Repair APP) This APP has taken years of research to compile and thousands of field work hours to prove. This APP is based on similar software and book products by the same author. It cover the vast majority of SRS-supplemental restraint systems diagnostic fault codes. There are thousands of codes available both OBD-2 and OBD-1, or the so called blink codes. These blink codes are still used by many manufacturers. You also get "How to access SRS codes" in most cases without a scan tool. A good portion of vehicles do not need a scan tool to access airbag codes. Often time these procedures are no easy to find, for obvious reasons. The idea is to be able to diagnose your SRS-Airbag system without a scanner. If you can fix one issue with a car, this APP pays for itself a thousand times over. Here's the coverage that you get: Domestic coverage for General Motors, FORD/Lincoln/Mercury and All Chrysler/Dodge group vehicles (including Chrysler Imports). Asian coverage for Acura/Honda, Isuzu/Mazda/Subaru, Infinity/Nissan, Kia/Hyundai/Mitsubishi and Lexus/Toyota. By Mandy Concepcion Note: This APP run fine on Android Phones and Tablets with larger screen.

description: Die Auskultations App ist für all diejenigen, die das Auskultieren erlernen möchten. Um die Töne und Geräusche bestmöglichst zu hören sollte man Kopfhörer oder ein Headset verwenden. In Zunkunft ist es geplant weitere hinzuzufügen. Ich habe die App mit Hilfe und großzügiger Unterstützung der Universität Bern erstellt, der ich hier nochmals herzlich danken möchte. The auscultation app is for those who wish to learn to auscultation. It is intended primarily for medical students, but for all other medical professions also suitable. Currently, you can learn with her 12 major heart sounds and murmurs. To hear the sounds and noises best possible one should use headphones or a headset. In Zunkunft it is planned to add more. I created the app with the help and generous support of the University of Bern, which I would like once again to thank here.

description: El método Pilates consiste en un conjunto de ejercicios físicos especialmente pensados para fortalecer y tonificar los músculos sin aumentar su volumen. Esta disciplina permite estilizar la figura a través de la realización de una secuencia fluida de movimientos con escasos repeticiones. En esta aplicación te ofrecemos ejercicios para que puedas realizar desde tu hogar, fácil y práctico. Descargala ahora mismo en tu dispositivo móvil o tablet. The Pilates method is a set of specially designed to strengthen and tone muscles without increasing its volume exercise. This discipline allows stylize the figure by performing a fluid sequence of movements with few repetitions. In this application we offer exercises that you can perform from your home, easy and convenient. Download it now for your mobile phone or tablet device.

Learn french fast and free from home today. With explanations in english, this course will help you travel, or at various other times you find them useful. This course has lessons to learn French fast and easy.

• Shoot the monsters by touching them • Enjoy creepy sound effects • 3 levels of play • Increasing difficulty each level • 3 sets of monsters to kill • Persistent high scores. You have only 30 seconds to kill as many monsters as you can. There are levels of play you must achieve before you can move up to kill new monsters. Good Luck.

Battery Saver - Power Doctor is a powerful & simple Android Battery Saver & Power Manager. Functions include : (1) One-tap battery optimizer (2) Deep sleep mode (3) App consumption tracker (4) Activity remaining time estimator (5) Widget. Use Battery Saver – Power Doctor – properly to save battery power up to 2x-4x more! * FEATURES of Battery Saver – Power Doctor - * 1. One-tap Battery Optimizer With one-tap, the app closes background running apps and recommends you functions to turn off in order to save more. This function serves as memory cleaner/booster as well to speed up your android phone along with saving battery power. Optimizer will also indicate you how many hours you have / can save from phone draining. 2. Deep Sleep Mode Even you are not using the phone, lots of activities are going on that will drain your battery life. Deep Sleep Mode is set to solve this problem, such as disabling Wi-Fi, Auto-Sync while the phone is not in use. Various modes are available for your convenience. While not using your phone, set your "Sleep Mode" to save time! 3. App Consumption Tracker / Uninstaller Battery Saver – Power Doctor – tracks application usage and shows you which app drains the most. Choose the app that drains the battery the most and Uninstall/or/Force Stop to save Android time! 4. Remaining Time Tracker Indicates the remaining/limit time for Talktime, Game, Standby, AudioPlayback, MoviePlayback, WebSurfing, and Reading. Also shows life level in percent (%) at status bar. 5. Power Doctor Widget Access and turn on/off various functions from Home screen Widget. Supported Languages English, Español, Français, Deutsch, 简体中文, 繁體中文, 한국어, 日本語, Italiano, Português, Pусский, Türkçe, ไทย, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Maleayu, Filipino (Tagalog), Tiếng Việt * 17 Languages! Disclaimer : Results on saving may vary. The numbers 2x-4x on the screenshot, app detail is a result of our various tests and we believe we can deliver good result to you as well, but the battery length is affected by many factors such as screen size, running applications, usage in years etc. Please contact us if you don't feel the difference, we'll look in to it. Battery Saver – Power Doctor - Development Team is dedicated to make your Android life better! Give us your feedback anytime at feedback@1923america.com

description: Turn your phone into a wireless barcode scanner! Literally any OS is supported: Windows, Mac and Linux. Scanned barcodes will be sent to your computer using the common VNC protocol. For Windows: Download and install any VNC server on your computer. For example: UltraVNC, RealVNC or TightVNC. You just need to install the server part (silent server) and register as a system service. Set your VNC Password. If you are running VNC only to serve WiFi Barcode Scanner you might want to disable "Remove Aero (Vista)", "Remove Wallpapers for Windows" and enable "Capture Alpha-Blending" to prevent blinking of screen when connecting to the server. For Ubuntu: Open a terminal and enter the following command: gsettings set org.gnome.Vino require-encryption false For other Linux: Install and configure your prefered VNC server like x11vnc or tightvncserver. For Mac OS X: Open a terminal and enter the following command before enabling screen sharing: sudo defaults write /Library/Preferences/com.apple.RemoteManagement VNCAlwaysStartOnConsole -bool true Open "System preferences" - "Sharing". Check pane "Screen sharing". Click "Computer Settings..." and set your password. On your phone: Set your vnc server host and port using settings menu. If you choose to automatically connect just press "Start scanning" button. Otherwise first press "Connect" button to connect to your vnc server. Every scanned barcode will be sent to your vnc server immediately. Troubleshooting tips: - Make sure VNC is installed correctly and no firewall is blocking connection requests on port 5900. If you used the installer there should be already a Windows firewall rule. - Check if VNC can be reached by your phone. PC and phone must be on the same network. Otherwise you have to add port forwarding rules to your router. - Make sure you did not enable "Disable Viewers inputs" in your VNC servcer configuration. - If you still have any problems do not hesitate to contact us at android@id-mobile.net How to check ip addresses: - PC: hover the mouse over VNC tray icon and your PC ip address will be shown in a tooltip. - Phone: Settings -> Wireless & networks -> Wi-Fi Settings -> your connection will be listed under Wi-Fi networks Offline mode: You can enable offline mode to scan barcodes to a database and send them later. Just don't connect to the vnc server and start scanning. Later you can send the scanned barcodes using the History menu option. Using special keys for prepend/append string: You can use a html-like encoding to send special keys. Use 'ꯍ' where abcd is a hex string representing a special key. For all available keys please see X11/keysymdef.h or contact android@id-mobile.net To add a profile from QR-Code scan "wifibarcodescanner://PASSWORD@HOST:PORT/PROFILENAME". Every part except host can be ommited (eg. wifibarcodescanner://192.168.0.10). You can add widgets to your home screen to load profiles. If "Automatic Connect" is enabled scanning will start automatically when the widget is selected. WiFi Barcode Scanner can be used as a Locale-plugin for apps like Locale, Tasker, Llama and many more. For scanning barcodes the free ZXing Barcode Scanner App is needed. If not already installed you will be redirected to download on first usage.
release_text: v1.1.0: Profilemanager. v1.1.1: Handling of wifibarcodescanner:// improved. v1.1.2: Widget to load profile. v1.2.1: Offline mode. v1.2.2: Remove leading and trailing characters. v1.2.4: Usage as plugin for Locale, Tasker, Llama etc.

description: Order food online with your Android smartphone or tablet using the Lieferservice.at app. Super easy! Want to order a tasty pizza, salad, burger or kebab? Our app lets you order the best dishes from 1500+ restaurants accross the Austria, including Schnitzelhaus, Pizza Mann, Snack Attack, Pizza on Tour, Hollywood Pizza Service and many more. Craving Chinese, Indian, Italian or Greek food? You'll be spoilt for choice! Restaurants usually take 30-45 minutes to deliver. Benefits of our app: ✔ Ordering food online is just a few steps away. ✔ See the locations of all restaurants on a map (SD access needed for temporary storage of card). ✔ Pay safely with a credit card or PayPal. ✔ Log in with your account and (re)order easily. ✔ Add to your widgets to always have your favourite restaurants at hand. ✔ Would you rather pick up your food? Switch to the pickup option to see which restaurants allow this feature Works like this: Ordering is very simple. Fill in your postcode/street name or simply let the app find your location automatically. You can easily pay with PayPal or a credit card. Naturally, you can also pay with cash on delivery. Follow your order to your doorstep: Do you want to know where your order is? Follow your order from kitchen to doorstep with Food Tracker ®. We'll text you to update you about the status of your order. You'll receive three texts: one to confirm your order, another one to let you know that your food is being prepared and the last one to inform you when your food is on its way. All advantages at a glance: ✔ The design is clearer, cleaner and cooler than ever! ✔ A better overview. Useful updates: --- Better overview of opening times. --- Delivery costs are clearly displayed. --- Minimum order amounts are easy to find. ✔ New! Choose whether you want to pick up your food or have it delivered. ✔ More filters! Filter on reviews, distance, popularity, newest restaurant, price, product, delivery costs, alphabetical order and relevance. ✔ Map view: see the exact location of every restaurant on a map. ✔ Popular dishes: overview of the restaurant's most popular dishes. ✔ Wide selection of cuisines: Italian, Chinese, Thai, vegetarian and much more! ✔ Landscape or portrait mode: the app will easily adapt. ✔ The app is available in 4 languages. Switch to Dutch, English, French or German anytime. ✔ Log in with an existing account or create a new one. ✔ Addresses: all your saved addresses will be available in the app for your next order. ✔ Reorder: choose an order from your order history and reorder in no time. ✔ Widget: all of your favourite restaurants in one widget on your start screen. We are constantly improving: Loving it? Leave a review! The Lieferservice.at Android app has regular updates and new features. Do you have tips, ideas or any other feedback for our app? Contact us at androidapp@takeaway.com , we'll gladly answer! Bon APPétit!
release_text: ✔ Bug fixes. We are constantly improving: Loving it? Leave a review! The Lieferservice.at Android app has regular updates and new features. Do you have tips, ideas or any other feedback for our app? Contact us at androidapp@takeaway.com, we'll gladly answer!

description: This app adds a launcher entry for the hidden App Ops settings in built into Android 4.3 and Android 4.4. It will *not* work with Android 4.4.2. AppOps permits you to restrict applications' access rights on your device. In AppOps settings you can restrict permissions that you granted to apps during installation time. KEEP IN MIND: Restricting permissions may BREAK the functionality of some apps and might even cause apps to crash. This launcher app has been tested with Android 4.3 (Nexus 4, Nexus 7) and Android 4.4 (Nexus 5). Known issue with Android 4.4: If you leave the AppOps settings by pressing the home button, AppOps settings will be shown the next time you open the "Settings" app. You can get to the other settings by pressing the back button.

Light Lux Meter measures light intensity. This application uses the light sensor of the device to determine the illumination and prints it to the screen. Have fun! Attention! Accuracy depends on your light measurement unit not on the App! It might happen that the measured values range from low to quite high. Keywords: Luxmeter, Lightmeter, Lightluxmeter, Meter, LUX, Light

Den Sendungsstatus Ihres Pakets immer und überall wissen? Den elektronischen Gelben Zettel sofort auf das Handy bekommen? Schnell und bequem von unterwegs alle wichtigen Post-Services nutzen zu können? Das bietet die neue Post App. Folgende Services können Sie derzeit mobil nutzen: - Sendungsverfolgung (inkl. voraussichtlichem Lieferdatum) - e-Benachrichtigung (elektronischer Gelber Zettel) - Meine Sendungen (gespeicherte Sendungsverläufe) - Paketumleitung - Standorte (Filialen, Post-Partner und Briefkästen) - Tarifrechner - Registrierung Sendungsverfolgung: Mittels der Sendungsverfolgung finden Sie unterwegs heraus, wo sich Ihre Sendung gerade befindet. Sendungen können Sie entweder mit der Sendungs- bzw. Benachrichtigungsnummer finden oder schnell und einfach mittels Barcode-Scanner einscannen. Über aktuelle Statusänderungen werden Sie per Push-Nachricht informiert – Sie wissen also immer wo sich Ihr Paket befindet und wann es zugestellt wird. Wenn Sie registriert sind, können Sie Sendungen speichern und Namen vergeben um so schnell wieder auf die Sendungen zugreifen zu können. e-Benachrichtigung: Sollten Sie registriert sein und die Zustimmungsklausel zur elektronischen Benachrichtigung akzeptiert haben, werden Sie, wenn ein Paket nicht zugestellt werden konnte, über die Abholmöglichkeit informiert. D.h. Sie können das Paket abholen ohne vorher die Zustellbenachrichtigung (Gelben Zettel) holen zu müssen. Ebenso ist es möglich die elektronische Benachrichtigung an Dritte weiterzuleiten. In der Filiale zeigen Sie einfach den elektronischen Gelben Zettel her und bekommen so Ihr Paket. Meine Sendungen (gespeicherte Sendungsverläufe): Unter „Meine Sendungen“ finden Sie alle gespeicherten Sendungen. Auf einen Blick sehen Sie zu jedem Paket den aktuellen Status sowie das voraussichtliche Lieferdatum. Sie können den aktuellen Status auch weiterleiten um so andere Personen über den Status zu informieren. Der gesamte Sendungsverlauf wird gespeichert um den Weg einer Sendung nachvollziehen zu können. Um dieses Service zu nutzen ist eine Registrierung notwendig. Paketumleitung: Mit der Paketumleitung stehen Ihnen dafür verschiedene Optionen zur Verfügung: Die Umleitung in eine nahegelegene Filiale, in eine nahegelegene Abholstation, zu Ihrem Wunschnachbar, an einen Abstellort bei Ihnen oder auch an einem anderen Tag. - Sie erhalten das Paket noch am selben Tag, auch wenn Sie nicht zu Hause sind. - Sie werden per Mail bzw. Push Nachricht verständigt, wenn Ihr Paket zugestellt wurde. - Sie erhalten eine Mail bzw. Push Nachricht, welche Sie berechtigt, das Paket in der Filiale abzuholen (Gleichwertig zum „Gelben Zettel“ im Briefkasten). Ihre Sendungen: Sie bekommen automatisch Ihnen zuordenbare Sendungen angezeigt. Dadurch ersparen Sie sich die Eingabe der Sendungsnummer. Die vorgeschlagenen Sendungen können gespeichert oder verworfen werden. Sie werden mittels Push-Nachricht über neue Sendungen informiert. Standorte: Unter Standorte finden Sie alle Filialen, Post Partner und Briefkästen in Ihrer Nähe. Sie können auch alternativ nach Adressen suchen. Es wird die Entfernung angezeigt und die Möglichkeit geboten sich zum gewählten Standort routen zu lassen. Auf Wunsch können Sie eine Filiale als „meine Filiale“ markieren um sich so schnell aus dem Hauptmenü zur Wunschfiliale routen zu lassen. Bei jeder Filiale werden die Öffnungszeiten angezeigt bzw. ob und wie lange die Filiale noch geöffnet ist. Auch die jeweils angebotenen Produkte und Services werden aufgelistet. Tarifrechner: Mittels des Tarifrechners finden Sie den optimalen Tarif für Ihre Sendungen. Die benutzerfreundliche Menüführung führt Sie selbsterklärend zu Ihrem gewünschten Tarif inkl. weiterer Versandoptionen und Leistungen. Registrierung: Um Services wie die e-Benachrichtigung nutzen oder Sendungen speichern zu können müssen Sie registriert sein. Dies können Sie schnell und einfach auch in App erledigen. The shipment status of your package anytime, anywhere know? Get the electronic yellow note immediately on the phone? To use on the move all the major postal services quickly and easily? This offers the new Post app.   The following services, you can currently use mobile: - Tracking (incl. The expected date of delivery) - E-Alert (electronic Yellow List) - My program (stored broadcast courses) - Package forwarding - Locations (branches, post partner and mailboxes) - Postage Calculator - Registration   Tracking: By means of the Tracking can be found out on the road, where your shipment is. You can easily scan either with the shipment or notification number or find quickly and easily by barcode scanners. About current state changes you will be informed via push message - so you always know where your parcel is and when it is delivered. If you are registered, you can save programs and assign names to be able to quickly regain access to the broadcasts.   e-notification: If you are registered and have accepted the consent clause for the electronic notification, you will, if a package could not be delivered, information on the collection options. That You can pick up the package without having to pick up the delivery notification in advance (Yellow List). It is also possible to transfer the electronic notification to a third party. In the store you just show her the electronic yellow note and get so your package.   My programs (stored broadcast courses): Under "My program" you will find all items stored. At a glance you can see at any package the current status and the expected delivery date. You can also refer to the current status so other people informed about the status. The entire shipment process is to be able to trace the path of a stored program. In order to use this service is necessary to register. Packet forwarding: The packet forwarding you can choose for different options available: The redirection to a nearby branch, to a nearby pick-up location to your desired neighbor, to a Abstellort with you or on another day. - You get the package on the same day, even if you are not at home. - You will be informed by e-mail message or push when your package has been delivered. - You will receive an email or Push message, which entitles you to pick up the package in the store (equivalent to the "Yellow List" in the mailbox). Your program: You get automatically displayed assignable broadcasts. This saves you from entering the tracking number. The proposed program can be saved or discarded. You will be notified via push message about new programs.   Locations: Under Locations see all branches, post partner and mailboxes in your neighborhood. You can also search by address, alternatively. It indicates the distance and given the opportunity to can be routed to the chosen location. If desired, you can mark a branch as "my store" in order to let as quickly routes from the main menu to request branch. In each branch, the opening times are displayed or whether and how long the branch is still open. The products and services offered in each case are listed.   Fare Calculator: Using the rate calculator you find the best fare for your shipments. The user-friendly menu guides you self-explanatory to your desired fare incl. Other delivery options and services.   Register: To use services such as the e-notification or to save programs you need to be registered. You can do this quickly and easily in app.
release_text: - Auswahl des Wunschtages als neue Option in der Paketumleitung. - QR-Code Reader zum Scannen von Grußbotschaften der personalisierten Postkarte aus der "Postkarten App" der Österreichischen Post. - Generelle Verbesserung der Stabilität.

description: Version Donation, merci ! Une application, un forum et 6 widgets pour le suivi de votre grossesse. Suivi Grossesse est votre compagnon au quotidien pour vous informer tout au long de votre grossesse (ou de celle de votre femme, d'une amie,...) de l'évolution de votre futur enfant. Prenez des notes et notez vos rendez-vous dans l'Agenda. Suivez l'évolution de votre bébé semaine après semaine via l'application dans le menu "Cette semaine" ou en placant un widget sur votre home. Trouvez en plus des infos pratiques et conseils dans le menu "infos grossesse" et plus de 160 termes médicaux dans le Dico grossesse... Partagez vos expériences, trouvez des réponses et rencontrez d'autres futur(e)s maman/papa dans le forum. Les infos continuent après la naissance avec des infos mensuelles sur le nouveau venu durant sa première année.

Does your child love doing jigsaw puzzles? Welcome to Jigsaw Creator by Deanavryn Studios. Did you ever want to turn your own favourite pictures in to a jigsaw puzzle? Now you can. Select any picture from your Photo Library and turn it in to a puzzle. Use your devices built in camera to take a photo of anything you like and turn it in to a puzzle. No more lost jigsaw puzzle pieces! Puzzles can be done anywhere anytime. Even in the car. Jigsaw Creator is now available as a stand alone app. It can still be found in our amazing Build a Scare children's app. Jigsaw Creator is designed for kids of all ages. Key Features - Use the built in camera to take a pic to use for your puzzle - Use your Camera Roll or Photo Library - Easy or harder difficulty settings - Auto complete and reset puzzle buttons

Complete jigsaw puzzles of your favorite dinosaurs and learn how to pronounce each of their names in English. This educational and fun set of games helps young children learn matching skills while developing their hand eye coordination and puzzle solving skills. It is a unique early learning game with photo quality pictures which toddlers, preschoolers, and kindergarten age children will enjoy. Now includes bonus Find the Pairs kids memory training game. Kid`s Dinosaur Jigsaw Puzzles has: • high quality images set against photographic scenes that look great on High Definition (HD) and retina displays of both tablets and smart phones • roars and fun sound effects for every dinosaur • shows written name and pronunciation for every prehistoric creature in the set (English language only) • covers lots of your favorite dinosaurs including the Tyrannosaurus Rex (T Rex), Brachiosaurus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Dilophosaurus, Diplodocus, Gigantoraptor. Also covers some lesser known one’s like the Utahraptor, Zuniceratops and many others. • puzzles that can be replayed again after solving • increasing difficulty as your child progresses through the games in three distinct levels • no advertising • supports the following menu navigation languages: English, German, French, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Spanish, Arabic, Russian, Italian, Persian, Turkish, Polish, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Norwegian, Malay, Greek, Finnish, Dutch and Danish. (Note: Dinosaur names are available in English only) Kid`s Dinosaur Jigsaw Puzzles comes with a selection of free puzzles that can be easily upgraded through a single low cost in-app purchase to enable all puzzles. By upgrading from the Free App to the full version you’ll also be entitled to all additional puzzles and features added in future releases. Jigsaw puzzle games have traditionally been a fun and early education learning tool for tots, toddlers, preschoolers, kindergarten, and early school age children and are a stimulating game for girls and an exciting game for boys. • 2 year old and 3 year old children can practice their hand eye coordination and matching skills as they progress through the puzzles on each level and enjoy the roars and sounds on completion of each puzzle • 4 year old and 5 year old kids can learn to read, write and pronounce the complicated dinosaur names. We hope you and your children enjoy playing what we believe is one of our best early education games for toddlers and preschoolers. Check out our other puzzle games and acclaimed kids educational apps at http://espacepublishing.com or follow us on Facebook for the scoop on new app releases and free giveaways at http://facebook.com/espacepublishing .
release_text: - New find the pairs memory training game - Improved navigation and responsiveness - Improved graphics and new puzzle backgrounds

description: Oz Radar Weather pulls data directly from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology web site. The app displays the local weather radars. It reduces the data used by your device by caching the latest radar images and background for the fastest possible load time. This is the first stage of a series of releases to enhance this app to have all the features of my iPhone version. Please let me know what features you would like to see next.
release_text: * Correct bug where GPS location was not displayed * Improve load speed

description: White Pages helps you find contact details for people, businesses and government departments from the convenience of your phone. Choose to see the location of a listing on a map, view the route from where you are or simply place a call. Features include: - Predictive text displays suggestions as you type - Interactive maps with touch pan/zoom, photo view and full screen options - Find nearby results using GPS. - View listings on a map and get directions using GPS. We're aiming to continually improve so tell us know what you think of White Pages for your phone. We are always happy to hear from you. By downloading White Pages to your phone you agree to the terms located at the "Legal" link below.
release_text: - Improved loading of search results, allowing users to browse the results while additional content is still loading - Added a network indicator, to help identify when the app is working even if no changes are apparent on-screen - Enhanced Share option (including Share To Twitter) - My List (sign up and reset password all through the app) - Performance improvements and bug fixes

description: Whereis® is a FREE app providing voice guided turn-by-turn navigation across Australia. Get to your destination quickly and easily. ● BONUS for Telstra customers - No carrier data charges on the Telstra Next G™ network (excluding links to third party sites & content). ● Winner of 2013 Australian Mobile Award (best navigation app) ● Finalist in the 2012 AIMIA Awards in the categories of ‘Best Application for a Mobile’ & ‘Best Tourism or Travel’ Need directions? Ask a local. Whereis® is your local map provider with extensive coverage of Australia. Whereis® understands local conditions. FEATURES INCLUDE: ● Voice-guided navigation, telling you when to make a turn ● Automatic re-route if you take a wrong turn ● Day & night-mode views when navigating ● Extensive Australian map coverage using the most up-to-date data from Whereis®, Australia’s local mapping expert ● Locate yourself on the map ● Search for addresses, places & businesses from Yellow Pages® ● Quick search panel to find points of interest on your map such as petrol stations, ATMs, restaurants, car parks, etc. NOTES: ● Parts of this app use the phone’s GPS, and continued use can dramatically decrease battery life. ● As Whereis® is designed for use in Australia, you cannot use the Current Location or Navigation features outside Australia. You will, however, still be able to search maps, addresses, businesses & directions. ● Restrictions on driver use of mobile phones exist in some States and Territories and you should check local rules. We’re committed to ensuring Whereis® is the best free mapping & navigation app in Australia, so please send through your feedback and ideas to appfeedback@whereis.com Whereis Support - https://www.whereismaps.com/business/about-us.html Report Map Changes - https://www.whereismaps.com/map-corrections.html
release_text: What's New Sensis designers, cartographers and product specialists have been working hard to provide a fresh new look for our Whereis map. We love it and we hope you do too. You can also experience it on our new responsive site at www.whereis.com The Whereis celebrity voice promotion for Jennifer Hawkins, Dame Edna, Billy Birmingham and Ray Warren has ended and these voices have been removed from this release. Please keep sending through your feedback and ideas to appfeedback@whereis.com

description: Be the owner of 54 Duke Nukem quotes playable from your device at any time! All quotes are accessible by touching various locations on the screen.

Discover over 400 of Sydney’s historical and public art points of interest and be guided on ten walking tours curated by the City of Sydney. Culture Walks is the ideal companion for discovering Sydney on foot – discover hidden laneways and new neighbourhoods while learning about Sydney’s history and the stories behind the city’s most loved public artworks. Prefer to see what’s close to you or interested in a particular work? Simply filter through hundreds of points of interest by location, type or theme. • Be guided through 10 walking tours curated by the City of Sydney’s history and public art teams • 400+ historical and public art points of interest, filterable by type, location and theme. • Discover all the points of interest in offline mode* • Free updates for life: keep an eye out for new walks and points of interest Download the app and start walking! App development happily provided by We Make Apps – http://wemakeapps.net *Like other mapping apps, a data connection is required to download and display map imagery.

description: You wont find no flappin' birds, or splashin' fish in this game, just good ol' dinosaur dodging, meat eating, cavemen running mayhem! It's time for the cavemen, Oogah and Toogah, to collect their food but those pesky dinosaurs are always getting in the way! Help Oogah and Toogah collect their food while dodging nasty dinosaurs. Tap the jump button to make the cavemen jump, but watch out for the flying Pterodactyls! Time jumps perfectly to try and avoid getting trapped! Get creative with double jumps for an extra challenge. Collect coins on the way which can be used to purchase tomahawks. In a scenario where you can't dodge a dino? Throw a tomahawk! The longer you last, the harder the game gets. It's time for Dinosaur Dodge!
