description: Description Ice-Phone Retro Rotary Dialler Get 20th century telephonic style with a 21st century twist! You’ve gone retro with the Ice-Phone handset and stand... now complete the transformation by giving your smart phone a genuine rotary dial! Dial in the “old fashioned way” while still making use of your mobile device’s very latest features. PLUS - The Ice-Phone app will flood your smart phone screen with colour, and match it to your handset and stand. How cool is that? Features •Original rotary dial phone dial •Operate just as you would a retro rotary dial phone •Same ring tone, same dial tone as last century •Match your phone screen with your Ice-Phone stand and handset •Brighten and update your contact list with matching colour

description: "Art Widget" app displays famous paintings and other artworks of well-known artists who worked in various styles: Gothic, Renaissance, Mannerism, Baroque, Rococo, Neoclassicism, Romanticism, Realism, Pre-Raphaelites, Impressionism, Post-Impressionism, Neo-impressionism, Symbolism, Modernism, Cubism, Expressionism, Fauvism, Art Nouveau, Art Deco, Pop art, Futurism, Suprematism, Surrealism, Postmodernism, Contemporary art, Mannerism, New Wave, Orphism, Minimalism, Abstract Expressionism, Ancient Art, Dadaism, American Art, Sculpture. Click on Refresh button to move to the next artwork. Click on the picture in the widget to open application with detailed description of the artwork. Click on the picture or on text inside the application to show even more detailed information from the Internet. Use Settings menu inside the application to change widget preferences like language, refresh frequency and select information to be shown in widget. Use Share artwork menu inside the application to share image of artwork in Facebook, Twitter or other social networks. Widget is resizable, so that you can choose the size that suits your needs. This program can show information about artworks in Catalan, English, French, German, Italian, Polish, Russian, Spanish and Ukrainian. This program requires a network connection for getting images of artworks and access to device storage for caching them. Check out "Art Widget Pro" if you also want the same functionality but bigger pictures and no banners.
release_text: Version 2.5: * Added user rating of artworks. Version 2.4: * Added zoom possibility to the application. Version 2.3: * Optimized Refresh button for tablets. Version 2.2: * Added Danish tranlation. * Added Application Rating popup. Version 2.1: * Removed yellow margin that appeard when widget was pressed. * Made clickable area of Refresh button bigger. Version 2.0: * Added action bar for tablets and newer versions of Android because menu button was made deprecated by Google.

description: Use Bond Calculator to easily calculate yield, including capital gains and losses. Also we've added adjustments for inflation to the new and improved Bond Calculator! So now you can see if your investment is growing in real terms not just nominal terms. We also calculate the annual payout, percentage gain at maturity, yield, and yield adjusted for inflation of your bonds. Easily calculate how much your fixed income investments will make even accounting for inflationary pressures, capable of monthly, quarterly, and annual payout calculations. Know how much you are making annually to better budget and invest. Par value is assumed to be $100 Disclaimer: This application does not constitute investment advice. We are not responsible for losses or errors.
release_text: User Interface Overhaul Better Tablet Layout

description: Vocês pediram, a gente chegou. O aplicativo da pizzaria mais famosa do mundo, agora para todo o Brasil. Com uns poucos cliques, você pode receber em casa todo o sabor da Pizza Hut. Ou pode fazer seu pedido na loja de sua preferência, para buscar e levar para casa sua pizza favorita. Como usar o app? Usar o app Pizza Hut é simples. Primeiro, você deve escolher se quer receber sua pizza em casa ou se você quer ir buscar na loja. Para retirar na loja: 1 - Escolha a loja de sua preferência na lista que vai abrir automaticamente. 2- Navegue pelas categorias e adicione o que você quer pedir no carrinho. 3 - Clique em carrinho para finalizar seu pedido. Escolha a forma de pagamento e aguarde a confirmação. 4- Passe na loja, retire seu pedido e bom apetite :) Para entrega em casa: 1 - Informe sua localização: Localize seu endereço usando o GPS do seu Android, ou informe seu CEP ou Rua para conferir se sua área é atendida. Se você já tiver cadastro, faça o login e selecione seu endereço. 2 - Selecione os pratos: navegue pelas categorias e escolha os seus itens favoritos. 3 - Confira seu pedido no carrinho: veja os itens que você incluiu e finalize seu pedido. 4- Se você não está logado, esse é o momento: coloque seu login e senha ou faça seu cadastro. 5 - Escolha a forma de pagamento e aguarde a confirmação. 6 - Acompanhe seu pedido, espere a entrega e bom apetite :) Importante: - Pela consulta do seu endereço você verifica a disponibilidade do serviço para seu domicílio; - O processo de compra no aplicativo é limitado pelo horário e área de entrega das lojas conveniadas. You asked, we arrived. The application of the world's most famous pizzeria, now all over Brazil. With a few clicks, you can get home all the flavor of Pizza Hut. Or you can make your order on our store you prefer to pick and take home your favorite pizza. How to use the app? Use the Pizza Hut app is simple. First, you must choose whether to receive their pizza at home or if you want to get in the store. To remove the store: 1 - Choose the store of your choice in the list will automatically open. 2 - Browse the categories and add what you want to order in the cart. 3 - Click cart to complete your request. Choose your payment method and wait for confirmation. 4 - Go in the store, take your order and good appetite :) For home delivery:  1 - Enter your location: Locate your address using the GPS on your Android, or enter your zip code or street to see if your area is serviced. If you have already joined, log in and select your address. 2 - Select the dishes: browse the categories and select your favorite items. 3 - Check your order in the cart: see the items you included and complete your order. 4 - If you're not logged in, this is the time: put your login and password, or register yourself. 5 - Choose the form of payment and wait for confirmation. 6 - Track your order, expect delivery and good appetite :) Important: - For the address of your query you check the availability of the service for your home; - The process of buying the application is limited by time and area of ​​delivery of the accredited shops.
release_text: - Novo layout: fazer seu pedido nunca foi tão simples e bonito. - Nova opção “Refazer pedidos”: agora você pode navegar pelos seus pedidos já feitos e refazê-los quando quiser :) - Novo “Fale Conosco”: você pode enviar suas críticas e sugestões através do próprio aplicativo. - Melhorias na confirmação do pedido: é mais transparência para o usuário - Melhorias no processo de pagamento com cartão de crédito.

description: O aplicativo do Jornal Extra, com as últimas notícias do Brasil e do mundo, sempre tratadas de forma clara e objetiva! Extra Notícias, o aplicativo de um dos jornal mais lidos do país! Baixe aqui e fique ligado! Informações úteis e interessantes sobre famosos, esportes, empregos, economia, casos de polícia, TV, novelas, política, universo feminino e muito mais. Serviços no seu smartphone, na palma da sua mão com atualizações em tempo real e fotos de qualidade dos principais assuntos do momento. O aplicativo tem uma navegação simples e direta, que se adapta à sua tela, e reproduz a estrutura do site ao qual você está acostumado. As diferentes editorias são: Notícias (Brasil, Mundo, Economia, Educação, Carros) Polícia Emprego (Capacitação, Concursos, Servidor Público) Famosos Mulher (Beleza, Corpo, Decoração, Moda) TV e Lazer (Novelas, Música, BBB) Esporte (Brasileirão, Copa 2014) Fotos Todas elas permitindo o acesso rápido à notícia que você quer ler e a possibilidade de compartilhar no Facebook, Twitter ou por e-mail. Outras funcionalidades do aplicativo são a possibilidade de aumentar e diminuir o tamanho da fonte, de avaliar o aplicativo e falar com o pessoal do Jornal Extra. Extra Notícias é um produto Infoglobo. The application of Extra Newspaper, with the latest news from Brazil and the world, always treated in a clear and objective manner! Extra News, the application of one of the most widely read newspaper in the country! Download here and stay tuned! Useful and interesting information about famous, sports, jobs, economy, police cases, TV, novels, politics, and more feminine universe. Services on your smartphone, in the palm of your hand with real-time updates and quality photos of the main issues of the moment. The application has a simple and straightforward navigation that fits your screen, and reproduces the structure of the site to which you are accustomed. The various editors are: News (Brazil, World, Economy, Education, Cars) Police Employment (Training, Contests, Public Servant) Famous Women (Beauty, Body Decoration, Fashion) TV Goods (Novels, Music, BBB) Sport (Brasileirão, Copa 2014) Photos All of them allowing quick access to the news you want to read and the ability to share on Facebook, Twitter or by email. Other features of the application include the ability to increase and decrease the font size, to evaluate the application and talk with the staff of Extra Journal. Extra News is a Infoglobo product.
release_text: - Interação social: leia e publique postagens do Twitter sobre o assunto das matérias sem sair do aplicativo! - Melhorias - Se gostou do Extra Notícias, por favor tire um minuto para escrever uma resenha bem bacana! Caso tenha qualquer problema, entre em contato conosco através do e-mail appnoticiasextra@extraonline.com.br

description: 100% Grátis! Gerencie suas compras com facilidade. Meu carrinho é uma solução simples para saber quanto você gastou no supermercado, antes de chegar no caixa. Não espere mais na fila até descobrir o quanto você gastou. Em breve mais funcionalidades, não deixe de comentar e sugerir funcionalidades, estamos prontos a ouvir. 100% Free! Manage your purchases with ease. My Cart is a simple solution to know how much you spent at the supermarket, before arriving in the box. No more waiting in line to find out how much you spent. Soon more features, be sure to comment and suggest features, we are ready to listen.

Get the average fuel consumption of your car along the route. With the GPS, your smartphone becomes an onboard computer! Unlike other applications that calculate the consumption based on the latest fueled, in diary form, this application calculates the fuel consumed using the complex equations of physics and chemistry of combustion combined with technical data from your vehicle such as weight, fuel type, size of engine cylinders, drag coefficient, etc... No other equipment is necessary (as lm327 ODBii Interface) to collect data for the calculation of consumption. Only with GPS information is possible to estimate the power, torque and hence the energy consumed for a given path and also your way of driving: acceleration, braking, steep climbs, etc. ... With this virtual board computer: • Consumption is measured in kilometers per liter (km / l) or miles per gallon (mpg); • The speed is reported in kilometers per hour (km / h) or miles per hour (mph); • The distance is reported in kilometers (km) or miles (mi); • The screen always stays on during the execution of the application; • You can choose to use full screen; • nine (9) color themes to choose from; • Can be used in portrait or landscape mode ... One can monitor the acceleration and braking in the form of a scale bar. Avoid sudden acceleration or braking to save fuel!

With appearance of red digits, simulating 7-segment LED display, you will end up reminiscing those nostalgic bedside clock radios! (This application plays only clock function) The screen is always on. It is advisable to plug your Smartphone into energy, to avoid waking up in the morning with all the battery drained. ;)
Reach your highest score, climbing and dodging obstacles.

With My Achievements, you can view your achievements, games, status and also your friend's. It's avaliable for Steam community. Features: - Games list - Achievements list - Friends list - Ranking (Total of achievements/score) Help us to improve this app with more features!

Let's agree that a birthday party without balloons can’t really be called a party! If you agree that balloons are the essence of a birthday party, then lets’ pop all of them in Balloon Party, the game! So many colors, so many shapes, so many balloons to burst! Do you think you can pop all of them? Burst the highest numbers of balloons you can! Have fun and reach the highest score at the same time! Balloon Party is an amusing and intuitive game, both kids and adults will love it! Keep your attention to match colors and mainly watch out for special balloons, that will give you extra points to boost your score. Burst all kinds of balloons such as cute little pets, sports items, funny monsters and delicious candies! Crush all of these to get to the great final of hitting a piñata! Yes, that's right: a PIÑATA filled with yummy candies! HIGHLIGHTS • Designed for kids, adults, boys and girls • Assures fun for people of all ages • Beautiful graphics with cute illustrations • Easy and addictive gameplay BALLOON SHAPES FOR ALL TASTES • Sports: Baseball, basketball, football and tennis ball • Scary Monsters: Zombies, skulls and Halloween pumpkins • Cute Pets: Dogs, cats, mices and octopuses With Balloon Party the party never ends, download now and burst your boredom away! Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

Find out what happens to an ordinary cattle when mutations start taking place. Combine cows to evolve them and discover the most curious, exotic and bizarre forms of cows. As evolution continues, zoom out from your farm and explore the continent, the world and BEYOND! Witness first hand the incredible transformations only made possible because of your crazy aspirations of getting richer and promoting genetic mutations. HOW TO PLAY It’s easy cheesy! • As your cows poop coins, buy new ones to earn even more money • Drag and drop similar cows to evolve them into new and more profitable creatures • Alternatively, fiercely tap the cows to make coins pop when cows poop HIGHLIGHTS • Four different stages and many forms of cows: monster cows, alpaca cows, alien cows and more • A mind-blowing story yet untold • The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution, 2048 and incremental clicker games • Five possible endings: find your destiny • Mutations like you have never seen • No cows were harmed in the making of this game, only developers Forget everything you know about cows. Cow Evolution tells you first hand the story about how cows will take over the world and beyond, a story no one dared to mention… yet! Watch the process of evolution in a very peculiar way. Download now Cow Evolution and check it out for yourself! Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
release_text: - PLUTO UPDATE! We love Pluto too. And now it's time to discover all-new mootant cows! - New precious hats for you! - General bug fixes Love Cow Evolution? Try Goat, Zebra, Chicken Evolution too!

description: Take the dust off your rod and come aboard! Get ready to fish! It’s fishing time, so take the dust off your rod and come aboard! Master the fish catching art with Fish Jump while you collect up to 17 different types of fishes and compete with your friends to see who’s the best angler! FEATURES ★ 17 unique fish types with funny acrobatics to unlock ★ Addictive pickup-and-play game ★ Beautiful graphics for high resolution devices Best entertainment for kids, boys, girls, men, women, grandpas and grandmas! Everybody loves to fish! And it's free! No fishes were harmed in the make of this game! Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

Help save Christmas! Christmas is coming, but the crazy and evil Sir Bobcat stole Santa’s bag - full of gifts and toys - to ruin Christmas for all the kids in the world. Join Tappy, Pixie and Beaver Bill on the rescue of Santa’s bag to save the most happy, amazing and incredible holiday of the year. Earn coins after every run to unlock curious new characters and levels. Tappy, Pixie and Beaver Bill are all anxious to help capture Sir Bobcat and save Santa’s bag. Explore the magic of the Enchanted Forest, the coldness of the North Pole and the mystery of the Midnight City. Run Tappy Run Xmas is a fun and addictive running game based on the popular one-touch gameplay and suitable for players of all ages, from kids to grown-up adults! Endless levels and awesome power-ups along the way are sure to keep you entertained for hours and enjoy this Christmas and New Year’s Eve holidays. It’s the best casual game for the family! Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

F22 Fighter Desert Storm brings to you a lot of new features: 1 - You can select three different fighters to engage the battle; 2 - Realistic engine sound; 3 - Improve on fighter control; 4 - Enemy AI improvement; 5 - Performance improvement for Kindle Fire. Thank you for download F22 Fighter Desert Storm. We are planing a very big surprise for you in the next few weeks. :) **************************** Prepare yourself for the most exciting war ever. Fly your F22 Fighter through a very realist Egypt scenery that you ever saw against helicopters, F17, F117 and S37. They want shut you down, but you have to resist equip your aircraft F22 Fighter with seeker missiles hided around the level. Between the pyramids and behind the sphinx you can find some shelter, but don't be a fool. The defense is the attack. Take the F22 Fighter over this desert storm before is too late. This is the challenge...this the desert storm... this is F22 Fighter Desert Storm!! Be prepared.

description: Genius Farm is an amazing game for you test and exercise your visual and auditory memory. So for increase your brain capacity you just have to repeat the sequences hearing the music and paying attention to alight boxes avoiding a great explosion, capable to destroy all the neighborhood. So, concentration and have fun!
If you like brain storms and beautiful Manga Girls, this is the game that you were looking for. Manga Girls brings to you the most pretty girls ever. Surrounded by fantasy, magic and dreams.

Mr. Nibbles 3D is the perfect game to those who miss the Atari Times, when we expend all afternoon looking at television and imagining that those squares were fruits, labyrinth, little snakes, poison and everything else that our mind could create. Now, with Mr. Nibbles, you don't need imagine anymore! It is a full 3D game, where an apple is really an apple, a tree is really a tree and the scenery has a real sky. And the best thing: if you are one of those who hate losing because the little snake bit itself tail, you don't need to worry anymore, the enemies are others now: Piranhas fierce, vengeful bees and the most ruthless of all, the Time. Have fun playing with Mr. Nibbles, the little snake. Oh, I almost forgot, the best players can win the amasing and unusual Gold Apple.

Do you like epic adventures full of action, strategy, gold, explosions, heroes and spells? So, prepare yourself to play Mr. Slash and defend those who needs help. Mr. Slash and the others heroes will fight against the evil to protect one small village that has been attacked by a witch who has the Dark Side as his ally. The evil witch leads a group of ninjas, barbarians and witches. His plan... steal the seven magic stones and use their power to become the stronger evil source in the world. What about online challenge? Mr. Slash now brings to you online leaderboard so you keep challenging people around the world to be best fighter. Be brave and join us in this online quest around the world. Features: * EASY TO PLAY. Tested controls to all devices! * THREE GAME MODES. We created three different game modes, each bringing your different obstacles and challenges. * ENHANCED FOR YOUR DEVICE. Perfect game play! This game is definitely the most easy-to-play game for your device.
release_text: Increase performance for low memory devices

description: Monster Truck Tourism Simulator is a 3D monster truck car simulator game. This game simulates driving a monster truck around a very beautiful e dangerous landscape. In this game, you can select any one of six camera view to drive your 3D truck. We recommend that you use the top view. It‘s easier to through the corner. Control your car with an steering wheel, acceleration and brake pedals. Watch out to cars coming from the other side of the road. Enjoy the of very realistic landscape. Wait for weekly updates. Have fun! ******************* Features - Realistic paint reflection; - Traffic vehicle to make your journey more exciting;

Starbase Defender is an incredible Arcade game. In Starbase Defender, your mission will be to defend the base from devastating meteor shower. To this task you will use the Blazer Cannon, a powerful weapon That Can Destroy the meteors. But you will need to watch out with the starships looking for refuge at your base. Go ahead and good soldier lucky.

Our capacity for create weapons has grow faster than our wisdom to use them. For fear man kind has used the technology to create weapons that suppose keep the peace. One day we realised we were wrong. But then...was already too late. Now the planet is divided, your mission is lead and protect a small group that is trying to save what the last world war left. Manage the resources you have, evolve what needs to be evolved. But remember, on Terminator World War, you can't show mercy to your enemies. The same technology that destroyed the civilization is the only chance the humanity have. The terminator world war only can be finished if you protect your people and for that, evolve the machine-guns, phasers guns, shockwave generator and all that you on your hands. Features: - Top view - Field view - Six different scenarios - Six different enemies - Five different weapons - Zoom control - Camera dragging

Test your Samurai war skills as a bowman. Feel the peace coming from the harmony between man and nature. The Crow will guide your hands and keep your mind peaceful. Concentrate the universe power at your arrow!

In this game, you can select any one of six camera view to drive your 3D truck. We recommend that you use the top view. It‘s easier to through the corner. Control your car with an steering wheel, acceleration and brake pedals. Enjoy the of very realistic landscape. Wait for weekly updates. description: Sky Wars After Burner is a game for those how like adventures with a very punk Rock'N Roll surrounded for technology and adrenaline. Fly your fighter aircraft SU-27 against helicopters and gunshpis to destroy as many enemy ships you can and go as far as can.

Confira as previsões do JOÃOBIDU direto de seu Smartphone e fique sabendo o que os astros reservam para o seu dia! Além de previsões diárias para o seu signo, o aplicativo traz Numerologia, pela qual você pode calcular o número do seu nome. Tem também as características do seu signo e combinação astral: assim você pode conferir qual signo combina mais com o seu! Consulte o que os astros reservam para você quando e onde quiser! Check forecasts JOÃOBIDU direct from your Smartphone and find out what the stars hold for your day! Besides daily forecasts for your sign, the application brings Numerology, by which you can calculate the number of his name. It also has the features of your sign and astral combination: so you can check which combines sign more with yours! See what the stars hold for you anytime, anyplace!

A CAIXA oferece pra você mais uma facilidade para o seu dia a dia. Baixe o aplicativo CAIXA, exclusivo e gratuito para Android, e tenha acesso às principais funcionalidades da sua conta: confira seu extrato, faça transferências, pagamentos e veja como andam os seus investimentos. Acompanhe também os resultados das Loterias CAIXA, localize os mais diversos canais de atendimento – Agências, Banco24Horas e Lotéricas -, simule as parcelas de financiamento da sua casa própria, consulte os pagamentos do Bolsa Família e tenha, sempre à mão, os números do nosso atendimento telefônico. Para ligar de onde estiver, sempre que precisar, de forma rápida e segura. BOX offers to you more ease to your everyday life. Download the BOX, exclusive and free for Android, and has access to key features of your account: check your statement, make transfers, payments and see how are your investments. Keep up with the results of CAIXA Lotteries, locate various service channels - Agencies, Banco24Horas and Lottery - simulating the financing installments of your own home, check payments and Bolsa Família has, always at hand, the numbers of our telephone service. To connect wherever you are, whenever you need, quickly and safely.

O aplicativo CNPJ oferece os seguintes serviços: - Consultar, diretamente nas bases da Receita Federal, informações cadastrais da Pessoa Jurídica no CNPJ, tais como: situação cadastral, nome empresarial, nome fantasia, natureza jurídica, capital social, endereço (com visualização em mapa), quadro societário, opção pelo Simples Nacional, telefone etc; - Acompanhar um CNPJ e receber um alerta (envio de notificações) sempre que houver alguma mudança nos dados cadastrais da empresa; - Acompanhar uma solicitação cadastral e receber um alerta (envio de notificações) sempre que houver alguma mudança nessa solicitação; - Acompanhar a evolução das solicitações cadastrais (inscrições, alterações e baixas) e/ou cancelá-las; - Visualizar o Comprovante de Inscrição e de Situação Cadastral do CNPJ, com possibilidade de impressão e/ou compartilhamento com terceiros; - Consultar a tabela C.N.A.E. (Código Nacional de Atividades Econômicas); - Obter informações gerais sobre os procedimentos cadastrais; - Quiz: teste de conhecimentos sobre o CNPJ; e - Avaliar o próprio aplicativo. The CNPJ application offers the following services: - Consult, directly on the basis of IRS, registration information of Legal Entities CNPJ such as: registration status, company name, trade name, legal, social capital, address (with display on map), corporate structure, choice of Simple National, telephone etc; - Accompany a legal entity and receive an alert (send notifications) whenever there is any change in the registration data of the company; - Monitor a registration request and receive alerts (push notifications) whenever there is any change in this request; - Keep abreast of registration requests (registrations, changes, and low) and / or cancel them; - View the Registration Certificate and the CNPJ Registration Status with the possibility of printing and / or share with third parties; - See Table C.N.A.E. (National Code of Economic Activities); - General information about the registration procedures; - Quiz: Test knowledge of the CNPJ; and - Evaluate the application itself.
release_text: Recebimento de notificações quando: - mudarem os dados cadastrais do CNPJ - a solicitação mudar de situação Obs.: para receber a notificação use a estrela, deixando-a sempre amarela. Outras novidades: - Exibição do quadro de sócios e administradores, capital social, ente federativo responsável, telefone e endereço eletrônico na consulta CNPJ - Comprovante de Inscrição e de Situação Cadastral do CNPJ, com possibilidade de impressão e/ou compartilhamento com terceiros - Adaptado para o iOS 8

description: O aplicativo TV Escola está totalmente remodelado, com visual moderno, intuitivo e novas funcionalidades. Totalmente integrado ao site TV Escola, possui as mesmas ferramentas possibilitando o acesso em múltiplas plataformas. - Destaques: divulgação dos principais e novos programas; - Videoteca: todo o acervo digital da TV Escola pode ser acessado por categoria, série ou mais assistidos; - Novo player de vídeo: permite adicionar a “favoritos” e “playlist”, fazer marcações e comentários nos vídeos, selecionar trechos, baixar localmente e compartilhar nas redes sociais entre outros; - Minha TV Escola: área para os usuários visualizarem suas playlists, favoritos e vídeos baixados; - Programação: acesso à programação e informações da grade da TV Escola; - Agora na TV Escola: assista, em tempo real, ao que está sendo exibido no canal, incluindo a descrição do programa; - Tutorial: indica como usar as funcionalidades do novo aplicativo. Acesse tvescola.mec.gov.br e descubra todas as possibilidades. The TV Escola application is fully renovated with modern look, intuitive and new features. Fully integrated into the site TV School, it has the same tools enabling access on multiple platforms. - Highlights: disclosure of the essential and new programs; - Video Library: all the digital assets of the School TV can be accessed by category, or series most watched; - New video player: add to "favorites" and "playlist" to mark up and comment on the videos, select excerpts, locally download and share on social networks among others; - My TV School: area for users to view your playlists, favorites and downloaded videos; - Programming: access to programming and grid information from TV School; - Now on TV School: watch, in real time, to what is being displayed on the channel, including the description of the program; - Tutorial: indicates how to use the new application features. Tvescola.mec.gov.br go and discover all the possibilities.

description: Разработка и составление бизнес-плана, технико-экономического обоснования (ТЭО), разработка любых инвестиционных проектов для банков. Бизнес-планирование - один из ключевых этапов становления компании. Деятельность любой фирмы начинается с правильного составления бизнес-плана. Любая идея требует тщательной проработки и анализа. Комплекс мер по формированию идеи в конечное бизнес-решение и применении этой идеи на практике и есть бизнес-планирование. Наша компания предлагает качественное и профессиональное составление бизнес-планов, технико-экономических обоснований и инвестиционных проектов. Мы на протяжении 7 лет успешно работаем на Российском рынке и реализовали множество успешных проектов, которые применяются на практике! Данное приложение позволяет заказать разработку бизнес-плана, технико-экономического обоснования или инвестиционного проекта прямо из Вашего мобильного устройства! Сервис предоставляется компанией: http://razrabotka-plana.ru

description: Jouez dès maintenant à Faites-moi confiance avec l’application mobile Faites-moi confiance. Vous pouvez également jouer à une série de jeux ludiques pour tester vos aptitudes. Play now to trust me with the mobile application Trust me. developer: Centre for Mobile Education and Research
description: This app has been designed for students taking the Anatomy and Physiology 1 course at Abu Dhabi Women’s College. This course provides an introduction to basic anatomy and physiological principles from cellular level to the whole organism. It was developed by Douglas Griffith under the supervision of Dr. Qusay H. Mahmoud, Director of the Centre for Mobile Education and Research at the University of Guelph in Canada. The content provider is Sharon Ellis, Health Science lecturer, with assistance in design from Alan Pollock, e-learning coordinator, both of Abu Dhabi Women’s College, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Do you remember when you were a kid? When did you play with all your toys? Happy and satisfied ... with all scattered on the floor. And then your mother came into the room and she said: "Aaaahhhhhhhhhhh!! I want everything in its place: if I find something on the floor, I will throw it away!" Save the toys is a physics puzzle game where gravity is the enemy, you have managed to save all the toys! Sort all the toys without touching the ground to pass each level. ★★★★★ "Excellent game, great brain teaser" - Games review ★★★★★ "Not easy and addictive, a real discovery" - Holidaypirates ★★★★★ "So adorable" - Our moms Features: ● Physics puzzle ● Lots of levels ● Hours of fun guaranteed ● Full Free ● 100% safe (NO extended permissions) ● Physics brain teaser (use your wits) ● +100 levels ● Indie developer And please, share with your friends ;) ------------------------------- Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for help and the latest news: facebook.com/savemytoys.community twitter.com/savemytoys http://www.savemytoys.com

description: Dictionary for 51 language combinations, usable without an internet connection (offline dictionary). Vocabularies can be downloaded and updated within the app for free. Every translation gets checked by several other contributing users. The downloadable vocabularies are updated daily. NEW: Additional features can be activated within the app.

Outdoor Atlas is thought to be the companion for all your outdoor activities. It supports you offroad where classical street maps and navigation are of no help. With the built-in GPS, Outdoor Atlas always shows you your actual position on detailed topographic maps together with appropriate coordinates. The maps are downloaded once on request and stored locally to be used when no GSM connection is available. Currently, following maps are provided: ✔ OpenStreetMap ✔ OpenCycleMap Additional professional maps can be bought as In-App products. Currently available: ✔ Switzerland (swisstopo maps, official topographic maps of Switzerland incl. hiking trails, SwitzerlandMobility data) ✔ Germany (Alpstein, incl. hiking and biking trails, available in app-internal shop) ✔ Switzerland (Alpstein, incl. hiking and biking trails, available in app-internal shop) ✔ Austria (Alpstein, incl. hiking and biking trails, available in app-internal shop) ✔ France (IGN maps, France mainland and oversea territories, available in app-internal shop) ✔ Britain (Ordnance Survey maps) ✔ Northeast Italy (Alpstein, incl. hiking and biking trails, available in app-internal shop) ✔ Mallorca (Alpstein, available in app-internal shop) ✔ North America Maps (myTopo maps, installable as plugin) ✔ New Zealand (NZTopoMaps, installable as plugin) ✔ Spain (IDEE maps, installable as plugin) ✔ Norway (Statens kartverk, installable as plugin) ✔ Finland (installable as plugin) ...further maps to be announced. Application features: ✔ Supports internal and external (Bluetooth) GPS devices ✔ Supports built-in digital compass, respects declination ✔ Import / export tracks, waypoints in GPX or XOL format into internal database ✔ Built-in track editor, fully routing-capable ✔ Support WGS84, UTM, OSGrid, TM35FIN and LV03 coordinates ✔ Download map tiles once and use them offline ✔ Moving-Map mode (keep your position always centered on the screen) ✔ Search geolocations by names and address ✔ Retrieve geoinformation for position ✔ Use favorites to quickly jumpt to specific map, position, scale & layer ✔ TrackLog recording in background ✔ Follow-route mode (useful when visibility is bad) ✔ Goto-Waypoint mode (useful for geo-caching to find exact location) ✔ Infopanel shows you up-to-date information about position, tracklog and waypoint parameters ✔ Browse through the tour database with over 30'000 suggestions for outdoor adventures(hiking, cycling, mountain biking, inline skating, mountaineering, jogging etc.) in the Alps incl. tracks and desciptions. ✔ Browse tour reports from hikr.org ✔ In-App Shop to buy professional maps and app extensions (plugins) ✔ Synchronize your local track data with your favorite web portal, currently supported are SchweizMobil, outdooractive and gpsies.com Additional functionality can be added to Outdoor Atlas via its plugin-mechanism. Following plugins are currently available in the app's internal shop: ✔ Weather data CH (online weather data of Switzerland) ✔ Skiroutes CH (offline database of ski- and snowshoeroutes of the Swiss Alpine Club (SAC)) ✔ Wildlife protection Area CH (offline database with all protection areas in Switzerland) ✔ Swiss Public Transport Stations (Stations and timetable of Switzerland's public transport network) ✔ SwissNames (toponymy database containing all names from the Swiss topographic maps). This is a free app, but has ads on the map display. If you like to use an ad-free version, then buy the a PRO-licence in the app's internal shop. It will also activate valuable additional features. Please help to improve the product and report any problems to outdoor.atlas@corridor5.ch .

description: Coordinate Tools App to convert WGS84 coordinates from the decimal into the deg, min, sec value, show the current location and send the coordinates, click on a map to determine coordinates and find locations, compass and much more. Visit us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/NebSolutions/193862820690436 Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/NebSolutions Note: You can use negative values for coordinates on the western or southern hemisphere: Examples: For the north-western hemisphere: N: 40.71, E: -74.0 (New York City) For south-western hemisphere: N: -34.6, E: -58.4 (Buenos Aires) For the south-eastern hemisphere: N: -33.87, E: 151.2 (Sydney) For the north-eastern hemisphere: N: 52.52, E: 13.4 (Berlin) Keywords: WGS84, coordinate converter, compass, coordinates, find current position, send current position

Sleep Timer lets you fall asleep to your favorite music. You simply start your music, and then set the countdown timer. At the end of the countdown, Sleep Timer softly fades your music out and stops it. Allowing you to get your precious sleep and stops your battery from draining. Listen to music while falling asleep Sleep Timer softly lowers the volume and then turns your music off. It works just like a Sleep Timer on the stereo or TV. Use your favorite music player or even YouTube! Works with Google Play Music, TuneIn Radio, Spotify, YouTube and many many more. To verify whether it works with your favorite player, just download the app and try it out - it is free. Select how long you want the music to play Our intuitive and beautiful user interface allows you to effortlessly set the duration of the timer and start it. Create presets for your frequently used timers With our presets, you can switch between standard timers with just one tap Prevent your battery from draining At the end of the timer, the music is stopped* to prevent your phone from playing music all night and draining the battery. *For some apps, pausing the music does not work. In that case the phone volume will set to mute as a last resort. In this case, the music will continue playing. Shake to extend timer Sometimes falling asleep is not that easy. Our shake to extend allows you to shake the phone to extend the duration of the timer, without you having to unlock your phone. Free version The free version contains ads Premium version (Available via in-app) Ad-free Beautiful Widget for your homescreen Please try it with your favorite player before buying. You are welcome to join our beta forum, if you are interested in trying the newest Sleep Timer features before they are officially released. https://plus.google.com/communities/103722691842623837120 Developed by Patrick Boos - http://pboos.ch Designed by Nordic Usability - http://nordicusability.com

description: Nextstop provides an information service in real time for all public transport lines of Vienna . The current timetable and information of departure times of all stations are at your hands in no time. Additionally, to allow a better orientation, stations can be displayed on a road map. For route calculation, the departure and destination points can be either stations or positions on the road map. Nextstop shows you your route, from door to door including all footpaths. With nextstop you get important information for your travel all the time and always up to date. Start nextstop and see immediately the departures of surrounding stations! Features: * Automatically shows all public transit routes near you * Find departure times from stations * Find stations and get directions * Multimodal trip planner from door to door * Display stations in road map * Route including footpaths and taxi * Uses real-time predictions * Text message ticket generator (single / day ticket) * Network plan - including Nightliner * Traffic disruptions, maintenance and news

루미키즈 앱북 신데렐라는 기존의 플레이 방식의 보기만 하는 동화가 아닌 아이들이 직접 스토리 진행에 참여하도록 유도 하는 인터렉티브 동화 어플리케이션 입니다. 다양한 터치 이벤트, 터치시 말하기, 장면전환, 진동 피드백, 터치시 변신, 구두신기기, 말 달리기, 그림 기억 퍼즐 게임 등 다양한 기능을 담았습니다. (주)모겐토는 교육컨텐츠 및 이러닝 (E-learning)전문 업체로서 우리 아이들의 정서발달 및 지능발달에 도움이 될 수 있는 교육적이고 좋은 컨텐츠를 만들어 내기 위해 관련 전문인력으로 연구개발팀을 구성 다양한 교육 컨텐츠를 연구개발 하고 있습니다. 유아 동화 어플리케이션 를 출시하게 되었습니다. 현재 한국어 버젼으로 등록되었으나 영어 및 중국어 등 외국어 학습 요소를 추가한 업그레이드 버젼을 준비 중입니다. 그외 다른 많은 명작 동화 스토리를 개성있고 아기자기한 예쁜 그림 스타일로 담아내려고 준비 중에 있으며, 아이들이 흥미를 갖게하는 학습게임 및 재미있는 기능들도 추가하려고 합니다. 개선된 많은 신규 작품이 빨리 출시될 수 있도록 여러분의 많은 기대와 호응 부탁드립니다. *^^* 사운드 소스 제공 : 에코노베이션 ---- 개발자 연락처 : +82234613934

La App de Santander Chile te entrega la libertad de tener todos los servicios de Banca Móvil en tus manos. Está disponible solamente en español y permite a los clientes de Santander Chile: * Consultar saldos de cuentas corrientes, cuentas vista y de tarjetas de crédito. • Ver sus movimientos de cuentas corrientes y cuentas vista. • Pagara sus tarjetas de crédito. • Transferencias entre sus cuentas, de cuenta a cuenta o desde una tarjeta de crédito a una cuenta. • Transferencias de fondos a terceros (requieren SuperClave y/o Clave 3.0), a otros bancos. • Realizar SuperGiros (requiere SuperClave y/o Clave 3.0). • Pagar cuentas de servicios y recarga de celulares (requieren SuperClave). • Ver consolidado de Inversiones: Consulta de saldos en distintos productos de inversión, como cuentas de ahorro, fondos mutuos, acciones, depósitos a plazo y APV. • Comprar y vender acciones. • Tomar y rescatar depósitos a plazo. • Solicitar en línea Créditos Personales. Además, cuenta con: • Localizar y búsqueda de sucursales y cajeros de Banco Santander cercanos a su posición. • Realizar búsquedas de beneficios y descuentos más cercanos a su posición. • Ayuda: Proporciona teléfonos de contacto para atención al cliente. • Acceso a principales indicadores económicos, tales como UF, UTM, USD, EURO, IPSA e IGPA. • Próximamente podrás realizar Inversiones en línea. La aplicación solo es válida para los clientes de Banco Santander Chile. Santander Chile's App delivers you the freedom to have all Mobile Banking services in your hands. It is available only in Spanish and allows customers of Santander Chile: * See current account balances, view accounts and credit cards. • View your current account movements and sight accounts. • You will pay your credit cards. • Transfers between accounts, account to account or from a credit card account. • Transfers of funds to third parties (requiring superkey and / or Key 3.0), to other banks. • Perform SuperGiros (requires superkey and / or key 3.0). • Pay utility bills and recharge phones (requires superkey). • See Consolidated Investments: Check balances in different investment products, such as savings accounts, mutual funds, stocks, deposits and APV. • Buy and sell shares. • Take and bail deposits. • Personal Loans Apply Online.  It also has: • Locate and search for branches and ATMs of Banco Santander near their position. • Search of benefits and discounts closest to your position. • Help: Provides contact numbers for customer service. • Access to key economic indicators, such as UF, UTM, USD, EURO, IPSA and IGPA. • Soon you can make online investments. The application is only valid for customers of Banco Santander Chile.

description: A warhammer mathhammer app, which works out the odds of which unit will win when fighting. -- Issues? -- Get in touch with me on twitter: http://twitter.com/FantasyMathHamr I'm very happy to help, and appreciate feedback. If you post issues in the google market reviews section, I have no way to contact you. Thanks! -- Issue: "could not extract public data" -- If your handset reports this when first run, it's because the app needs more space to install. The download size is 6MB, but it expands to approx 20MB when it's first run. If there isn't enough space, you'll receive the error: "could not extract public data". The app works from SD card, it can be moved and run from there if there is space. -- Description -- Do you play Warhammer Fantasy Battle? Do you know all the units, and how they'll perform in combat against each other by heart? Me neither! How many times have you faced a unit of Ogre IronGuts and had no idea how well your Warriors will perform against them? Are you throwing away a unit, or will they easily win their combat? This app will give you a good idea of how they'll fare. It fully simulates the melee between two units, until one of the units loses. It includes combat resolution, leadership rolls and unit special rules. The combat between two units is repeated 10 times to give you a good idea of how your unit will perform. You can choose which units, their size, formation and various unit options, before simulating the fight. Development is ongoing, there are many units and unit options to cover in warhammer. Is your favourite unit missing? Let me know! Feel free to get in touch with feedback and suggestions via the feedback button below. This app is a supplement to copyrighted material owned by Games Workshop. It does not expose any Model statistics to end users so as not to duplicate or distribute that material.
release_text: V0.68 Thanks to Aussie Gamer Vaughan Keyburn for all his notes on O&G bugs. O&G bug fixes listed here: http://blogofgrudges.blogspot.ie/2012/09/fmh-nights-of-bugfixing.html General: - Mounts would act as their parent unit and just use their stat line when attacking i.e. Demigryph knight mounts would use their knights statline when attacking. Fixed. - Cavalry Mounts were receiving supporting attacks, they shouldn't. Fixed. - and many more listed in app.

Support ends with CM11. *This theme saves battery on amoled screens* Black android! This is DarkHolo theme for Cyanogenmod CM9,CM10,CM10.1,CM10.2,CM11 and other custom roms. This theme is like the stock holo theme, but with dark/black backgrounds, black panels, dialogs and widgets. This theme will always be free, so if you want to support me you can buy one of my paid themes or the donate version. FEATURES: -black backgrounds for apps that depend from Theme.Holo of framework (like various menus,settings,downloads,some stock browser's parts,dsp manager,torch and much other) -black panels,dialog and popups -many dark apps like dialer, contacts, messagging, clock.. -you can see the full list of what is themed here: http://goo.gl/Fcf7ri COMPATIBILITY: -DarkHolo theme actually is compatible with XHDPI,HDPI,MDPI,LDPI devices (should be compatible with all devices) (As I own only a device, send me a mail if there are problems) INSTRUCTIONS: -Apply theme in theme chooser and reboot. -If it says "Sorry this theme is missing assets for your device" apply anyway and reboot. -if it says "This theme is incorrectly compiled" apply default theme,reboot,apply DarkHolo, reboot. For questions, problems and requests, send me a e-mail. (If the app is not available in your country, please e-mail me) If you like, add/follow me on Google Plus: http://goo.gl/AFm9wU Nickname on XDA-Developers and other forums: SpadaBoss Enjoy DarkHolo Theme!

description: Stock Jelly Bean 4.2 theme for the cm9/AOKP theme engine! Includes nearly all visual differences between ICS and JB to satisfy any feelings of phone-envy while waiting for cm10 or an official update from your carrier ;) *IGNORE the missing assets error (false alarm) and remember to REBOOT your device after applying the theme for all changes to take effect! See below for more detailed instructions* **YOU MUST HAVE A ROOTED DEVICE RUNNING A ROM BASED ON CM9 OR AOKP WITH THE THEME CHOOSER APP PREINSTALLED IN ORDER TO APPLY THIS THEME!** Features: ★ 4.2 framework-res and systemUI ★ Full support for XHDPI, HDPI and MDPI ★ Official 4.2 search bar for Trebuchet ★ New voice search icons in keyboard and browser ★ New widget resize handles (Trebuchet) ★ New notification pulldown: - Day of week next to date - settings and clear buttons - bottom bar - date color - button press color - hr bar background - notify tile backgrounds ★ Default Jelly Bean wallpaper ★ New images for “null” wifi and data signal indicators ★ New on/off switches in settings menu ★ New adb debugging icon Instructions: 1. Make sure you have a rooted phone with CM9 theme chooser 2. Install JB theme from market 3. Open “system settings” menu 4. Press “themes” tab 5. Scroll over to "Jelly Bean Stock" theme and click apply (see screenshots) 6. IGNORE THE “MISSING ASSETS” ERROR (this is referring to a forward slash in the manifest and can only be fixed by compiling on Linux, but the theme is fully compatible with MDPI and HDPI so don’t worry) 7. REBOOT (important!) 8. Enjoy your new JB device :) More info: THIS APP IS COMPLETELY FREE WITH NO ADS! Feedback is always welcome, but please respect the time we put into developing our apps and do not post rude comments or this may not be the case in the next version! The new themed search widget and resize handles will only show up in Trebuchet and Jelly Bean Launcher! If you use a different launcher but still want the new search bar, try our JB Search app that includes the new bar in 9 colors! If you have any questions or comments, please don’t hesitate to send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible! Jelly Bean 4.1 is a registered trademark of Google, Inc.

Are you commuting on Wellington's Metlink public transport? Then Arrivo Wellington is your ideal companion. Arrivo Wellington is a powerful offline timetable app which provides fast timetable access for all transport on Metlink's transport network in Wellington. BUSES, TRAINS, CABLECAR & FERRY. With Arrivo in your pocket you have access to Wellington's transit information anywhere and anytime. Unlike other transit applications you do not need network access to check your timetable information. This means you get results fast. Arrivo makes your commute easy with a variety of benefits: * Arrivo works anytime and anywhere. No data network connection required. * Immediately find the next departure for your Stop. By Route, by Stop name or from your saved Favourites. * View the Stops for your Trip on the map (maps screens require a network connection). * Save your favourite Routes & Stops for convenient access. * Use predictive search from the action bar on the top of the app to quickly find your Route or Stop. * View next Departures for any transit Stop or Station in Wellington. * View Trip details. * All the timetable information is stored on your phone. * Arrivo informs you when updated timetable information is available for download from the 'Settings' screen. Don't worry, Arrivo has the tiniest timetable files among all other transit apps out there. This saves you both bandwidth and storage space on your device. Check your notifications bar to download the most up-to-date timetable available. * Note: all times displayed are local Wellington times. Get access to fast timetable information and download Arrivo Wellington today! For any feedback or bugs please contact us on Twitter (@trip_mate), our website ( http://www.tripmate.info/contact ) or like us on Facebook ( http://facebook.com/tripmateapp ).

description: It's time to make keeping in touch fun and personal! Use Marco Polo to communicate with people who matter the most. Marco Polo is a video walkie talkie with memory. Your friend can start chatting with you right away or they can reply later when they have time. You can also look and feel awesome with doodles, make your friends laugh with doodles or funny voices. Marco Polo is the perfect way to communicate! HOW IT WORKS 1. Tap on your friend's name 2. Start chatting 3. Your friend can respond right away, or wait until it’s convenient FEATURES ** Feel close to those you love- no matter the distance ** Trust that your communication is private ** Talk all you want- no limits ** Watch all you want- chats don’t disappear ** Look and feel awesome ** Easy to use and easy on your data plan KEEP IN TOUCH ON THE GO ** Sing happy birthday to your friend through the movie star filter ** Say “good night” to your bf with the night vision filter ** Send your friends vids of your awesome vacation ** “Stretch out” a conversation if you’re busy or use it like a walkie-talkie for non-stop fun ** Stay connected wherever you are: in the subway, waiting in line, at a concert… ** Have a group conversation with your besties so everyone is kept in the loop Bye-bye phone tag and awkward voicemails...and hello Marco Polo! CONTACT US help@marcopolo.me www.marcopolo.me

description: A wonderful memory game and a cute collection of animals for toddlers and kids. your kid loves memory games , puzzles and want to play with every kind of animal in the Zoo ? This is the app for you! Your child will discover animals and their sounds and in the meanwhile will exercise his memory! Zoo memory games for toddlers and kids is an educational and entertaining game. It is a nice, simple, fun, and colorful game for toddlers and kids! Play with cute animals ! A lot of different kids memory games and many funny animals to keep your kid busy. Easy to learn and to control: -touch the screen and try to match the animals pairs hidden behind the bush, find the couple! -interact with all the elements on the screen when a game is solved -when a game is completed tap the arrow to change to the next level You can also choose the difficulty level: easy, medium and hard, to suit the needs of each child and exercise your toddler memory. Available for all screen resolutions and devices, including tablet device as Kindle and Samsung ! Simple and intuitive, your baby will have lots of fun for hours ! This educational game will help your toddler to improve skills in problem solving, logical and cognitive skills, concentration and memory. Find out all the animals hiding under the bushes! Features: - high quality memory game for toddlers and preschool kids from ages 0 to 7 with very cute animals - Easy to use and control - fun for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children and pre-teens, designed for preschool boys and girls - Simple for toddlers and babies with different levels of difficulty - Toddlers develop their fine motor skills and improve their memory - Play with your child or let them play alone - use it to keep your baby or toddler occupied - more than 100 animals in this FULL version: lion, tiger, elephant, birds, pig, ants, sheep, fox, horse, chicken, dog, bear and many others wild animals - randomly generated memory games! this educational game will never get old! - Does not require internet connection! - Does not contain Advertising! This is the FULL supported version, If you want to try the FREE version go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.romesoft.toddlers.memory.zoo Fun and enjoyable to learn and play with great colorful memory games, this is a must have app! A lot of educational animals memory games for toddlers and young kids!! Your child will admire every kind of animal and will hear funny sound effects! Ideal for children but also fun for adults who want to play with their kids! This app is a memory trainer for all the family ! A fun brain training app for kids! Are you ready to challenge your memory ? Match up the baby animals pairs! Zoo memory games for kids is a funny memory game which also helps your kid training his memory ability. A lot of game for children, the best games for kids, apps for babies, games for girls, match game, puzzle, educational games, all from romeLab !

Snap your masterpiece and we make & ship it as a tee! Snaptee is the first mobile app in the world that enables you to create your own custom T-shirts with just a few taps of your smartphone. Regardless of your design experience, you can use the easy and fun tools to DESIGN, ORDER, and even SELL your unique creations completely in-app. Snaptee is filled with awesome features like photo and Instagram integration, choice of fonts and colors, custom filters and cool design templates to inspire your creativity. Once you’re done making your one-of-a-kind T-shirt, share your design with friends over social media or better yet, invite them to follow you in Snaptee and start building each other’s Lockers. The innovative Remix button is also great for collaborations. Unlock your design to the Snaptee community and be amazed at how users from all over the world can reinterpret and be inspired by your art. And if you think other people will love your T-shirt as much as you do, make sure to turn on the Publish and Sell button after finishing your design to make it available for purchase. For every T-shirt ordered, you earn a 10% commission on the sale. Before Snaptee, making your own T-shirt was such a hassle. Now, there’s: --No more searching for an affordable graphic designer or a friend who knows Photoshop. --No more looking for a print shop that’s willing to make you just one T-shirt. --No more crowdsourcing, crowdfunding, or crowdvoting other people’s designs. --No more settling for T-shirts that are just good enough. With Snaptee, you can make the stylish T-shirt that YOU want to wear. When ordered for US$19.99 plus worldwide shipping, all virtual designs are brought to life one at a time through Snaptee’s efficient digital printing process, made on 100% organic cotton, and shipped directly to you, no matter where you are in the world. So speak your mind. Show off your artistic sense. Support a cause. Get people thinking. Bring a smile to someone’s face with a funny quote. And tell someone you love them in the most dynamic way. Let your imagination fly and Snaptee can help you realize your creativity. HAPPY SNAPPING!
release_text: --Minor bug fixes have been made as part of the continuing effort to improve the Snaptee app

description: Highly addictive Mahjong solitaire game that runs in full screen so it is easier to see the Mahjong tiles. This game is often referred to as Shanghai Mahjong (or Mahjongg) and can entertain for hours on end. Anyone that is interested in playing Patience or Solitaire type games of any type will enjoy playing Mahjong. There are 6 levels available at the start and many more can be unlocked in sections of 6 (Finish 3 out of 6 to unlock the next section) as you progress through Mahjong Madness. It is possible to Save position mid-game by backing out of a level, you will have the option of starting this partly completed level the next time you start a Mahjong Madness level. Various backgrounds are available and it is also possible to set your favourite as your permanent background (including selecting an image of your own from your device). Higher resolution tiles for larger screen devices (such as the Nexus One & Motorola Droid etc.) making the Mahjong experience even better. The game uses touch screen tile selection but tiles can be selected with the trackball (if there is one on your device). End sequence for all those players who are skilled enough to complete all the available levels available on Mahjong Madness. Good luck!
release_text: Higher resolution graphics added for use with the Honeycomb tablets (Android 3.0 - such as the Motorola Xoom).

Go Launcher Ex has come on the Android scene by storm as the Launcher to use for theme connoisseurs. Allowing users to piece together various elements from different themes in order to create a personalized visual experience on their phone. When you call something a theme it can mean many things. To me a theme should change the entire visual appearance of your phone, at least as much as can be changed by that theme. So when I set out to create my Vindicated theme for Go Launcher Ex that was my goal. To create a compete theme. While each new theme is unique, you'll be able to recognize your app icons easily if you use many of my different themes. Looking for a good Valentine's Day theme? Le Code civil des Français, Complet, GRATUIT, FREE ---------------------------------------------------- Toucher un article pour marquer le texte. Excellent pour les étudiants en droit, des avocats, et tout citoyen qui veut savoir à propos de la loi. ---------------------------------------------------- Le Code civil des Français, appelé usuellement « Code civil » (souvent abrégé en « C. Civ. » ou « CC ») ou « Code Napoléon », regroupe les lois relatives au droit civil français, c’est-à-dire l'ensemble des règles qui déterminent le statut des personnes (livre Ier), celui des biens (livre II) et celui des relations entre les personnes (livres III et IV) privées. Promulgué le 21 mars 1804 (30 ventôse an XII), par Napoléon Bonaparte, il reprend une partie des articles de la coutume de Paris et du droit écrit du Sud de la France. Modifié et augmenté à de nombreuses reprises à partir de la IIIe République, la plupart des articles primitifs des titres II et III subsistent (plus de 1 120 au début des années 2000 sur les 2 281 articles d'origine1). Le Code civil constitue le statut des personnes de nationalité française (citoyen français), de leurs familles et de leurs relations, excepté pour les Français habitant à Mayotte, la Nouvelle-Calédonie et Wallis-et-Futuna qui, en vertu de l'article 75 de la Constitution de 1958, n'ont pas opté pour le statut de droit commun et qui possèdent le statut civil coutumier. Le Code Napoléon est également toujours en vigueur dans l'île Maurice, laissé en place après la conquête britannique, même s'il a quelque peu évolué par la suite. Ce texte a été beaucoup modifié depuis la IIIe République mais reste, aujourd'hui encore, le fondement du droit civil français et, plus largement, de tout le droit français. Le doyen Jean Carbonnier disait ainsi du Code civil qu'il est « la constitution civile des Français ». Son domaine est en effet extrêmement large : le droit des personnes (le nom, le statut de la personne humaine, la personnalité juridique, les incapacités, c'est-à-dire les conditions permettant de passer des actes, d'être propriétaire de biens, etc.), le droit de la famille (filiation, mariage, pacs, divorce), le droit patrimonial de la famille (régimes matrimoniaux, libéralités, successions), le droit des biens (quels types de biens, meubles ou immeubles, la propriété, la possession), le droit des obligations et des contrats, ainsi que dans le livre I des principes généraux du droit comme la nullité des lois non publiées (art. 1), la question de la non rétroactivité des lois et leur caractère général (art. 2), le caractère obligatoire pour les étrangers et leurs biens des règlements de sûretés et de police, l'obligation pour le juge de se prononcer sur toutes les causes qui lui sont soumises (art.4), l'interdiction de donner un caractère général et réglementaire à ses décisions (art.5), la nullité des contrats dont l'objet est contraire aux bonnes moeurs ou à ordre public (art.6), ainsi que le principe de la prescription trentenaire des droits et des actions et ses dérogations. The Civil Code of the French, Full, FREE, FREE -------------------------------------------------- - Touching an article to mark the text. Great for law students, lawyers, and any citizen who wants to know about the law. -------------------------------------------------- - The French Civil Code, commonly called "Civil Code" (often abbreviated as "C. Civ." Or "CC") or "Code Napoleon", includes the laws on French civil law, that is to say the set of rules that determine the status of people (Book I), the property (Book II), and the relationships between people (Books III and IV) private. Issued March 21, 1804 (30 Ventose year XII) by Napoleon Bonaparte, he took some of the articles of the custom of Paris and statutory law in the South of France. Modified and increased many times from the Third Republic, most of the original articles of Titles II and III remain (more than 1,120 in the early 2000s on 2,281 items of origin1). The Civil Code is the status of French nationals (French citizen), their families and their relationships, except for the French living in Mayotte, New Caledonia and Wallis and Futuna, which under Article 75 of the Constitution of 1958, did not opt ​​for the status of common law and have customary civil status. The Napoleonic Code is still in force in Mauritius, left in place after the British conquest, although it has changed somewhat thereafter. This text was much changed since the Third Republic but remains even today the foundation of French civil law and, more broadly, any French law. The dean said Jean Carbonnier and the Civil Code it is "the civil constitution of the French". Its area is extremely large effect: the right of people (the name, the status of the human person, legal status, disabilities, that is to say, the conditions for the placement of acts, to own property, etc.), the Family Law (birth, marriage, civil partnerships, divorce), heritage family law (marriage settlements, gifts, inheritances), property law (what types of property, movable or immovable, ownership, possession), the law of obligations and contracts, as well as in Book I of the general principles of law as void unpublished laws (art. 1), the issue of non-retroactivity of laws and their character General (art. 2), the mandatory for foreigners and their property collateral and police regulations, the obligation for the judge to decide all cases submitted to it (Article 4), the prohibition provides a general regulatory nature and its decisions (Article 5), the invalidity of contracts whose purpose is contrary to morality or public order (Article 6) and the principle of the thirty-year prescription of the rights and actions and exceptions.

TO BRING YOUR GAMING EXPERIENCE TO THE NEXT LEVEL PLAY ALIEN ATTACK WITH THE APPTOYZ APPBLASTER!! Visit www.apptoyz.com for more details. THIS IS A GYRO BASED GAME. War Fire is a game of simple, fun and addictive strategy. You have to use all your wits to eliminate fire and win the war of fire! This war game is completely free, without in-app purchase. It is suitable for the whole family, even children. Languages ​​available: Albanian, English; American, Australian, Basque; Chinese; Croatian; Dutch; Czech; Catalan; Danish; Spanish; Estonian; Finnish; French; Galician; Welsh; Hungarian; Indonesian; Italian; Irish; Icelandic; Japanese; Latvian; Lithuanian; Maltese; Norwegian; Portuguese; Polish; Romanian; Malay; Slovak; Slovenian; Swedish; Tagalog; Turkish Description: You embody firefighters must extinguish fires in a merciless war. You can provide several moves ahead and develop an effective strategy to fight the fire. During part of the war department, you have to take risks. Everything can change from one moment to another. Even when all seems lost, the flames are gaining ground, with a little strategy you can reverse the situation and win the war of fire. You have to choose, what is your strategy, this is your war! Features: - Strategy game - Completely free - Single Interface for children and the whole family theme firefighters

Sleep Easily Guided Meditation was written and read by Shazzie Love. As an acclaimed author of five books, the creator of several life transformation programmes and an international speaker and workshop facilitator, her quest is always the same: to help you on your journey back to the centre of your own heart. Relax into her soothing words and let go fully into a deeply relaxing sleep. During this twenty six minute recording, you’ll be gently guided every step of the way to relax your whole body and mind. You can also set a wake-up alarm through the built-in alarm clock before launching the session. Throughout this beautiful recording, you’ll be held by the music and sounds created by Ali Calderwood. Ali is an accomplished musician and healer who also produces the exquisite music of Anima. Ali’s uniquely crafted music soundscapes within this guided meditation contains specifically designed combinations of healing frequencies which will have a deep, therapeutic effect on you. You will experience state of the art production techniques such as whispering echoed background vocals which pan from left to right across the stereo range. This unique effect will help you relax deeper into the meditative sleep . You will also hear some 60 BPM digital sound effects as well as powerful subliminal suggestions that compound the therapeutic effect. This meditation will leave you refreshed, renewed and resonating so much more from your heart and a place of stillness. From there, you’ll be able to attract towards you everything your heart desires, without your head getting in the way. Do NOT listen while driving or operating machinery. If you suffer with serious depression or epilepsy please consult your doctor before listening to this App. This App Includes: - Sleep Easily Guided Meditation (Running Time: 26:46) - Set wake-up time (built-in Alarm Clock) - How To Use This App - About Shazzie & Ali eBook - Diviniti Publishing Home - Share This App Developed by Arkenea Technologies (www.arkenea.com) for Diviniti Publishing Ltd.

Real Trucker: Extreme Condition is a PC level truck driving simulator. Are you bored from the driving or parking games that has the same template? Try Real Trucker: Extreme Condition which has a completely original and huge map and drive its unique vehicles. Explore PC level gaming on your android phone or tablet. MAIN FEATURES: - 4 Languages (English, German, Turkish, Russian) - 13 Cities - 26 Different loads - 9 Trucks - Real-time traffic (adjustable) - Animated Day/Night system - Weather system (rain&snow) - Animated water - Automatic and manual transmission - Shift assist (manuel shifting) - Cruise Control system (real-time) - Steering wheel and parking brakes - Side mirrors both left and right (works when camera is inside the truck) - Traffic rules (reverse driving and line crossing) - Traffic lights (has no penalty yet) - Advanced game map - Mini map (with zoom) - Abandon job option - Simple in-game tutorial - Supports vibration feedback - Full ARM6 support - High gaming performance (works with even most of the Allwinner tablets) MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: - 1.0 GHZ single core ARM6/ARM7 CPU (usually works with down to 800 Mhz CPU's but satisfaction is not quarenteed) - 256 MB of Ram (Android 2.3) and 512 MB of Ram (Android 4.0+) - 128 MB graphics card with Open GLES 2.0 support - 50 MB of free disk space - 480x320 (w,h) screen size up to 1920x1080 (w,h) - Multitouch screen RECOMMENDED SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: - Dual core 1.0 GHZ ARM6/ARM7 CPU - 256 MB of Ram (Android 2.3) and 512 MB of Ram (Android 4.0+) - 128 MB graphics card with Open GLES 2.0 support - 50 MB of free disk space - Best for 800x480, 1024x600, 1280x720, 1280x800, 1920x1080 (w,h) -Multitouch screen
