description: Solve the puzzle to stop the stampede! The river is rising and the rapids are raging! Can you help the animals to safety by solving the puzzle? AnimaLogic is a brilliant puzzle game that will have you working your brain overtime to solve these wonderfully smart safari adventure. Lions, rhinos, monkeys and elephants are all waiting to get to the other side of the river. Animals can only cross the river bridge one at a time and they must travel in the proper order to safely arrive at the other side. It will take some serious thought and strategic planning to get ALL the animals to the other side. The lite version gives you access to limited number of puzzles, while the full paid version let's you play all 60 puzzles (and more to come). A note on permissions: Internet access is not need to play the game, but is used to send ANONYMOUS usage statistics to the developer to improve user experience in future updates.

****App Store***** one of the most popular Gomoku, ranks highest in the similar and ranks first in China (and stable among TOP 3). Gomoku is originated from China(五子棋) and popular in Japan(五目並べ), korea(오목) and all over the world. It is also know as Gomoku, Renju, Gobang or Five in a row. The rule is simple. Black plays first, and players alternate in placing a stone of their color on an empty intersection. The winner is the first player to get an unbroken row of five stones horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Game Features -Single-player challenge computer AI, able to choose different levels of AI to challenge. -Standard 15x15 board -Accurately touching, moving and releasing the chess. -Clean and neat graphics -Nice background music Welcome follow us: Twitter：@beforestudio Support Email： before.sp@gmail.com

Optimized for Tegra, Adreno, Power VR, GPU's The LevitOn Racers HD for Android is a thrilling, exciting and challenging game app from BeltraWay. LevitOn racers features 14 hard core opponents and the velocity is fast and furious. Ride your ship over the boost arrows to get a huge surge of speed and fly past other menacing opponents. The start up screen features several customization options to make your gaming experience truly unique. Players have the option to change the graphics, alter the controls between touch and tilt, view the current high scores and view the credits for this awesome high velocity game. When starting a new race players have the option to select different modes including a time trial mode, GP race or play in practice mode. No matter what the selection LevitOn Racers provides a high speed and extremely thrilling racing experience. Players can select different ships with each having different strength and weaknesses. The better and more expensive the ship the faster and more controlled it will be. Players have to build up credits by racing in and winning races which allows them to purchase the higher quality ships. Search terms: action, racing, future, apocalypse, rockets, high speed, arcade, car, war, fast, turbo, nitro, F-Zero, wipeout, gravity, Tegra, Adreno, Power VR
release_text: 1.05 - Added Compatibility for different devices 1.12 - Added Multi language support some bug fixes, new graphics for menu 1.13 - Fixed Some bugs in advanced stages 1.15 - Fixed many bugs, a lot of improvements

description: Control a bloodthirsty underground creature by tilting your phone! Eat people, destroy police cars, trucks, tanks. Improve your creature upgrading 5 deadly skills. Face the final Enemy. Unlock the world of the undead. The game features: * 60 levels on 2 different locations * 25 enemy types inclouding Bosses * 5 worm deadly skills * HD display support! * Add Free Version

Love classic are war games? Love 3D Shooting games? Well Air War 3D Classic combines the two. Take to the skies in this classic style dog fight sim. Can you take down the enemy units and claim the skies for yourself? Try to beat your own score and see exactly how many planes you can shoot down in this airplane fighter simulation.

Love air fight simulation games? Well Air War 3D: Invasion takes you right into the battle! Do you have what it takes to destroy all the enemy forces and take on the skies alone? This 3D flying fighting simulation is a real test of your reflexes and battle skills! What score can you get and how many enemy planes can you take down?

Get into this 3D city with your mad racing skills. Racing City 3D really tests your driving and drift skills around these mid city tracks. Can you place in the top 3 and earn big money to unlock new cars? Each car has better stats than the previous allowing you to destroy the other racers as you progress. Do you have crazy racing skills to beat the other racers? No matter where you place in the race. You will earn money but the higher the better. How many cars can you unlock by driving to the first place and saving money? You will really notice the speed increase on the top cars. Only problem is can you turn in time for the speed? Well get racing, earning money and unlocking cars to see! Features: Car shop - Earn money from every race you compete in. No matter where you place you will always get a reward. Save these to unlock more powerful sports cars. 3 Huge Tracks - Inner City, Metropolis and City Park all with multiple laps and a completely different experience in each track. Replay value - No limit or restriction on how many times you can try to win. With new unlocked cars you can destroy the opposition giving it amazing replay value. AI - Race against amazing AI drivers. All with different skill abilities from pro drivers to novice. Allowing you to comfortably get into the game early on. But still have something to beat as you advance. 7 awesome cars to unlock and drive. Full 3D Graphics Engine - Worked on for months by multiple developers to give you the best experience possible on your device.

Ever wanted to be a Fireman and drive the big truck? Well here's your chance in this cool 3D simulation. Get yourself behind the wheel and help to park this fire truck. With tilt controls you will have a fun time. Well lets go, get to the parking spot in your fire engine without crashing. Park up and move onto the next level. With 15 fun levels you are sure to have hours of fun. Can you beat them all and become the best fireman parking master of all time?

Forklift Sim is back! With the second version bringing all new 3D levels! 10 forklift packed levels of none stop builder madness. How many packages can you park on the correct position? Can you stack the shelves with crates, boxes and barrels? The object is to move the items shown on screen to the correct position on the units at the back of the packing warehouse. Once you get all of these items to the correct spot using your forklift. You can then move onto the next. With levels getting harder as you progress. You will really need to perfect your forklift driving skills to make it all the way to the end in this fun 3D Simulation?
release_text: Improved graphics and fixed a GUI bug.

description: Jump into the endless space runner and race to pick up points and avoid hostile units. This 3D space flying game is packed with hours of fun. With different ships to choose from and scores you can challenge yourself to get the best score you can. Which space ship flyer will work best for you? Try all 3 and get the feel for them. What are you waiting for? Get flying in 3D Space Racer!

Animal Hunter is here. If you're looking for a sniper game where you need to hunt for all kinds of animals, from wolves and deer to bears. Each level gives you a set of animals to shoot. Take your rifle. Set your scope and hunt! Can you get your shots before the time runs out? 12 action packed 3D levels will really keep you going and test your sniper skills. This hunting simulation game is filled with stunning 3D creatures and scenes to immerse you into your surroundings. Deer and wolves take one shot to put down. But when you get to the bears. It's going to take 2. Be careful. If you miss the noise will make them go running. Which in turn, makes it harder for you to aim and shoot. Features: - Amazing 3D graphics build just for your Android device. - 12 huge levels. Each with a new challenge. - Real sniper physics.
You are alone, there is no one to help you. Empty streets. Death is waiting in the alley. Be careful, go only straight ahead. Don’t look at him and you’ll remain alive.

With the help of this application you can easily solve your Rubik's cube. You can use your phone's camera to take pictures of your cube, or just simply put the colors in manually and this app will solve your cube for you. You just need to follow the instructions. It's using an advanced solving method called Fridrich method. All alghorithms this method requires are implemented in the solving process, and you can also view these algorithms on categorised pages, making it easy to learn them. You can also set your own cube colors, color scheme and prefered first solved side inside the options

Ski Sim 3D is a fun filled, action packed Ski simulation game. Travel down the slopes covered in snow on your two skies. Avoid rocks, trees and other obsticles along the way. Do you have what it takes to reach the bottom of the mountain? Collect rockets along the way to speed up your decent. What's the best time you can ski to the bottom in?

A very simple but addictive game with one aim - SMASH THE BOXES!! The screen is divided into 3 sections, once the box reaches the green line tap the right section to smash it and gain points. It will get faster over time, and also if you tap at the wrong time. If you have any ideas for further development of the game, let me know - I read all reviews and emails. Features:- -Fast addictive gameplay. -Test your reactions. -Leaderboards to compete against other players.

BOOM! Shoot across the city. Survive against the drones and keep going for as long as possible, get power-ups/buffs along the way as you level up and compete on the leaderboards. FEATURES: -Fast paced shooting action. -Powers to unlock (Shield, Fireball). -Power-ups as you destroy the drones. -Tap on screen to shoot. -8 bit Retro style graphics. -Multiple weapons to unlock (Shotgun, Uzi). -Fun ragdol physics. By the way, I'm still actively working on this game so any feedback or ideas are most welcome! Super Ragdoll Man is based around fast paced fun action, originally based off ideas like "Kitten Cannon" or "Kitty Cannon" where you hit bombs and spikes to try to get the best distance possible. Drones will follow you until your health hits zero, so you have to shoot back by tapping on the screen in the direction you want. Super Ragdoll Man is set in an Apocalypse city scene, where you get shot from a boat out side of the city to get to the other side. You control a ragdol man who is armed with only a pistol (you can buy other weapons), but also has wizard like powers such as fireballs, shields, boost powers, bombs - all which can be unlocked through gold. I'm hoping to add more features and modes to this game such as zombies, customization of the character/ragdol, more weapons (like minigun, rocket launcher, grapple hook), ship customization, more types of enemies, planes and birds you can hit in the sky, more powers (jetpack launcher, flap power, ice/earth/electric powers), possibility to get to a height where you can go into space and more! so watch out for future updates! Super Ragdoll Man INSTRUCTIONS: -Shoot yourself out of the cannon at the beginning by waiting until the power bar is as high as possible and pressing shoot at the right time. -Try to get as far through the city as possible. -As you are flying, use the boost button to gain more velocity but make sure you don't use all your mana at once! -Drones will begin to fly after you and hunt you down, shooting lasers - you can shoot them back with your weapon by tapping in the direction you want to shoot (or holding in the direction for automatic weapons). -You will gain gold by hitting to crates, but try to avoid them if possible as they slow you down. -Use your gold to buy powers in the power menu, once bought drag them to the power bar at the top. -Use your gold also to buy weapons (Shotgun, Uzi, more to come..). Enjoy!
release_text: New in 1.16 -Better GUI scaling. -New song. -Physics optimizations. New in 1.15 -Minor bug fixes. -Small modifications to physics. -Updated libraries to new version. More weapons and enemies coming in next update!

[-] NEWS [-] Keep up to date with the latest Titanfall news. There is also news from Brass Monkeigh (this app's developer) so you can always know when updates are coming. You just won't find this level of detail and quality in any other strategy guide app! ********************************************* The Ultimate Utility line of apps has been recommended by popular gamers such as: Drift0r ChaosxSilencer FaZe Kross xJawz Vikkstar123 MrDalekJD Juicetra (Just search their channels) Ultimate Utility for Titanfall is an unofficial guide designed for use with Titanfall. Anyone with an iOS device is familiar with the helpful tools Brass Monkeigh Apps designs for gamers, and now our great apps are making their way to Android! If you have ever played Black Ops 2, you know that your total career deaths are no longer displayed in the barracks or on ELITE. This app will show you your total deaths, as well as help you improve your overall K/D ratio by showing you how many more kills you need to improve your ratio. description: Get the official ChaosxSilencer app - now on Android! View videos, keep up with news & content, plus e-mail Jimmy directly!

Chaosxsilencer is subscribed to by over half a million avid Call of Duty players for his helpful videos and tips. «Ball Worlds» is an entertaining logical game which is based on real physics. In the course of it, the players will have to assemble various shapes out of the balls. On some levels you can to assemble the shape without any hurry. On other levels you have to hurry to assemble the shape before the bombs explode. Bear in mind that every second counts! Assemble shape under Earth gravity, underwater as well as in zero gravity. Discover the world of the most advanced mobile games where you have to solve exciting puzzles. _____________________________________ KEY FEATURES: ● A completely new and innovative game mechanics which are based on real life physics ● Simple controls easy to master by adults as well as children ● 6 worlds and new coming soon ● 90 levels and new coming soon ● Each game world has a unique design, music as well as physical model which will affect the balls behavior. ● Nice colorful graphics ● Relaxing sounds and background music ● Free updates with new levels! _____________________________________ RULES OF THE GAME: 1. Place your finger on the ball and drag it. 2. Assemble the shape which is indicated in the edge of the screen using the balls. 3. Beware of bomb-ball as well as bomb block: when exploding they destroy the block which is near by which is necessary for completing the level _____________________________________ Please, support us with a mark and a review! Your opinion will enable us to make the application even better! JOIN US: http://www.facebook.com/chumagames FOLLOW THE NEWS: http://www.twitter.com/chumagames WATCH VIDEO CLIPS: http://www.youtube.com/chumagames VISIT OUR WEB SITE: http://www.chumagames.com The application is suitable for any audience.

description: 100% Offline guide to Crete My Crete Guide is the most complete and updated guide to the island of Crete. It allows users to explore known and unknown aspects of the island according to their own preferences. Features : ★ Offline application, no roaming charges! ★ 100% offline map of Crete ★ Languages: Greek, English, Russian ★ More than 40 categories of interest (beaches, gorges, historical monuments, natural monuments, forests, waterfalls, archaeological sites, monasteries, caves, etc.) ★ More than 2.000 landmarks with texts and photos ★ Personalized information through customization filters ★ Navigator that guides you to a selected point of interest ★ Guides for the 6 major cities of Crete (Heraklion Guide, Chania Guide, Rethymnon Guide, Agios Nikolaos Guide, Sitia Guide, Ierapetra Guide) ★ Guide with city trails and canyons ★ The entire E4 European trail in Crete included ★ Shows points of interest around the user ★ Reviews and user ratings ★ Create personal points of interest ★ Weather forecast When there is internet connection, these options are also available: ★ Change to map with great precision ★ For each point of interest, the user can download more photos (more than 12.000 overall) ★ Propose to our development team new points of interest by adding your own information and photos ★ Download more reviews and ratings from other users Installation After the initial installation of the software, you need to download all required files. Because data size is ~200MB, we recommend: ✓ Get connected to a wi-fi ✓ Make sure you have the required free space on your device ✓ Ensure that your battery is not drained or plug the device on power. While running navigation with GPS, we recommend that the device is connected to the power of your car. (iOS device? Go to https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/my-crete-guide/id950116030 ) Crete, Creta, Kriti, Kreta, Крит!
release_text: Navigator improvements. Less battery usage. Comment input improvements.

description: Sketcher3D is a 3D modeling, design, and fun physics sandbox. Create and manipulate 3D objects, plan out a space, or just build things up and smash them down! This is the PRO version with no restrictions! Features: - create objects to design buildings or spaces - walk though your designs in first-person perspective - move and naturally rotate and scale objects using your device accelerometer - OBJ import and manipulation (*** copy OBJ files and materials to /sdcard/Android/com.Doktor3D.Sketcher3D_Pro/files *** - OBJ export of scenes for use in other 3D applications - change object colors, including transparency - clone and group objects - load scenes (a fancy medieval castle example scene is included!) - save your scenes - audio and vibration feedback that makes the physics come alive - two sample OBJ models included: a sports car and an office building - ... all with real-time physics Extra excellent on tablets!
release_text: ★ Improvements to first-person gyro camera. Move the device to view your designs! ★

description: Challenge your brain with Android MasterMind. MasterMind is a classic game of logic in which your objective is to find the code of four colored pegs that the Android has selected at random. Repeated colors are allowed. You have ten chances to crack the code. To make a guess repeatedly tap the pegs on the bottom panel and press ENTER. After each guess the Android places key pegs as follows: - A red peg for each correct color in the correct position. - A white peg for each correct color in the wrong position. - No key pegs indicate a color is not in the code. Test your skills in 3 difficulty levels: - Easy (6 colors) - Medium (7 colors) - Difficult (8 colors). To start the game select the number of colors you would like to play with. Hope you enjoy the game!

Kon'nichiwa! That's Japanese for "Hello!" Wellcome to Ninja Jump Rush! Ever wanted to be a ninja? Now's your chance! In Ninja Jump Rush you play as a cute little ninja that's in a real hurry. In order to be succesful, you need to ninja jump your way from platform to platform, defying gravity with huge, sky-high double-jumps, all while running and collecting precious gems. This ninja is not a turtle. He's way faster even than a ninja turtle. Just be careful not to fall! - Simple but intuitive control: just tap the screen to ninja jump! - Fast paced, addictive gameplay - Cute ninja character and fun visuals It's fun to be a ninja! Keywords: ninja jump rush, ninja jump, clumsy ninja, ninja run
release_text: Minor bug fixes and graphic adjustments.

description: Contains the 7even, bbc, bihan, crystal, flat, flatwhite, grzanka, kapsules, liquid, and simple icon sets for the Canadian weather application EmWeather. This is not a standalone application and only provides extra icon sets for EmWeather version 0.9.6.0 and greater. EmWeather pulls weather information from Environment Canada and displays it in an intuitive and customizable way.

15 Coins is a deceptively difficult minimalistic arcade game with one goal: collect 15 Coins before you are killed by your clones. Can you avoid your clones long enough to collect 15 Coins? Your ship is always moving forward and all you have to do is tilt or tap to turn left and right to collect 15 Coins. The only thing standing between you and victory are endless clones that follow the path you've traveled. Crash into a clone and it’s game over. You’re not alone though, you can collect a power-up to temporarily freeze the clones and smash into them to destroy them!
release_text: Camera Permission Removed Improved Frame Rate New Color Scheme Options

description: "...Instantion is the only game like this on IOS, and with its stylized graphics and other mechanics, Instantion stands out as a challenging puzzle platformer worth your time and brain power." - Indie Game Enthusiast Control multiple clones simultaneously while solving mind-bending puzzles. Instantion combines dungeon-style puzzle design and trajectory 'sling-shot' aiming with elements like gravity effects, teleportation devices and clone modification. Progress through 50 levels with over 120 puzzles, pushing blocks, hitting switches, finding keys, avoiding lasers and more! Solve each level with as little clones possible, in the shortest time to get the best grade! Extra difficulties are included for even more challenge! **Featured in the Best New Games on the iOS AppStore** Reviews "Action/puzzle game fans should find themselves busy for a while." 4.5 / 5 - 148apps.com "this is a fun little puzzle platformer, and I recommend it to fans of the genre." 4.5 / 5 - appadvice.com "...accessible, well-thought out, and fun to play." 4/5 - Touch Arcade "Like many of the best teachers, Instantion doesn't tell you the answers" 4 / 5 - appspy.com "A clever mechanic and rad, retro graphics." 4 / 5 - Cult of Mac "The control runs smoothly and the degree of difficulty entertains beginners, as well as hardcore puzzle fans." 8.5 - AppZapp "Overall, you are getting a polished puzzling experience with a twist..." 7.3 / 10 - gamemob.com 8.5 / 10 - iapps.im 4 / 5 - gamesinasia.com

NOW FREE ! Thanks to all who donated to me by buying this version of Metar Widget. But it now goes free as it will not receive anymore support / updates. Thanks again. Fly safe. Metar Widget Donate is a simple app that allows you to check METARs in a blink right from your homescreen. Features of Metar Widget Donate: features of free version: - METARs from your favorite airport on homescreen - quick access to latest METARS and TAFs from widget - quick access to aviation weather website from METARs/TAFs list PLUS : - 2 extra widgets (4x2 and 4x1) displaying raw metar data ( Simple and Tiny widget). - choose your own widget background/text color and transparency. - 4 different prest widget backgrounds to choose from - Save up to 5 airports to browse through on widget - access PIREPs right from widget - 5 different list colors - possibility to search for airfields/airports offering METARs within 50NM of the airfield/airport of your choice. Installation: !! depending on your Android version and/or launcher : - download and install - long press on homescreen -> add widget->Metar Widget OR -go to app drawer -> select widget on top of screen->scroll to Metar Widget->long press to add to homescreen *** IMPORTANT : Metar Widget IS NOT AN APPLICATION INTENDED TO USED FOR FLIGHT PLANNING BUT ONLY FOR INFORMATION PURPOSES. Please don't forget to rate my app ! Thank you.
release_text: Version 2.2.1 / July 26th 2015 - THE APP IS NOW WORKING AGAIN ( The bug was due to an update and URL change of the NOAA website which provides data to the app. ) - Custom color widgets have been redesigned so that their size will now adapt to their content ( no more horrible space between data displayed and bottom of widget) Fly safe.

description: Engage yourself into some intense flying and mid air combat in this amazing flight simulator game. Battle against endless waves of enemy aircraft, all of which are flying around attempting to destroy you before you destroy them. Fly at insane speeds in order to make yourself a difficult target to the enemy. This will make aiming a little more difficult but it will keep you alive longer to blow up the enemy fighter jets. With several camera views for you to choose from you can decide which camera suits you best for your combat style. Cockpit view is the best option for most people to use as you can guide your target into your crosshairs before unleashing your machine gun or your rockets onto them. Fly and chase down the enemy fighter jets and shoot them out of the skies. Choose your targets wisely and quickly as you will not have much time to decide in the heat of battle. Think fast! Use your radar in the top right to navigate and fly your fighter jet towards the enemy. Always watch your radar as well as your target because you never know if an enemy is hot on your tail. With the option to switch from weapons such as sidewinders, missiles, carpet bombs and machine guns, you are well equipped for any battle than lies ahead. Help protect your fellow pilots and destroy as many of the enemy as you can. Filled with lots of action, fierce battles, and hours of gameplay. Combat Flight Simulator will be the only flying game you’ll ever need! Features • Become the pilot and fly a real fighter jet! • Awesome physics! • Intense battles. • 4 x Weapons to choose from. • Straight into the action from pressing the play button.

Parking games are great practice for the real thing and you may consider yourself a parking master... but have you ever parked a 4x4 Jeep? Cast aside ordinary cars and get behind the wheel of our 4x4 Jeep Simulation Game as you attempt to park and guide it through the trickiest situations. Drive between obstacles and park your 4x4 Jeep perfectly in the parking spot to pass a level and increase your skill as a parking game but watch out, one wrong turn and this parking game is over.

Babymecum es la aplicación para consultar medicación pediátrica nº1 en España para iPhone/iPad, con más de 75.000 descargas, y más de 500 valoraciones de usuarios (tanto padres como médicos), con una media de 4.5/5 puntos. Esta aplicación es una herramienta con la que puede consultar rápidamente la dosis de la mayoría de la medicación pediátrica de uso común. Tan solo tiene que introducir el peso de su hijo y Babymecum calculará por usted la dosis de los siguientes medicamentos. Antitérmicos: - Apiretal - Dalsy - Junifen2% - Junifen 4% - Febrectal supositorios lactances e infantiles - Nolotil supositorios infantiles Antibioticos: - Augmentine - Clamoxyl - Denvar - Klacid - Pantomicina Forte - Zinnat - Zitromax Antitusígenos: - Dastosin - Flutox - Levotuus - Romilar Jarabe - Sekisan - Toseina - Diminex Supositorios lactantes e infantiles. Y muchos más: - Actithiol - Aerius - Aerored gotas - Atarax - Flumil 2% - Paidoterin descongestivo - Polaramine Babymecum constituye una herramienta indispensable tanto para padres como para profesionales sanitarios. Babymecum está supervisado por pediatras con amplia experiencia en pediatría extrahospitalaria. Nota: Esta aplicación no sustituye el criterio médico de su pediatra. Toda medicación administrada a su hijo debe ser prescrita y supervisada por su pediatra. Babymecum is the application to query pediatric medication # 1 in Spain for iPhone / iPad, with over 75,000 downloads and more than 500 user reviews (both parents and physicians), with an average of 4.5 / 5 points. This application is a tool that can quickly check the dose most commonly used pediatric medications. You just have to enter the weight of your child and you Babymecum calculated by the dose of these medicines. Antipyretics: - Apiretal - Dalsy - Junifen2% - 4% Junifen - Febrectal lactances suppositories and children - Nolotil infant suppositories Antibiotics: - Augmentin - Clamoxyl - Denvar - Klacid - Forte Pantomicina - Zinnat - Zithromax Antitussives - Dastosin - Flutox - Levotuus - Romilar Syrup - Sekisan - Toseina - Suppositories Diminex infants and children. And many more: - Actithiol - Aerius - Aerored drops - Atarax - Flumil 2% - Paidoterin decongestant - Polaramine Babymecum is an indispensable tool for both parents and health professionals. Babymecum is supervised by pediatricians with extensive experience in outpatient pediatrics. Note: This application does not replace the clinical judgment of your doctor. All medications administered to your child should be prescribed and monitored by your pediatrician.

Do you think you can leave your mark on every continent? Well, the locals in far away lands aren’t always happy with your free attitude towards going to the toilet. So it’s important to stay alert at all times. WHAT'S INSIDE There are 7 continents (levels) to complete packed with shocking surprises and challenges that include: ★ Taking a dump in the gardens of the White House. ★ Sneaking into The Queen's private bathroom in Buckingham Palace ★ Visiting the ancient ruins of Machu Picchu to honour the ancient Incas ★ Leaving an American tribute in an Asian rice field. ★ Fertilising the dry, stubborn soil of Africa ★ Diving in the Great Barrier Reef to leave some American fish food ★ Interfering with global warming researchers in Antarctica by 'changing the temperature' of their equipment Possibly a bit crude? Well yes, but it's also progressively challenging and rewarding. We guarantee you won't have played a game like this before! FEATURES ★ High resolution graphics ★ Unique music and sound effects for each level ★ Humorous gameplay ★ Carefully designed 'super poo' power ups Let us know what you think! We read all feedback: feedback@greenstonegames.com
release_text: Improved gameplay New Button Graphic Redesigned poo bar New app icon

Try Our Newest Game, Euro Train Simulator : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.HighbrowInteractive.EuroTrainSim . Download "Railroad Crossing Pro" to remove ads: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.HighbrowInteractive.RailroadPro . . . Railroad Crossing is a first of its kind Simulation game where you cross as many cars as you are required to within the allotted time, without getting hit by the trains. It can be a bit addictive, if we can say so ourselves. To make things even better, there is the "Online Multi Player" Mode, where you can challenge other players or even your friends. And post the number of Wins on the leaderboard.Railroad Crossing is set across 4 visually stunning worlds consisting 28 levels in "Challenge Mode". The worlds are designed to uniquely represent four places - Nebraska, Darjeeling, Chicago and Moscow. Also play the "Endless Mode" and try to record a new high score. . . . How to play: 1. Tap on a gate to open or close it. 2. Cross the denoted number of cars within the allotted time. 3. Do not get hit by the train. . . . Features: ★ First of its kind to support Online Realtime Multiplayer gameplay ★ Easy to learn; hard to master ★ Stunning worlds with incredible looking trains ★ 28 "Challenge" levels and 4 "Endless" levels ★ Original music by Krishna Shenoi . . . Do not forget to rate "Railroad Crossing". . Visit our official site at http://www.highbrowinteractive.com Like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/HighbrowInteractive to get more info about all our upcoming titles

description: Railroad Crossing is a first of its kind casual game where you cross as many cars as you are required to within the allotted time, without getting hit by the trains. It can be a bit addictive, if we can say so ourselves. To make things even better, there is the "Online Multi Player" Mode, where you can challenge other players or even your friends. And post the number of Wins on the leaderboard. Railroad Crossing is set across 4 visually stunning worlds consisting 28 levels in "Challenge Mode". The worlds are designed to uniquely represent four places - Nebraska, Darjeeling, Chicago and Moscow. Also play the "Endless Mode" and try to record a new high score. How to play: 1. Tap on a gate to open or close it. 2. Cross the denoted number of cars within the allotted time. 3. Do not get hit by the train. Online Multiplayer Mode: 1. Turn your Wi-fi or mobile data On. 2. Go to the Online multiplayer mode in the menu 3. Either Invite your friend or click Play now. 4. Post the number of Wins on the Leaderboard and Top the lists. 5. Rate our game ! Do not forget to rate "Railroad Crossing". Like "Highbrow Interactive" on Facebook to get updates about our latest projects.

description: This Summer, Highbrow Interactive, in collaboration with 4 Fun Studio, bring to you Toy Car Simulation, a nostalgia pill designed to bring back memories of childhood. Toy Car Simulation hopes to capture the joy kids feel playing with toy cars around elaborate tracks constructed with whatever they could lay their hands on. Seeking inspiration from Pixar's Toy Story, the game consists of Parking, Racing and Stunts staged around spectacular levels. . . . Special Features: ✶ Drive the cars to every corners of a kid's room in Parking, passing through blocks, on top of the computer table or under the bed, and especially on our amazing tracks. ✶ Race against another car in the Sprint levels. ✶ Try to reach new heights in the Stunt levels while collecting as many tokens as possible. Keep an extra eye open for the fantasy stunts which involve jumping through a ring of fire. Yes, it's as awesome as it sounds. . . . Visit our official site at http://www.highbrowinteractive.com Like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/HighbrowInteractive to get more info about all our upcoming titles Do not forget to rate "Toy Car Simulation". . . Try the ad-supported FREE version of Toy Car Simulation here: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.HighbrowInteractive.ToyCarSim

Introducing Ultimate Mini Golf - the fun, addictive and challenging game of golf! Do you love mini golf but never get the time to play it? We understand, so we have made the Ultimate Mini Golf application - mini golf at your fingertips! Choose the course that you would like to play, set the ball’s target and putt! Can you master the hole? Enter the spooky, mysterious graveyard; brave the harsh desert; putt through thick snow and go retro in the cartoon level. Each course contains 9 difficult holes that you must direct the ball into! Enter the curious worlds of mini golf as you aim to get the hole in as little shots as possible. Finally you are able to play mini golf on your sofa, in the car or even at 30,000 feet; the possibilities are endless! In this exciting game, you can putt in amazing, 3D worlds. There are 9 holes to every course - so you will never run out of exciting gameplay! However, it is not as easy as it seems as there are dozens of obstacles that block your path, you will have to maneuver around them to get the hole! Enter the vibrant worlds including the desert, graveyard, snow,castle and cartoon levels, with 9 holes to complete on each. Ultimate Mini Golf will keep you entertained for hours on end with addictive gameplay and challenging obstacles to bypass. Tap to angle your shot and select the power - then tap once more to putt - will you get a hole in one? Beware as golf skills may not be so helpful in this virtual world - you must use advanced tactics and skillful precision to get the best from your shot. Ultimate Mini Golf is addictive and fun to play - the whole family will love mini golf with a modern twist! Experience Ultimate Mini Golf today! Features - Amazing 3D graphics that pop from the screen - Camera overview of each hole - Addictive yet challenging gameplay - 5 varying courses to explore and master! - 9 holes to each course! - Challenging obstacles to pass!
release_text: Version 2.0 All New Castle course (9 Holes) Camera Overview of every hole! Controller improvements

description: The great tool "Bluetooth Manager" now for ICS note: To route music to a mono headset use any media player Besides the android default "media player". Great free simple tool to manage your remote bluetooth devices and to play music to any audio bluetooth device (mono headset , mono handsfree). Supports all bulid in bluetooth settings functionality and far more. Play music to mono devices: Listen to music on mono headset or on a car handsfree. You just need to connect the device via the manager and enable\disable the audio feature checkbox. Manage remote bluetooth devices: - Display a list view contains all the pairing devices. - Scan for new devices. - Pair new device. - Set your own description to each device. - Connect\Disconnect from device. - Display connection state of each device. - Send sound notification when device was connected. - Delete device from your phone. - Clear all unpair devices. Filter by device type: - Audio_Video. - Phones. - Computers. - Networking. - Imaging. - Misc. Auto sorting: - Sort devices by type. - Sort by last connected and by connections history for each type. Manage your local bluetooth device: - Edit your local device name. - Discover your device to others. Menu Features: - Shortcut to phone dial screen. - Shortcut to phone bluetooth settings screen. - Share appliction market link to others. - Exit the program. - Disable bluetooth and exit the program.

description: ******** IF YOU NEED HELP SETTING UP THE APPLICATION, EMAIL ME ******** Database Tool allows users to easily view and query database tables. Use of this app requires the upload of a web services written in PHP to your server. This gives an extra layer of security since you will not be forced to allow remote connections to your database, like the other apps on the Android Market require. This application does not directly allow you to query. Instead, it assembles queries based on your preferences. It allows you to sort and search columns. View the screenshots for more examples. Based on the popularity of this app, I may come out with a professional version that allows for custom queries, which would be very useful when you need to join tables. As of now, the Tool is only compatible with MySQL databases. There are plans for MSSQL compatibility in the future as well. You can download the PHP code at : https://sites.google.com/site/jstn455/databaseviewer Directions for getting the application to work are as follows: Step 1: Download .zip or .tgz file from https://sites.google.com/site/jstn455/databaseviewer Step 2: Extract the folder (unzip or tar -zxvf "filename.tgz") Step 3: Transfer the directory via FTP client into your public html folder Step 4: Confirm the web address through your browser. There should be a confirmation message.If you transferred the directory to the root public html file, it should be http://yoursite.com/mysql-tool Step 5: Go into the settings.php file in a text editor and fill out lines 14-18 For $password, you could use any password you want. It does not have to be your database password, and as a precaution it should not be your database password. Step 6: Download the Android application Step 7: Add the database to your application. Match the password from your settings.php file to the password field in the application If you prefer extra security, you can use also set up an htaccess authentication for the directory. The app will prompt you for your username and password. Features: Single Table viewing Multiple column searching Sorting Paginated Data view Export to CSV MySQL Database Viewing

description: Ultimate Big 2 is based on the popular and forever classic Big 2 game (also known has Big Two, Big Deuce, Pusoy Dos,Da Lao Er, Dai Di). Don’t know the game? Well this is your chance to learn the ropes and challenge yourself! Ultimate Big 2 comes armed with 3 levels of difficulty to challenge even veteran Big 2 players. The creators of Ultimate Big 2 are actually Big 2 fanatics and can proudly say that they have over 10 years of Big 2 experience. If there was an Olympic sport for Big 2, they would definitely be top notch coaches. So when they saw that this game was not widely available and that the difficulty wasn’t challenging enough, they knew the Big 2 Gods were sending them a message. Hopefully you will enjoy Ultimate Big 2 as much as they had fun creating it. Check out the official Ultimate Big 2 website! We respond to your comments and we also posted our rules for a quick reference. www.ultimatebig2.com

app_name: Peeka Boo for Baby and Mommy
description: Just for small Toddlers and Babies!!! A simple but effective interactive learning game for small Toddlers and Babies. Just needs one simple tap on the screen and can you guess what kind of animals are "Peeka-booing" you!! Designed from a parents perspective, there are no buttons or links to confuse the child. There are also no scores or levels, which makes it easy for children to put the game done when the parent says time up. The colors, design and sound effects have been selected from the viewpoint of keeping children amused. "Kinderpan" series specifically targets preschool children to learn and enjoy while taken into consideration the parents perspectives. They are all designed to be simple to maneuver yet highly creative aiming to bring joy for children and parents world wide. * Free download * Contains no advertisements, so children will not be able to leave the confines of the application.

You wrecked near the island. The game combines stealth and survival simulator. You will have to explore the open world, defense, hunt animals, build different buildings (house, tent, etc.), search for weapons and more. Your only job on the island - it is to live as much as possible days. ► Do yourself an ax to defend, cut trees and build a tent to remain in the game. ► Kill animals, cook meat on the fire - it will prolong your life. ► You can explore the island alone, as well as with friends in multiplayer, and players from around the world. ► Create your multiplayer server or connect to servers already created by other players. _____________________________________________ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/islandlightgame YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/KobraStudio

Kotak Offers mobile application helps you to find amazing offers in dining, electronics, clothing, travel & holiday, and many more on your Kotak card. Kotak offers is loaded with attractive deals and discounts available across cities on Kotak Debit, Credit, Netcard and Netbanking. Main Features: · Deal notifications: Get notified about the deals in your vicinity (based on GPS). · Nearby Offers: View Kotak offers around you on map · Share Offers via social media (facebook, twitter, email) with your friends · Calendar Reminder: Set Reminder alerts for expiring offers and get notified · Customized Search: Search, Filter/Sort offers by categories, city, merchant etc. · Add to favorites: Bookmark your favorite deals Get started with Kotak offers app and grab the latest deals available on your Kotak card now!

description: Golf Shot Tracker Pro is a simple-to-use, full-featured Golf GPS system, including GPS Maps, 5 player scorecard, Shot Tracking, and Stats all in one app! This version of the app gives you a 30 day unlimited trial - you get access to all features of the paid version for 30 days. After your trial period ends, ads will be shown in the app and you will not have access to golf stats. For full access, simply purchase the paid version of the app for a small one time cost. Golf Shot Tracker Pro will help you keep track of your stats and shots with an easy to use interface as you keep your score and record your golf shots. Only track as many shots as you want and only the stats that matter to you. From a single screen, you can add strokes, putts, Fairway hit, GIR, penalty strokes, tee direction, and see the distance to the Front, Center, and Back of the green. A simple tap of a button will bring up an overview map of the hole or your scorecard. This Golf GPS app is the only app you need on the golf course! We have over 25,000 courses mapped in our course catalog - search by name, location or nearby to find your favorite courses. Can't find your course? Using your PC and our easy to use course mapper, mapping your favorite course will only take 15-20 minutes at http://www.GolfShotTracker.net If you have any issues registering your trial or with the app - send us an email at: LiteDroidDevelopment@gmail.com Golf Shot Tracker Pro features: * Distance to the front, center, and back of each green - a true Golf GPS * Keep your score and track your putts, greens, and fairways - see them visually on your scorecard * View satellite maps of the hole and get accurate distance to any point on the course * View the map of the green to get an accurate target distance * Email your scorecard when you are done with your round * Track your golf shots to find your average distance for each club * Compile your golf stats for greens in regulation, fairways, putts and more! * Backup your data - rounds, clubs, stats, and courses can be saved to the SD card for later restore. Use Golf Shot Tracker Pro Golf GPS and start seeing lower scores today!

description: Slender: The Metro is a Brand New Slenderman Experience from the maker of "Slender: The Asylum" . Slender: The Metro is based off of the character from the original folklore. Do you have what it takes to escape the Metro? Only time will tell... Slender: The Metro combines High Quality graphics with a terrifying atmosphere providing you with the Best Slenderman experience available on the Play Store, and at only a mere 18MB this game won't take up all the space on your phone! We plan to constantly update this app with any fixes necessary. FruiTap is a fast paced bubble breaking game, where you play with fruits and compete with players on Google+ You have only one minute to tap and break groups of similar fruits and to get as much score as possible. The game offers its own unique fruity flavor.

oCraft is a match 3 oriental game, where you can play puzzles with fruits, vegetables and building materials. Play match 3 puzzles, where you crush fruits and vegetables, collect resources, break blocked cells and earn gold coins. Complete 50 levels of the game to create a beautiful oriental settlement in a desert oasis. Use boosters and power-ups to beat difficult levels. Enjoy rich oriental world, which changes while you progress through the game.

description: The Application Botanical Gardens Madeira was designed having as target audience, all visitors of Botanical Gardens Eng Rui Vieira. Provides useful information to the user, such as the hours of operation, location of entrances, restaurants, etc. The user has at his disposal an interactive map of the all garden, where you can locate the various existing points of interest, such as: plants location, sights, bars, etc. Also, the user has at its disposal the functionality of reading QR codes. Using this, users can access information highlighted of these same points of reading. Thus highlights the main features of the application: • Map of the Botanical Garden; • Indication of location; • Interest points; • Search different areas in gardens; • Interactivity with QR Code reader in some places; • General information (schedules, prices, accessibility) ; • Query plants by world distribution; • Location of the plant in the garden; • Information about the history of the Botanical Garden; • Access and schedules of transports; This application was made under the anniversary of the Botanical Garden of Madeira Eng Rui Vieira on April 30, 2014, by the following team of developers: Ezequiel Vieira , Marco Freitas , Roberto Caires .

FX-Racer is a game of high level competition, with exclusive cars. Compete in the world championship over 18 circuits. Participate in timed races and get the fastest time in the world rankings. Cars can be updgraded before each championship race. You can make improvements in engine power, aerodynamics, tyre wear and bodywork's impact structure. In race tyre degradation. Car damage in collision. Now all circuits have a PitLane for tyre change and car repairing. Pit stops. HUD with other pilot's pit stops. HUD with position and distance of the car behind us. All circuits are completely redesigned with new graphical improvements. New car models with high level of detail. Cash reward system in each race to spend in tyres, bodywork kits and car upgrades, Steering hardness can be changed even during the race with in-game Sensitivity setting menu. Camera smoothly tilts when steering with accelerometer.

((You must have Zooper Widgets Pro installed to use this skin)) This theme works perfectly on Nova Launcher Prime and should work with some other launchers as well. Use the "THEME INSTALLER". This should prevent you from having to email me for the APK and should also allow you to perform proper updates via the Play Store. After you download the theme, find the "Monday theme installer" in your app drawer and click it. :-) Icons: http://www.mediafire.com/download/bsh1qshs86csahu/metrostation_icons.zip TUTORIAL: Theme installer.. After downloading the theme, go into your application drawer and find the "Monday theme installer". Open it and click install. Nova setup.. Set the grid size to 12x4 Make sure there are 0 margins Hide the status bar (this is located under "look and feel") Hide the dock Set swipe up action to app drawer Set swipe down action to show notifications Set homescreen count to 1 Check "resize all widgets" Applying the theme.. Longpress your home screen and click "widgets" Scroll down to "zooper widget pro" and click it For status bar and search bar, apply in a 4x1 grid For weather apply in a 4x2 grid For notifications and dock apply in a 4x4 grid Follow me on Google + for updates and new themes that Im working on. https://plus.google.com/112162095736133226513/posts If you have any problems or questions please email me rather than post a comment on here. Thank you.

description: In the post-apocalyptic era, zombies are energized by old nuclear reactors. They creep out of the ground where nuclear energy and radiation combine. Their intent is to eat the survivors and dominate the new world order. Your mission is to disable the remaining reactors and eradicate zombies. Drop in from your helicopter to rescue soldiers who are pinned down at a military base barricaded with makeshift barbed wire, rotten fences, and all manner of post apocalypse garbage. Take a wild ride through fields littered with zombies, but stay in your jeep or armored personnel carrier when you can, it's safer that way! Scavenge for weapons in a ruined city, find the classic crowbar or nail bat, take out more zombies on foot or take up a sharp shooter position up high. Tighten your seatbelt for a final showdown with zombies protecting a nuclear reactor, sneak in with dynamite and take it out, destroy their power source to save the world! • zombies : rotten businessman, ragged ann, surgeon, police officer • vehicles : jeeps, armored personnel carrier, helicopter, spare tire • explosive dynamite to take out towers and nuclear reactor • weapons : crowbar, golf club, fire axe, gun, nail bat, tire • rescue soldiers pinned down in military base

description: 안녕하세요 용사님! 내손안에 메이플, 메이플 핸즈 입니다! 메이플 핸즈가 드디어 2.0으로 새롭게 개선이 되었습니다. 많은 부분들이 개선이 된 만큼 이용에 도움이 될만한 부분들을 적어보았어요! 용사님들 이용에 참고 부탁 드립니다! ==== 메이플 핸즈에서는 다음의 기능을 제공합니다! ==== 1. 온라인 메이플스토리와 연동되는 “몬스터라이프” 2. 온라인 메이플스토리와 연동되는 “메이플톡” 채팅 (1:1, 그룹, 친구, 길드대화 지원) 3. 온라인 메이플스토리의 최신 소식을 가장 빠르게 접할 수 있는 메뉴 ==== 다음의 내용이 메이플 핸즈 2.0을 통해서 개편 되었습니다! ==== 1. 메이플 핸즈의 디자인이 새롭게 개편되었습니다. - 더욱 유저 친화적이고 세련된 디자인과 구성으로 개선하였습니다. - 메인 디자인을 심플하게 변경하여 한눈에 원하는 메뉴를 찾을 수 있게 개편하였습니다. - 캐릭터의 배경을 쓸어 넘기면 배경이 바뀝니다. - 공식 아이콘도 변경이 되었습니다. 메이플 핸즈의 마스코트는 묵직한 예티와 수다쟁이 페페 입니다! 2. 캐릭터 정보확인이 더욱 편리해지고 강화되었습니다. - 메인로비에서 캐릭터를 터치하면 바로 캐릭터 정보를 확인할 수 있습니다. - 캐릭터 정보에서는 스타플래닛 포인트 및 각종 랭킹 정보를 확인하실 수 있습니다. - 메인로비에서 캐릭터 명 옆의 화살표를 터치하면, 빠르게 보유하고 있는 캐릭터가 표시 됩니다. - 캐릭터 정보확인 창에서 이미지 저장, 다른 앱으로 공유하기, 캐릭터 정보보기 기능 등 편의성이 대폭 향상 되었습니다. 3.“메이플톡” 이 새롭게 탄생 했습니다. 많이 사랑해 주실꺼죠? - 친구와 대화기능을 합쳐 새롭게 “메이플톡” 으로 개선이 되었습니다. - 메이플톡 에서는 모든 월드의 친구를 한눈에 친구목록에서 확인이 가능하며, 친구들과 바로 대화를 시작할 수 있습니다. - 수많은 친구들을 보기 좋게 정렬할 수 있습니다. (월드별, 이름별, 레벨별, 접속별) - 자주 대화하는 친구나 대화방은 즐겨찾기에 등록해서 손쉽게 이동할 수 있습니다. - 많은 용사님들이 제안 주셨던 그룹대화, 길드대화, 친구대화, 길드게시판의 기능이 추가 되었으며, 이는 모두 메이플스토리 온라인과도 연동 됩니다. 단, 길드대화 및 친구대화는 반드시 대표캐릭터가 설정이 되어있어야 하며, 대화방에 입장 하였을 때만 대화를 주고 받을 수 있어요! - 메이플 핸즈 2.0만을 위한 새롭고 귀여운 이모티콘이 개발되었습니다. 친구들과의 대화에서 자유롭게 사용해보세요! 4. 메이플 뉴스 메뉴가 새롭게 개선되었습니다. - 용사님들이 많이 사용하시고 제안 주셨던 뉴스 메뉴로 알차게 구성하였습니다. - 공지사항 / 업데이트 / 이벤트 내용을 바로 확인하실 수 있으며, 직접 홈페이지에 방문하시고 싶으실 경우, 모바일웹 메뉴를 통해 이동이 가능해졌습니다. 5. 캐릭터 정보 업데이트, 친구 동기화 관련 많이 궁금하셨죠? - 새로 친구를 맺은 친구는 자동적으로 한 시간마다 갱신이 됩니다. 만약 바로 친구목록에서 확인을 하고 싶으시다면, 설정- 친구동기화를 통해 가능합니다. 단, 수동 친구 동기화는 한 시간에 한번만 하실 수 있습니다. - 캐릭터 정보 업데이트는 하루에 한번, 새벽 시간대에 이루어 집니다. 캐릭터 정보에는 레벨, 아바타(코디) 가 포함이 되어 있습니다. 앞으로도 메이플 핸즈에서는 용사님들의 의견을 소중히 수렴하고 더욱 유익하고 알찬 기능으로 업데이트하고 찾아뵐것을 약속드릴께요. 많은 관심 부탁 드리겠습니다. 감사합니다! 게임 진행 중 궁금하신 내용이 있다면 도움말 및 고객센터를 이용해주세요! - 게임 도움말 게임 화면 오른쪽 아래 톱니바퀴 클릭 > [설정] > [고객지원] > [FAQ] - 게임 고객센터 게임 화면 오른쪽 아래 톱니바퀴 클릭 > [설정] > [고객지원] > [1:1문의하기] ---- 개발자 연락처 : (주)넥슨코리아 경기도 성남시 분당구 판교로 256번길 7 전화: 1588-7701 사업자등록번호: 220-87-17483 통신판매업 신고번호: 제 2013-경기성남-1659 호 통신판매업 신고기관: 성남시 Hello sir warrior! description: A new take on the old Lander game with a Tower Defense twist and vintage feel! Strategically land towers to fight off waves of Martians. Full version features 10 landers, 19 enemy types and 6 unique maps. Keep up with updates and future games at: www.facebook.com/NextWorldEntertainment Feel free to email me at NextWorldEntertainment@Gmail.com with any comments or suggestions.
release_text: (2.1.3) I completely rewrote the physics for the entire game to greatly reduce lag. Most of the scripts have been completely redone and it's brand new so there maybe some minor glitches. If you find any feel free to let me know so I can fix them. You can email me at NextWorldEntertainment@Gmail.com Thank you everyone who has helped so far :)

description: This application dedicated to the game Silent Hill Part 2. In this application, the user acquainted with: = Storyline = Detail learns all the game's characters and their intentions. = Detail learns all the monsters the game and their intentions. = Detail learns all bosses of the game and their intentions. = Will see all the possible endings game = Will know conditions of passage to get the desired ending = User submitted videos of all endings = Given all the maps of all locations = You are given a list of music from the game = You can keep yourself out of the game in the wallpaper album = In this application, there is a description of 2 films silent hill with the opportunity to learn more about them = Brief acquaintance with the following parts of the game Silent Hill = You can test your nerves, if not afraid! be careful!

SAVE THE POPSTAR, SAVE THE WORLD! Help Toshi dance to defeat the evil demons. Save Toshi (for iOS) reached the #7 Top Paid iPhone Puzzle Game in the US and was featured on iTunes under Best Puzzle Games. Over 1 million people have already saved Toshi, giving the game an average rating of 4.5 (out of 5)! This free android version comes with 1 free level pack (20 levels). 4 additional packs can be unlocked for free by using the awesome built in Tapjoy’s offer-wall. PRESS QUOTES (iOS VERSION): “It’s a lovely mix of cute and challenging at a price too good to pass up” Kotaku “2D physics puzzlers like Angry Birds and Cut the Rope dominated the sales charts in 2010, we’re already looking for what’s next, and we think we’ve found it!” SlideToPlay “There is only one flaw to this game, and that is that at some point the game ends.” TouchGen “In short…get this game…play this game…it’s super good!” IPwnGames A NEW DIMENSION TO PUZZLE SOLVING Physics puzzles are definitely one of the most popular game genres on mobile. While most of these puzzles take place in simple 2d worlds, Save Toshi pulls ahead of the competition by providing a unique 3D take on the genre. ME LOVE TO DANCING! Every time mega popstar Toshi dances... a demon dies! This is why the evil demons kidnapped Toshi and made her forget how to walk. Without her supernatural dancing powers the world is in danger! Your mission is to help Toshi get to the dance-floor area by shooting and smashing down the different types of blocks she is standing on. SUPER SIMPLE The intuitive controls that are incredibly simple to pick up. To shoot, tap your finger on the target. To rotate your view, just drag your finger around. Save Toshi has an easy and straightforward learning process with detailed in-game tutorials and there is also a hint system to help players with even with the most challenging levels. SUPER CHALLENGING! The level design uses a wide variety of game-play elements (different materials, explosives, hinges, and more) to create 100 mind-boggling physics puzzles. To get the best score you will need to solve all levels with as few shots as possible. And while the game starts out with extremely easy tutorial puzzles, later levels will really challenge you to think in all 3 dimensions! FEATURE LIST: * Amazingly fluid and realistic 3d physics * 100 fun and challenging levels with a smooth difficulty curve * Outstanding variety of different game-play elements * Intuitive and super easy to pick up controls * Easy and straightforward learning process with in-game tutorials * Hint system available for all levels * Simple stars scoring system (based on number of shots) * Unlock levels for free using Tapjoy’s offerwall * Cute and hilarious lead anime character * HD quality 3D graphics * Unlock new outfits, music & environments We believe in an ongoing conversation with our players, so please let us know what you think about Save Toshi! follow us on facebook or subscribe to our mailing list on our website to get FREE bonus content alerts in the future. -------------------------------------------------------- Website: http://www.nitako.com Twitter: http://twitter.com/nitako Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/user/noamabta Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/home.php?#/profile.php?id=698460871&ref=profile iTunes
release_text: Updated support for newer devices Ads removed Performance boost Crash fixes on some devices

Скоро обновление 1.6 Обновление 1.5: 1)Немного перерисованы кнопки, немного изменён цвет фона 2)Люди в вашей команде теперь сохраняются 3)Название вашей компании сохраняется Обновление 1.4: 1)Новый интерфейс 2)Возможность создать свою компанию Срочное дополнение к обновлению 1.3 1)Убрано закрытие приложения 2)Исправлен магазин 3)Исправлен последний баг с возможностью изменения надписей Обновление 1.3: 1)Исправлен баг с возможностью изменения надписей 2)Количество нанятых людей теперь сохраняется 3)Если вы свернёте игру что бы взломать её, то вам придётся её перезапустить. P.S. Игра вошла в топ бесплатных игр в России Обновление 1.2: 1)Небольшие изменения надписей на кнопках 2)Появилась возможность смотреть чем вы владеете 3)Теперь можно покупать квартиры и машины (По просьбам игроков) Обновление 1.1: 1)Изменён интерфейс 2)Убран пункт еды (По просьбам игроков) 3)Теперь вы можете нанимать в команду не 10, а 20 человек (По просьбам игроков) 4)Появилась кнопка новая игра (По просьбам игроков) Как тяжело в наше время программистам. Не каждый быстро начинает зарабатывать большие деньги. Ваша задача придти к материальному успеху. Создавай разные проекты или покупай готовые, нанимай людей в команду, развивай свой бизнес, получай за свои проекты доход. Ходи в магазин что бы восполнить свою энергию. Ну что, ты готов стать успешным программистом? Тогда вперёд! Soon update 1.6 Update 1.5: 1) A little redrawn buttons slightly changed the background color 2) The people on your team are now saved 3) The name of your company saved Update 1.4: 1) The new interface 2) Ability to create your company Urgent addition to updating 1.3 1) Removed closing applications 2) Fixed shop 3) Fixed a bug with the last opportunity to change the labels Update 1.3: 1) Fixed a bug with the ability to change the labels 2) The number of employed people now saved 3) If you will roll a game that would hack it, you have to restart it. P.S. The game entered the top free games in Russia Update 1.2: 1) Small changes labels on the buttons 2) Now you can watch what you own 3) Now you can buy an apartment and car (At the request of players) Update 1.1: 1) Changed interface 2) Removed the food item (At the request of players) 3) Now you can hire a team not 10, but 20 people (at the request of players) 4) The button appears a new game (At the request of players) How hard nowadays programmers. Not everyone quickly begins to make a lot of money. Your task is to come to material success. Create different projects or to buy ready, hire people to the team, develop the business, getting their projects revenue. Go to a store that would make up their energy. Well, are you ready to become a successful programmer? Then go ahead!

This crazy bird is clumsy! In the open air there is only who can survive…the clumsy duck. He goes out on his mission to collect lost treasure, grab power-ups, and flap through the skies. Try and complete the challenges as you flap. Collect coins to use for free power-ups so that you can set the high score! Good luck and happy flapping!

Take your goat on a run through the city! He is on a rampage! Explore the city on a run with the crazy goat! Run, jump and move around obstacles. Collect coins and power ups along the way to get the high score. FEATURES: - Goat smash! - Easy running gameplay - Challenging for all ages Get started with the crazy goat today!

Run as a vampire or werewolf! Join in on the most exciting runner game in the AppStore! Choose your monster to rush through the city and collect coins, power ups and more. Avoid obstacles, like cars, moving buses and more! Climb the wooden rails to avoid obstacles and collect more coins to buy more monsters in the store! All the coins are free, no purchase necessary! Good luck!

Take your bouncing balls out and get moving! It's fun and simple game is super challenging! Roll out to attack monsters that will shoot and jump on you. Jump over pits of spikes and get to the secret door! Fun for all ages, try it now!

Rollout the red ball and keep it under control to get as far as you can! Each level is different every time you play! Avoid the spikes and collect 1,2 or 3 coins to increase your score. Collect coins to power up your score to defeat your friends. Are you the best? Fun and challenging! Tap the top of the screen to jump, tap the bottom to slide.
The only way to escape the walls, is up. How far can you get. Made in 48 hours as part of a Game Jam. Made by: Peter Bruncke Tristan Kennedy Sidney Armitage

The Mobile Travel Kit from Pacific Blue Cross is the must-have app for BC and Yukon residents who love to travel. Enjoy peace of mind knowing you have Pacific Blue Cross with you when you travel. Simply choose your desired plan, add trip cancellation and baggage insurance and enter your travel details to get an instant quote. Features of the Mobile Travel Kit: - Get quotes and purchase travel insurance from your mobile phone (British Columbia and Yukon residents only). - Store your policy on your phone while you travel so you can view your coverage and benefits under your plan. - Contact Pacific Blue Cross and/or Medi-Assist with the touch of a button in the event you experience an emergency while travelling. - Save personal profiles to make your next travel insurance purchase much faster and easier. - Keep track of your previous travel plan purchases. The Mobile Travel Kit also includes a First Aid Kit with information on common conditions that travellers face and what to do when you experience them. From insect bites to ankle sprains, the First Aid Kit will help you determine if you need to see a doctor or seek first aid. Good health and a safe trip are tough to guarantee, so enjoy peace of mind from a name trusted around the globe. Pacific Blue Cross Travel Insurance. Covers you, covers the world.
release_text: Increase in Emergency Medical Care Benefit from $5 to $10 million.

description: Ski jump is a retro ski jumping game with 55different ski jumps from K50 to K250. SKI JUMP offers single player mode (Single contest, World Cup, 4 Jumps Cup and Flying Cup) and ONLINE MULTIPLAYER challenges! HOW TO PLAY: - tap once to start - double touch to jump - swipe up and down with one finger to control jumper and ski angle - while swiping tap with a second finger to land (or double touch) FEATURES: - ski jumps from K50 to K250 - online mode - online records - World Cup - Flying Cup - Team World Cup - 4 Jumps Tournament - jumper appearance - adjustable controls sensitivity - adjustable difficulty level - qualifications
release_text: - jumping improvements - major improvements and changes

description: Speed runner game on metro with nitro booster in 360° is fast and furious like the movie and easy to controle with nitro Racing you run in infinite loop Heyap intergrated for share score with your's friends and around the world ! Easy to take in hand 3 level difficulty Fast effect run on mobile android S2 It's free!

The idea of this game was to recreate the old and most popular Russian game - “Nu,pogodi” (translated as “Just you wait”). It was one of the first soviet portable games with LCD-screen. Having an uncomplicated gameplay and being highly exciting it was equally interesting for both – kids and adults. So we have decided to use the most fortunate game experience of the previous generation because the classic is always actual and interesting. Undoubtedly the “Nu, pogodi” is a classic game loved by millions of Russian people.

Dragon's Jackpot Slot Machine is a brand new 5 reel Vegas Style Slot Machine. It offers multiple ways to wager, whilst at the same time providing various interactive features. The game is designed around a Chinese New Year Dragon Theme. We have created a visually appealing slot, with various animations that don't over-complicate or interfere with game play. Features: -Vegas Style 5 Reel Slot Machine -4 Bonus Rounds (Card Gambling + Shake the Dragon + Card matching + Scratch Off Card) -9 Paylines with WILD and BONUS Icons -On Demand Card Gambling -Free spins -3D Icons with 3D Animations -Play as an App or as your live wallpaper background. -Can Shake device to spin -Gold Reels pay triple -3D Rendered Coin Shower on Big Win -Multiple spin,Bonus,Win sounds -Settings so you can customize your play -Game remembers credits; so you can play where you left off. -Smooth Play -Great Graphics -Chinese New Year Dragon Theme Getting started: The paytable is located on the upper right hand side and should be referred to before playing, all buttons and game options are located at the bottom and sides of the slot. You can select from 1 to 9 lines by pressing the numbers on the sides of the screen. Each line has a wager that is user selectable and ranges from $1 to $10 allowing the user to wager from $1 to $90 on a single spin. Pressing the "BET MAX" button plays all 9 lines at the maximum wager for a total wager of $90. Get at least 3 BONUS ICONS on a payline to enter one of the 4 BONUS Rounds. If your spin uses the "Golden Reels" win triple. All our games use real math and near industry standard random number generation for maximum Las Vegas excitement. Priced at less than one "max bet spin" at your local casino slot machine, you will truly enjoy the exciting experience offered by this game. NOTE: This slot machine is not associated with any real casino and was made ONLY for fun. All money amounts shown are FUN money. Good Luck and Have Fun!

description: Experience reflex action game-play on unique water physics as castaway Johnny Calm. FIGHT • Battle for survival with your trusty boat and paddle • Classic platformer game controls (left/right & jump/attack) • Randomly generated enemy attack patterns • Procedurally generated rogue waves • Satisfying beat 'em up action COLLECT • Bonus rounds - Smash and grab coins! • Collect/sell gold and treasures • Recruit the help of mermaids UPGRADE • Upgrade health and super moves • Premium upgrades available (optional) COMPETE • Earn achievements on Game Center • Climb the leaderboards on Game Center • A perfect challenge for old-school console gamers Can you survive against the hungry shark and vicious sea creatures? Get Super Waves Survivor now and test your skill! * Requires: Dual-core CPU | OpenGL ES 2.0+ | 800 x 480 minimum resolution ** This is the full version of the game and it can be played in it's entirety for free without making any IAPs ______________________________ HOW TO PLAY • Help Johnny Calm survive by defeating sea creatures and staying ahead of the hungry shark! • Each heart indicates +1 Hit-Point (to a maximum of seven) • Collect coins and spend them on upgrades (Alicia will show you how with tutorials when your game is over) CONTROLS • Paddle left or right by pressing the left or right arrow buttons • Speed paddle by rapidly pressing the left or right arrow buttons • Jump by pressing the up arrow • Attack by pressing the attack button (star-burst) when creatures are near • You can land on creatures to defeat them • The Super button will appear when you have earned a Super Move and Ammo SHARK METER • The shark meter at the top-middle of the screen shows the distance between the shark and Johnny • When the shark is close, a red arrow will indicate that you need to move right to escape • When the shark is dangerously close, you will see flashing shark teeth and should paddle rapidly to the right to escape BONUS ROUNDS • Break open a chest by attacking it during Bonus Rounds to earn extra coins • The shark won't chase your during Bonus Rounds TIPS • Available in the Info menu

description: Wabbitemu creates a Texas Instruments graphing calculator right on your Android device. Wabbitemu supports the TI-73, TI-81, TI-82, TI-83, TI-83 Plus, TI-83 Plus Silver Edition, TI-84 Plus, TI-84 Plus Silver Edition, TI-85, and TI-86. Fast and convenient, Wabbitemu allows you to always have your trusty calculator with you. Because Wabbitemu is an emulator, the calculator it creates will act exactly like the real thing. Wabbitemu, like all emulators, requires a ROM image. Wabbitemu includes an easy to use setup wizard that will help you create a ROM image for your TI. Frequently Asked Questions: 1. How do I bring up the menu? You can bring up the menu by swiping from the left edge of the screen, or pressing the menu key (if your device has one). 2. How do I disable vibration when I tap on a button? Open the menu and click on settings. Under the 'Skin' category unselect 'Vibrate on keypress' 3. How do I load apps like PlySmlt2 or Inequalz? To load any file to your calculator you need to first download it to your SD card or internal storage on your device. You can find the official TI applications for the 84 Plus (non color) available here: http://education.ti.com/en/us/software/search/ti-84-plus-family-ti-83-plus-family#view=math-apps . Once you have downloaded the app to your device open Wabbitemu. Swipe from the left edeg of the screen to bring up the menu, and select 'Load file'. Find the file you just downloaded in the list and select it. The file will be sent to your calculator. Apps for the 83+ and 84+ calcs will end in *.8xk. Apps for the 84+CSE will end in *.8ck or *.8xk. 4. I'm missing fraction options when I press Alpha+F1! How do I get these fraction options? Fraction options (and the rest of the Alpha+FN menus) are only available on OS 2.55 MP. Wabbitemu allows you to download both 2.43 and 2.55 MP. You can check your OS version by hitting '2nd' then '+'. Then press enter to go to the about screen. If it not 2.55 MP or 2.53 MP you will need to upgrade. To upgrade you will need to recreate your ROM by going through the setup wizard again. The setup wizard is runnable if you bring up the menu by swiping from the left edge of the screen. Then select 'Re-run setup wizard'. As you go through the setup make sure you have selected OS 2.55 MP on the OS selection screen. More documentation can be found on the official website, http://wabbit.codeplex.com
release_text: Another fix for issues downloading OS file.

description: Take role of an engigmatic space rocket pilot/designer! Use these rockets to take revenge upon your enemies! Rocket Thruster gives you an ability to remote-control a multi-purpose rocket and use it to explore vast levels, collect valuable minerals and complete various tasks. You are going to face an inhospitable world, full of diversed traps - starting from an unstable gravity fields, through narrow tunnels full of rough rocks and even security turrets. Remember that you are alone against your foes - only your skill can help you with the journey. Apart from that there's few helpful things. One of them is a hook on a chain, that your rocket is equipped with. With its help you can unlock closed passages, steal resources from your enemies or simply avoid an imminent crash. The other useful thing are upgrade system, which will allow you to buy various upgrades for collected minerals. But be careful - destroying your current rocket means destroying its upgrades as well... Face Rocket Thruster today!

S Converter is a fast, simple, and colorful unit converter. With a clean and simple user interface, S Converter is the most HOLO and easy to use unit converter! Convert kilometers to miles, kilograms to pounds, decimal numbers to binary numbers, and much more with ease! Features: • Completely free with no ads or IAP! • HOLO UI. • Instant Conversion as you type. • Convert to all units simultaneously. • Hide unused units by swiping them away (or unchecking them from the settings page). • Currency conversion with over 60 currencies. • Built-in calculator. • Light and dark themes. • Custom units. • Combine stones & pounds or feet & inches to convert from/to them as a single unit. • Choose between different grouping and decimal separators. • And much more! Available Units: • Acceleration • Area • Currency • Digital Storage • Energy • Force • Fuel Consumption • Length • Mass • Numeral Systems • Power • Pressure • Shoe Size • Speed • Temperature • Time • Torque • Transfer Speed • Volume • Volumetric Flow • And much more to come in future updates! tags: unit converter, converter, s converter, currency converter, numeral systems converter, holo, holo converter, holo unit converter, holo currency converter, material converter, material design,

Simply Colors will teach young children colors in ways that are meaningful and fun. Six different learning games are designed for Kids ages 3 to 6. Preschool kids will learn the color names, recognize colors in different objects, distinguish color differences in the same type of objects, make connection between different object by their similarity in color, memorize paint color with the classic memory match game and be able to sort different objects by color. The six games include: -------------------------------------------------------- Show and Tell, tap on colored pencil and learn the color sound and objects in that color Pinwheel Tap, tap the pinwheel according to the cue, if right, the pinwheel will spin Pair up sock, four pairs of socks lost their match, pair them up Line up, draw a line between a car and the same colored pencil Memory match, match all the pairs of paints Sort, sort different objects of the same color into the box The skills your kid will develop: --------------------------------- Color recognition. Make connections between different things by their color, the goal of the Line Up and Sort games. Noticing differences, same type of things can differ in color, the goal of the sock game. Stretch your memory muscle, the goal of the memory Match game Learn to categorize, the goal of the sort game keywords: preschool learn colors, kids, toddler, colours, match, memory, sort, educational games.

description: Simply Fractions 3 is designed for fourth and fifth grade elementary students to further their understanding of fractions, it is the next step from the Simply Fractions 2 app. Kids will learn visually how to add, subtract simple or mixed fractions with like denominators, multiply fractions by a whole number, solve word problems, learn about 10th and 100th based decimals, convert fractions to these decimals, compare the decimals, and add 10th based fractions to 100th based fractions. The Full version has eight different mini activities. The lite version has 2 mini activities, no ads are served in either versions. Here is a summary of the games: 1. Add fractions with like denominators, drag all the fractional pieces from the second operand to the first to see the visual model, then key in the right value. There are 4 levels of difficulty, from simple fractions to mixed fractions. This activity with all levels is available in the lite version also. 2. Subtract fractions with like denominators, take the fractional parts from the first operand to see the visual representation, then key in the right values. There are two levels of difficulty. 3. Multiply fraction by a whole number, drag all the fractional parts to the result panel to see the visual help, then key in the right values. There are two levels of difficulty. 4. Word problems, solve real world problems involving fractions using the add, subtract and multiply skills learned. 5. 10th and 100th. In this game, you are asked to shade 10th or 100th based fractions, you can also set the format to decimals, English word notation, or convert 10th to 100th or vice versa. This activity with all options is available in the lite version also. 6. Learn number line for 10th or 100th fractions and decimals. 7. Decimal sequence, compare decimals to hundredths and put them in order. 8. Add 10th and 100th, express a fraction with denominator 10 as an equivalent fraction with denominator 100, and use this technique to add two fractions with respective denominators 10 and 100. This app is optimized for both phones and tablets. keywords: common core, fractions, third grade math, fourth grade math, fifth grade fractions,
